name: Nature Dragon
description: The Nature Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature.       The Nature Dragon loves humans, animals, and all living things - some of them for gastronomic purposes. Even though she hasnt eaten a whole human, a finger or two have been lost...

name: Firebird Dragon
description: The Firebird Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Firebird Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      Like a phoenix - the symbol of rebirth - this dragon is said to be immortal. His fiery feathers and regal flight are an impressive sight. It is said that this birds cry is that of a beautiful song.

name: Mercury Dragon
description: The Mercury Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Mercury Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      This dragon is highly unpredictable, poisonous and has an exceptionally low melting point. But when the sun shines from the right angle, this liquid creature looks absolutely magnificent!

name: Gummy Dragon
description: The Gummy Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Gummy Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      Bouncy and happy, you will have a new best friend in this dragon! The Gummy Dragon loves butterflies, sugar and summer clouds.

name: Tropical Dragon
description: The Tropical Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Tropical Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      The Tropical Dragon likes to dance all night, do acrobatics, and enjoy life in general. His happy-go-lucky attitude is very catchy, so in his company it’s impossible not to smile!

name: Zombie Dragon
description: The Zombie Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Zombie Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      This undead dragon has a huge appetite! He keeps eating, but somehow nothing seems to fill him up. Despite his constant hunger, forgetful nature, and bad vision, he has proven to be loyal.

name: Petroleum Dragon
description: The Petroleum Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Petroleum Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      A dragon with the worst attitude. He can look extremely dirty at first, but his character is flawless. Petroleum Dragons like sunshine and sandy beaches. They despise the cold.

name: Dandelion Dragon
description: The Dandelion Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Dandelion Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      This feather-light friend is a must for every dragon enthusiast. Her puffy appearance will draw crowds from far, far away to see her famous disappearing act.

name: Jade Dragon
description: The Jade Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Jade Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      The Jade Dragon is the wisest of them all. Ask him any question or present him any problem, and you will receive an answer from this ancient being. All you have to do is learn Chinese first!

name: Star Dragon
description: The Star Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Star Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      Who doesnt like looking at stars on a clear night? This dragon is made of stars, and during the night you can see her shine. The Star Dragon is one of the calmest and happiest dragons, a friend to all.

name: Terra Dragon
description: The Terra Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra.       Dont be afraid! Thats not an earthquake, just a dignified Terra Dragon out for a walk. Terra Dragons are known for their love of dirt and extremely humble and honest nature.

name: Armadillo Dragon
description: The Armadillo Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Armadillo Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      Armadillo is an easily angered dragon, so be very careful when around him. He wears heavy protective gear, but what lies under all that armor and anger? Go find out!

name: Cloud Dragon
description: The Cloud Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Cloud Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      Many people dont even realize theyve seen this dragon before. Why, you ask? Because she blends so perfectly into the sky! If you sometimes feel like the rain clouds are following you, this is probably the reason!

name: Laser Dragon
description: The Laser Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Laser Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      This futuristic dragon is a delightful addition to your islands. Hes highly energetic and likes to fry small insects with his laser beams. This makes it easy to control the bug population on your islands!

name: Mud Dragon
description: The Mud Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Mud Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      Theyre sometimes mistakenly described as chubby or lazy, but we happen to know that Mud Dragons are on a strict organic mud diet and only enjoy an occasional fly when it happens to land directly in their mouths.

name: Nenufar Dragon
description: The Nenufar Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Nenufar Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      Fantastically beautiful, this dragon always draws crowds wherever she goes. Have you seen flowers floating on a pond? Maybe one wasnt a flower after all...

name: Hedgehog Dragon
description: The Hedgehog Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Hedgehog Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      This dragon is extremely fond of people, but unfortunately his spiky exterior is not exactly human-friendly. Wear some armor and go play!

name: Flame Dragon
description: The Flame Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame.       If you cant take the heat, stay away from the Flame Dragon! This temperamental creature is easily set off but calms down just as fast. And he always feels deep remorse for the things he burned.

name: Neon Dragon
description: The Neon Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Neon Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      If you think neon colors were only a thing of the 80s, you’re wrong. Neon is back! This dragon is pure sunshine on wings!

name: Pearl Dragon
description: The Pearl Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Pearl Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      The Pearl Dragon is known to be a bit vain and often wastes considerable amounts of time shining her pearls. But when necessary, she can also be extremely brave and selfless and will help anyone in need.

name: Medieval Dragon
description: The Medieval Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Medieval Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      The Medieval Dragon hails from the times of King Arthur, who gave him the precious task of protecting his sword. Ever since, he has been looking for a new master. Could it be you?

name: Penguin Dragon
description: The Penguin Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Penguin Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      At first sight, its easy to mistake this dragon for a penguin, but dont be fooled - her teeth are extremely sharp!

name: Ice Dragon
description: The Ice Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice.       Due to the recent climate changes, the super cool Ice Dragons have migrated to the North Pole. If you see one in a warm place, please direct them to the nearest ice rink and youll have a friend forever.

name: Fluorescent Dragon
description: The Fluorescent Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Fluorescent Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      This dragon glows in the dark, so hes extremely convenient during the dark winter months. You will also save on electricity by getting this glowing dragon!

name: Electric Dragon
description: The Electric Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric.       Legend has it that this dragon was born from a great storm in the Dark Ages, when an ordinary dragon got hit by lightning. Since that day, you can see other dragons flying the skies looking for a shock.

name: Battery Dragon
description: The Battery Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Battery Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      Running out of batteries all the time? This dragon will be your new best friend and keep all your devices fully charged whenever he’s around!

name: Sea Dragon
description: The Sea Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea.       If youre into watersports, the Sea Dragon will be your new best friend! Sea Dragons have often been mistaken for seals or dolphins.

name: Metal Dragon
description: The Metal Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal.       A robust dragon, drawn towards all things metal. Word on the island is that what the Metal Dragon lacks in intellect, he more than makes up for in determination.

name: Dark Dragon
description: The Dark Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark.       The Dark Dragon is highly elusive; only a handful of eyewitnesses have managed to spot this creature of the night. Because of her color and nocturnal rhythm, shes virtually impossible to see!

name: Legacy Dragon
description: The Legacy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       This dragon is so legendary that no words can do him justice. But beware: Your life will never be the same again after you’ve encountered this creature of legends.

name: Vampire Dragon
description: The Vampire Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Vampire Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      If you’ve caught the Vampire Dragon, you can give yourself a pat on the back. Beware! He cant be tamed, so treat him nicely or he will just fly away!

name: Alpine Dragon
description: The Alpine Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Alpine Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      Alpine Dragon, the robust cousin of Ice Dragon is impossible not to love! This adorable creature is irresistibly playful and friendly. Watch out for avalanches though!

name: Poo Dragon
description: The Poo Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Poo Dragon can also learn Sea and  Dark moves.      Sometimes it’s considered slightly disgusting, but in other parts of the world, poo is thought to bring good luck and fortune! Are you brave enough to put this dragon on your island?

name: Volcano Dragon
description: The Volcano Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Volcano Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      This is the most explosive cousin of the Alpine Dragon. Always happy and cheerful, but watch out, hes hot!

name: Blizzard Dragon
description: The Blizzard Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Blizzard Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      Weirdly enough, this dragon made of snow and ice seems to like hot and wet environments! Seeing this rare dragon flap around in a pile of lava is definitely worth the effort!

name: Rattlesnake Dragon
description: The Rattlesnake Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Rattlesnake Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      Potentially deadly, this dragon has to be treated with care to stop him from biting his master! When fully trained, he can be the most loyal servant.

name: Gold Dragon
description: The Gold Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Gold Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      Precious by nature, this dragon is the most giving of them all. If you take good care of him and feed him well, he might just lay a beautiful golden egg.

name: Soccer Dragon
description: The Soccer Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Soccer Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      The ancestors of this dragon happened to make their home in a soccer stadium, and thats how it all started. The dragons began watching games and finally learned how to play themselves.

name: Platinum Dragon
description: The Platinum Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Platinum Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      A dragon of this magnitude certainly knows his worth. Platinum Dragon is generally known as the leader of the pack and isnt afraid to demonstrate his power.

name: Pirate Dragon
description: The Pirate Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Pirate Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      Ahoy, dragon lovers! This very special dragon will be a crown jewel in your dragon collection. Get ready for some reckless sea adventures and hop on board!

name: Crystal Dragon
description: The Crystal Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       If you like shiny, valuable things, you’ll love the Crystal Dragon! She’s very rare and only shows herself when the planets are appropriately aligned. Youll be lucky to see her!

name: Air Dragon
description: The Air Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       Famous for her flying skills, this dragon can float for hours and hours without ever moving a wing. Shes a master of the currents, and some witnesses say that she even changes color according to the weather!

name: Mirror Dragon
description: The Mirror Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       Do you like admiring yourself in the mirror? Then the Mirror Dragon will be your new best friend! Some people say that you can catch a glimpse of the future reflected in this dragon.

name: Coral Dragon
description: The Coral Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Coral Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      The Coral Dragon reflects that which is most beautiful underwater. The colorful gardens of the abyss are more magnificent than you could ever imagine. This dragon is a treasure!

name: Spicy Dragon
description: The Spicy Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Spicy Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      Spice up your island kingdom with this temperamental fellow. The Spicy Dragon is known for his excessive use of colorful language and passion for Mexican food.

name: Waterfall Dragon
description: The Waterfall Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Waterfall Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      This dragon is an absolute wonder! Where does the water come from and where is it going? Who knows? Its still mesmerizing to watch.

name: Cactus Dragon
description: The Cactus Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Cactus Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      The Cactus Dragon loves to cuddle! What a shame that she’s covered in thorns. If you still find her charming despite the risk of getting pricked, put your gloves on and give her a hug!

name: Storm Dragon
description: The Storm Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Storm Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      This dragon loves stormy weather more than anything! If you feel that life is getting too peaceful in your island kingdom, get the Storm Dragon to shake things up.

name: Mojito Dragon
description: The Mojito Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Mojito Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      You know that its summer when you see mojitos everywhere! Invite this refreshing dragon to your islands and we can guarantee that the party will never stop.

name: Chameleon Dragon
description: The Chameleon Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Chameleon Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      A master of camouflage - the Chameleon Dragon can change color, so dont be alarmed if she seems to have disappeared, just wait a sec and shell appear again! Fun fact: This dragon sees everything.

name: Snowflake Dragon
description: The Snowflake Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Snowflake Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      This beautiful dragon is very friendly and delicate, attracting snowflakes wherever she goes - natures own works of art. Just keep the temperature low, or shell melt!

name: Seashell Dragon
description: The Seashell Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Seashell Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      Who doesnt love seashells - the treasures of the sea? Offer this dragon a home and see what beautiful, shiny treasures will come out!

name: Moose Dragon
description: The Moose Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Moose Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      Did you know that the Moose Dragon is one of the most ancient animals around today? At the dawn of time, in the ancient marshes, a moose and a dragon met... It was love at first sight, and the result is delightful!

name: Dragonfly Dragon
description: The Dragonfly Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Dragonfly Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      Sometimes a dragon is even closer than you think - just sitting on the rock behind you or flying by while you lie on the grass. Despite often being mistaken for an insect, the Dragonfly is all Dragon.

name: Venom Dragon
description: The Venom Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Venom Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Rising from deep below ground, the impressive Venom Dragon appears. Hes potentially lethal but can also provide an antidote when you need it most. Will you take the risk?

name: Steampunk Dragon
description: The Steampunk Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Steampunk Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      A masterpiece of classic machinery, this one actually came to life with a little help from our Dragon Master, Deus. Keep him well oiled and you will have a loyal servant forever!

name: Butterfly Dragon
description: The Butterfly Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Butterfly Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      Release this magical dragon onto your island and enjoy her mesmerizing beauty! You will never be able to catch her, but given her fiery temper, maybe this dragon is best appreciated from afar.

name: Robot Dragon
description: The Robot Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Robot Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      Did you ever imagine youd have a robot servant in the future? Well, the future is already here, and this Robot Dragon is the best servant you could ever have! It even has a container for cold drinks.

name: Pure Dragon
description: The Pure Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure.       Can you imagine a creature so pure that he almost makes you blind with the light of his purity? Our earthly words fail to do the Pure Dragon justice, so youd better get to know him in person!

name: Paladin Dragon
description: The Paladin Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Paladin Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      The Paladin is a dragon made of epic adventures, noble deeds, and magical powers. Hes one of the most well-behaved dragons of all time, yet has a peculiar weakness for hot dogs!

name: Fossil Dragon
description: The Fossil Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Fossil Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      The unique quality of the Fossil Dragon is that he can be trapped in ice for centuries and yet fly away as agile as an eagle when the ice melts. This dragon has a lot of stories to tell.

name: Seahorse Dragon
description: The Seahorse Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Seahorse Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      This happy-go-lucky dragon adores the beach life and the sun! You can find him at all major surfing spots around Dragon City, splashing in the waves and bringing smiles to the faces of all creatures.

name: Sky Dragon
description: The Sky Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Sky Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      This dragon is as mysterious as it gets! Hes a whisper in the air, a light September breeze on your cheek, that shadow in the corner of your eye... Catch him, if you can!

name: Bat Dragon
description: The Bat Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Bat Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      Descended from bats, this dragon has many special talents. She is an amazingly agile flyer and uses echolocation to navigate your Islands during the night!

name: Aztec Dragon
description: The Aztec Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Aztec Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      Coming from deep in the jungle, where his mysterious civilization has dwelled undisturbed for millennia, this rare dragon’s wisdom is sought after by sages far and wide.

name: Chinese Dragon
description: The Chinese Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Chinese Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      This dragon has always been close to the Emperor of China and some even say that he might be the true holder of the imperial power. He brings you good luck, prosperity, and wisdom.

name: King Dragon
description: The King Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The King Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      Contrary to popular belief, the King Dragon often leaves the throne and mingles with dragons of low birth in order to share the joys of life away from wealth, if only for a while.

name: Wizard Dragon
description: The Wizard Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Wizard Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Most would think that combining a wizard and a dragon would result in pure magical power. Unfortunately, this dragon is mostly known for his clumsiness and an utterly strange sense of humor.

name: Two-headed Dragon
description: The Two-headed Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Two-headed Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Two is definitely better than one! This two-headed beast is double the fun and double the trouble! Please dont turn your back on him unless you want to end up the butt of a practical joke.

name: Plankton Dragon
description: The Plankton Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Plankton Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      Comfortable both below and above water, this dragon is known as the “wanderer” because she can travel thousands of miles without rest. With her magnificent glow, shes especially impressive at night.

name: Viking Dragon
description: The Viking Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Viking Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      Watch out, this Nordic dragon will do everything possible to conquer and pillage the Habitats of the other dragons... Unless he decides to enjoy a hearty meal and take a nap instead!

name: Jelly Dragon
description: The Jelly Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Jelly Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      Wobbly and cheerful, this dragon is a blast! She has a special ability to change color when she grows up, and she makes people of all ages break out in hysterical laughter!

name: Quetzal Dragon
description: The Quetzal Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Quetzal Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      Dating back to the Mesoamerican jungles, this dragon forms the boundary between heaven and earth. Speeding to the skies and back, Quetzal is also the high priest of all dragons!

name: Queen Dragon
description: The Queen Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Queen Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      The prettier counterpart of the power couple - Their Majesties King and Queen Dragon - is known for her peaceful and fair nature. Only the tricks of the evil witch will awaken her dark fury!

name: Thanksgiving Dragon
description: The Thanksgiving Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Thanksgiving Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      This dragon was one of the first inhabitants of the magical Dragon Islands! Hes known for his humble and grateful nature and has an incredible fondness for oven-cooked turkey!

name: Santa Dragon
description: The Santa Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Santa Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      Ho, ho, ho! The merriest dragon ever wishes you an awesome Christmas! With him, all the days of the year will be filled with peace and sharing.

name: Ghost Dragon
description: The Ghost Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Ghost Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      Are you ready to be haunted? This ghastly dragon possesses a slightly split personality, so you never know if he will be good or evil when you play with him.

name: Ninja Dragon
description: The Ninja Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Ninja Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      Keep your eyes on this dragon at all times since, despite his cute look, hes extremely dangerous and crafty! Turn around and you just might get a ninja star in your back.

name: Ice&fire Dragon
description: The Ice&fire Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Ice&fire Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      An extremely conflicted creature that is very hard to capture! His life is a constant migration from the toasty equator to the chilly North so he can keep both sides satisfied.

name: Aurora Dragon
description: The Aurora Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Aurora Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      This dragon is even harder to spot than the Northern Lights themselves, so not much is known about her nature. Just get ready for the most amazing light show that this planet has to offer!

name: Music Dragon
description: The Music Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Music Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      Can your hear that mesmerizing sound coming from above? Its the Music Dragon, creating the most beautiful sounds with her wings while flying through the clouds of Dragon City.

name: Block Dragon
description: The Block Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Block Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      What happens when plastic, electricity, and dark forces combine? A Block Dragon is created! This dragon has a great sense of humor and an infinite collection of slightly naughty jokes...

name: Summerfly Dragon
description: The Summerfly Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Summerfly Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      The Summerfly Dragon can truly handle the heat. Her fiery temper is known throughout the islands, but give her a lick of your ice cream cone, and shell love you forever!

name: Alien Dragon
description: The Alien Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Alien Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      A dragon from another universe - a completely unknown alien entity! Dont even try to fool this creature since he can read your mind before you even think your thoughts!

name: Pharaoh Dragon
description: The Pharaoh Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Pharaoh Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      When the sun sets behind the ancient pyramids, some statues start to move... This ruler dragon can hold a pose for centuries before taking a stroll under the cover of night.

name: Paradise Dragon
description: The Paradise Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Paradise Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      What happens when you put a dragon in paradise? It grows bright, light feathers, starts to glow like gold and is filled with eternal peace and tranquility unknown any other dragon.

name: Gaudi Dragon
description: The Gaudi Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Gaudi Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      This dragon is legendary even amongst the legendary dragons. Its regal stature attracts attention wherever it flies. It prefers colder climates due to the risk of sunburn.

name: Octopus Dragon
description: The Octopus Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Octopus Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      This dragon is the boss of all the pirates and can use her evil tentacles to fight up to 8 opponents at the same time! Beat her and you can be very proud of your achievement.

name: Jellyfish Dragon
description: The Jellyfish Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Jellyfish Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      Sometimes the most beautiful thing can be the most harmful one. Looking at the Jellyfish Dragon might feel like a mesmerizing dream, until you get too close...

name: Carnival Dragon
description: The Carnival Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Carnival Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      Theres no party like a Carnival Dragon party! Wherever this dragon travels, the party starts immediately. If you cant handle the fun, stay out of the way!

name: Love Dragon
description: The Love Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Love Dragon can also learn Electric and  Nature moves.      Will love unite us or tear us apart? For those searching for answers to the big questions, getting to know this endearing dragon is highly recommended! All you need is Love Dragon.

name: Dujur Dragon
description: The Dujur Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Dujur Dragon can also learn Electric and  Ice moves.      Despite his size, Dujur is as light as a spring cloud and therefore needs no wings to fly. Dujur brings good luck with him wherever he goes and never gets tired of helping children!

name: T-rex Dragon
description: The T-rex Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The T-rex Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      The T-Rex Dragon greatly resembles one of the most dangerous hunters ever. Something changed along the way, though, because this specimen is one of the most harmless dragons around.

name: Brontosaurus Dragon
description: The Brontosaurus Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Brontosaurus Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      This vegetarian giant loves all living creatures: children, animals, dragons... But most of all, he loves all edible plants! In fact, there are rumors that “bronto” means “forever hungry”.

name: Hydra Dragon
description: The Hydra Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Hydra Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      Legend says that when you cut one of the Hydra Dragons heads off, two more will grow in its place. So youd better keep this dragon and his poisonous breath on your side!

name: Mars Dragon
description: The Mars Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Mars Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      Get ready for some serious extraterrestrial action with this stranger-than-fiction dragon. Remember to feed him with plenty of space plasma and dragon food to keep baby dragons from disappearing. The truth is out there!

name: Prisma Dragon
description: The Prisma Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Prisma Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      What really happens at the end of a rainbow? From the reflections of shiny treasures emerges a Prisma Dragon with all the colors of the universe on her back.

name: Centipede Dragon
description: The Centipede Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Centipede Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      This dragon is one of the fastest...on land! He can break dance like a pro, but in the air he often gets tangled up in his own feet and wings and completely loses control.

name: Emerald Dragon
description: The Emerald Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Emerald Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      Not all that glitters is gold... Some of it is emerald, too! This extremely precious dragon is one of the most valuable in Dragon City. Guard her well to make sure she isnt stolen.

name: Ruby Dragon
description: The Ruby Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Ruby Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      If you want to capture the light of a million sunsets, the glimmer of a thousand lakes, and the heat of the hottest fires, obtain the Ruby Dragon and visitors will surely flock to your Islands!

name: Angry Dragon
description: The Angry Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Angry Dragon can also learn Flame and  Nature moves.      Don’t make this dragon angry! He may look a little bit absent-minded and cute, but there are secret powers hidden within his mutant blood.

name: Lava Dragon
description: The Lava Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Lava Dragon can also learn Terra and  Dark moves.      For millions of years, this super mighty dragon has been sleeping in the deepest cracks of the mountains. Now its time to unleash his power!

name: Joker Dragon
description: The Joker Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Joker Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Time to laugh! This very rare dragon loves pranks and tricks. If you give him the chance, youll find a sticker on your back saying “Kick Me!”

name: Chainmail Dragon
description: The Chainmail Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Chainmail Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      This unique armored dragon will be one of the most precious pieces in your collection. As powerful as Armadillo, and as stunning as Platinum, the Chainmail Dragon is a magical masterpiece.

name: Sphynx Dragon
description: The Sphynx Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Sphynx Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      Ra blessed this magical creature a gazillion years ago. Mysteries and mystical powers are hidden in the pyramids guarded by the Sphynx Dragon.

name: Mummy Dragon
description: The Mummy Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Mummy Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Many think that the Mummy Dragon was formerly a Zombie Dragon with some concerns about his look, but that’s not true. Long ago, the Mummy Dragon was a king among kings, and now he’s back...

name: Diamante Dragon
description: The Diamante Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Diamante Dragon can also learn Terra and  Nature moves.      Stardust, the most solid rock in the universe, with Deus added magical touch made this dragon come alive. Rumor has it that not even the Emerald and Ruby Dragons combined could defeat this new juggernaut.

name: Demon Dragon
description: The Demon Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Demon Dragon can also learn Flame and  Metal moves.      The realm of dragons has its own mystical side. It is said that the Demon Dragon appears in the nightmares of other dragons.

name: Gargoyle Dragon
description: The Gargoyle Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Gargoyle Dragon can also learn Ice and  Dark moves.      Daylight turns him into a stone statue, but at night he awakens! Look closely at the black sky and you might find him roaming the darkness above you.

name: Azure Dragon
description: The Azure Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Azure Dragon can also learn Flame and  Metal moves.      Deep in the sea, close to the volcanic fault lines, the Azure Dragon emerged centuries ago as the King of the Depths. Are you bold enough to tame him?

name: Archangel Dragon
description: The Archangel Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light.       Deus himself created the Archangel Dragon when he was a brave young god. When he needs something done, he chooses the Archangel Dragon for the job.

name: Lightning Dragon
description: The Lightning Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Lightning Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      Have you ever heard the quote "Theres always a calm before the storm"? It is said that this quote refers to the Lightning Dragon.

name: Ancient Dragon
description: The Ancient Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Ancient Dragon can also learn Ice and  Nature moves.      For eons, there was nothing but time and.... the Ancient Dragon! Even if this sounds kind of boring, this gives the Ancient Dragon a unique perspective about basically everything.

name: Wurm Dragon
description: The Wurm Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Wurm Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      Be careful what you wish for! There is always a chance that the Wurm Dragon will appear and make it come true. But maybe not exactly as you thought.

name: Glacial Dragon
description: The Glacial Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Glacial Dragon can also learn Electric and  Nature moves.      His razor-sharp edges turn the Glacial Dragon’s whole body into a dangerous weapon! In winter, he retreats to the polar regions to regenerate his powers.

name: Cerberus Dragon
description: The Cerberus Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Cerberus Dragon can also learn Flame and  Terra moves.      Also known as The Guardian, the Cerberus Dragon protects the dungeons and the treasures inside them. He has a lot of spare time while standing guard and fills this time playing Rock n Roll.

name: Burning Dragon
description: The Burning Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Burning Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      The fire inside Burning Dragons is not your usual fire. Its a dark, magical fire with the power to consume anything in seconds, much quicker than usual and of course way more dangerous.

name: Treasure Dragon
description: The Treasure Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Treasure Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      Jewels, gold, magic crystals, diamonds… The Treasure Dragon hoards the riches of his defeated enemies in his lair. Only a Dragon Master can tame the Treasure Dragon. Is that you?

name: Granite Dragon
description: The Granite Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Granite Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      It is said that the Granite Dragon combines the three hardest rock types on Earth. Lets not get into the scientific details, but just know that he’s three times as tough.

name: Bone Dragon
description: The Bone Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Bone Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      This soulless dragon comes from the Northern Lands, far beyond The Wall. He is controlled by the dark magic created by Darkus millennia ago, and he can use his dead body to attack opponents with unnatural power.

name: Wyvern Dragon
description: The Wyvern Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Wyvern Dragon can also learn Flame and  Terra moves.      The Wyvern Dragon may look scary and aggressive, but this fire-breathing dragon is very kind. He serves as an aid to Deus whenever he needs and only uses his powers for good.

name: Predator Dragon
description: The Predator Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Predator Dragon can also learn Flame and  Terra moves.      This dragon loves herbivores, especially eating them. Be careful! When hes hungry, he begins to devour any living thing slower than him. Except kittens, of course!

name: Poseidon Dragon
description: The Poseidon Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea.       Poseidon is usually quite calm and sleepy in the ocean. But if he gets angry, he starts generating tsunamis and earthquakes. Fun fact: He hates the taste of fish.

name: Hades Dragon
description: The Hades Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Hades Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      The realm of the underworld is controlled by Hades. His favorite part of the job is his friendship with the sea of souls.

name: Atlas Dragon
description: The Atlas Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Atlas Dragon can also learn Terra and  Nature moves.      Atlas is usually exhausted from carrying the world with him wherever he goes. That duty has transformed his body, resulting in a powerful dragon capable of performing the most impressive attacks!

name: Justice Dragon
description: The Justice Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Justice Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      If you feel that injustice has occurred, just call the Justice Dragon. His balanced judgment will decide what’s fair... and his sword will decide what’s not.

name: Sun Dragon
description: The Sun Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Sun Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      The Sun Dragon lives inside the solar corona. When theres a sun storm, you can see her dancing with the flares, just like a child splashing in a swimming pool.

name: Luminescent Dragon
description: The Luminescent Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Luminescent Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      Deep under the sea where the Luminescent Dragon lives it can get pretty dark! He survives this total darkness by providing his own light, which he uses for hunting and disco parties - two totally related things.

name: Rainbow Dragon
description: The Rainbow Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Rainbow Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      This dragon takes white light and turns it into the entire light spectrum, coating herself with all the colors you can see - and probably some that you cant!

name: War Dragon
description: The War Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War.       Every empire in history has feared the huge War Dragon. He destroys everything in his path, including buildings, bridges, other dragons... and his enemies morale.

name: Juggernaut Dragon
description: The Juggernaut Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Juggernaut Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      The Juggernaut Dragon has been in every possible battle since the beginning of time, and he still wants more! Each scratch on his body corresponds to a dragon defeated in battle. Or maybe they come from his pet kitten!

name: Colossal Dragon
description: The Colossal Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Colossal Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      It’s hard not to be impressed by the size of this dragon. From far away, he looks big. As he gets closer, he becomes huge. And when you see him up close, hes totally colossal.

name: Leviathan Dragon
description: The Leviathan Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Leviathan Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      This epic creature has inhabited the seas for eons, devouring entire civilizations as a snack. Do you dare to dive deep and discover the treasures he hides?

name: Panzer Dragon
description: The Panzer Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Panzer Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      For years, the Panzer Dragons were sent to the front lines during the epic dragon fights of the Second Age. Most of them are now retired and like long walks and even longer naps. But they still have the fighting spirit in them.

name: Nirobi Dragon
description: The Nirobi Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       Master of doom and darkness. Lord of all things creepy. His C.V. is totally impressive if youre looking for an expert on the dark side of things.

name: Droconos Dragon
description: The Droconos Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       Time is relative, everybody knows that. What most people dont know is that Droconos plays with time like a child plays with a ball. Déjà-vus are his favorite jokes.

name: Monstrous Dragon
description: The Monstrous Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Monstrous Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      This classy monster comes from another dimension, a world full of Monster Legends! He crossed space and time to join the Dragon City inhabitants, where he feels really welcome.

name: Ivory Dragon
description: The Ivory Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Ivory Dragon can also learn Pure moves.      This majestic creature is the envy of all dragons. His skin is shiny, white ivory with filigrees of gold. Its as if an artist made a beautiful dragon sculpture which came to life!

name: Moon Dragon
description: The Moon Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Moon Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      Have you ever seen a full moon? It happens once every 28 days. That is also the exact sleep cycle of the Moon Dragon, who wakes up really angry and then goes back to bed.

name: Toxic Dragon
description: The Toxic Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Toxic Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Be careful! Its toxic! This dragon has some strange eating habits. He loves to have some sulfur for breakfast and radioactive remains for lunch. But now he’s on a diet, so he only gets a couple of old batteries for dinner.

name: Obsidian Dragon
description: The Obsidian Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Obsidian Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      After a volcano erupts, obsidian is the material that remains! Hard and cutting, this dragon is pure power! Every single edge he has is a deadly knife!

name: Meteor Dragon
description: The Meteor Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Meteor Dragon can also learn Terra and  Dark moves.      Millennia ago, the Meteor Dragon got in a fight with the Brontosaurus Dragon. He flew up in the sky and hit the earth at high speed, causing the extinction of all the dinosaurs on earth.

name: Hammer Dragon
description: The Hammer Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Hammer Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      Do you know why this dragon is called the Hammer Dragon? Some people think it’s because she looks like a hammerhead shark, but actually she just likes to hit things with her metal head...mainly other dragons.

name: Tribal Dragon
description: The Tribal Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Tribal Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      Ukma akma atmu utma, entu entu aku aku!!! This is actually the war cry of the Tribal Dragon and means "attack"!

name: Origami Dragon
description: The Origami Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Origami Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      When Deus was a child, he liked creating origami. One day, he created a beautiful paper dragon and blew life into it. Since then, the Origami Dragon can be seen floating on thermal air currents high in the sky.

name: Tiny Dragon
description: The Tiny Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Tiny Dragon can also learn Light moves.      Even in adulthood, this dragon remains tiny. For this reason, this little guy is loved by children! But dont be fooled, despite his small size, this dragon is a seriously tough opponent.

name: Thor Dragon
description: The Thor Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Thor Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      Thor is known for his mastery of war, along with his beloved six pack abs. Hes loved battle for as long as he can remember and makes every fight a competition with his brother, Loki.

name: Loki Dragon
description: The Loki Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Loki Dragon can also learn Flame and  Dark moves.      Loki has always been a clever and sharp warrior. Using his deadly, dark skills, hes able to defeat most of his enemies. There is only one thing he lacks that prevents him from being the perfect warrior: his brothers hammer!

name: Odin Dragon
description: The Odin Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Odin Dragon can also learn Flame and  Light moves.      Deus and Odin often hang out together. When they do, they talk about exciting topics such as the weather or newborn dragons. When they get extremely bored by that stuff, they start dragon wars. They watch the fight together and bet on their best champions.

name: Photon Dragon
description: The Photon Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Photon Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      This quantic dragon is the guardian of all electromagnetic forces! Consisting of pure light, he can travel at the speed of light, and all the colors of the light spectrum originate from him.

name: Elfic Dragon
description: The Elfic Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Elfic Dragon can also learn Light moves.      Since the first time elves walked over Arda, this dragon has protected them all. His armor is made of leather strips, iron ingot, and refined moonstones. He is immune to all the forces of evil.

name: Zen Dragon
description: The Zen Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Zen Dragon can also learn Pure moves.      Six arms! Two to stand on the ground in homage to the First Noble Truth, “all life is suffering”. Two for meditation, “to avoid craving and aversion”. And two more to follow the Noble Eightfold Path and develop compassion for others.

name: Tesla Dragon
description: The Tesla Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Tesla Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      The Master of War and Electricity. The Lord of the Bolts and Strikes. The Commander of Energy and Conflict. And the Father of Modern Battle Science. His résumé is fairly impressive.

name: Kratus Dragon
description: The Kratus Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Kratus Dragon can also learn Pure moves.      Full of rage and anger, Kratus is the last of his kind. He is known as the Dragon of War. Feared, respected, and also admired by all, no one dares to face him in battle.

name: Saturn Dragon
description: The Saturn Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Saturn Dragon can also learn Ice and  Light moves.      There is no doubt that the Saturn Dragon comes from outer space. The beauty of his wings can hypnotize you if you look at them for more than a second! Finding one of these celestial dragons on Earth is a rather rare occurrence!

name: Thief Dragon
description: The Thief Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Thief Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Everyone is innocent until proven guilty, except the Thief Dragon! He gets everything he wants using tricks and traps, so don’t turn your back toward him! However, if its gold that you want, this is your dragon.

name: Midas Dragon
description: The Midas Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Midas Dragon can also learn Metal and  Dark moves.      Midas Dragon conceded the Golden Touch to King Midas, who was then able to change everything into gold and became the richest king ever. However, that blessing became a curse when he accidentally transformed his own son into gold. Get this dragon and swim in oceans of gold!

name: Mysterious Dragon
description: The Mysterious Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Mysterious Dragon can also learn Ice and  Dark moves.      This massive dragon always tries to sneak attack his enemies, but due to his massive size and his bright color, it’s impossible. But just because they know he’s there, isn’t a reason to let their guard down. Hes not sneaky, but he is dangerous.

name: Aquamarine Dragon
description: The Aquamarine Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Aquamarine Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      This dragon likes to live near water. He gets his name from his color, a shade of transparent green and blue. He likes to camouflage himself in the water when he is hunting fish. Aquamarine is a very agile and graceful dragon!

name: Hypno Dragon
description: The Hypno Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Hypno Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      A real trickster! The Hypno Dragon can make you believe youre a chicken or a frog! By spinning his spiral eyes, he hypnotizes everyone who tries to resist his will. It’s better to be his friend, but wait... He has no friends! Youd better run!

name: Stressed Dragon
description: The Stressed Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Stressed Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      You may wonder if his crazy hairstyle is natural - and the answer is yes! Do you like it? Well, just dont ask him how he does it, because you need to be really stressed out to have such crazy hair!

name: Troglodyte Dragon
description: The Troglodyte Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Troglodyte Dragon can also learn Flame and  Metal moves.      This dragon is also known as a “cave dweller”. He likes to live in caves or beneath overhanging rocks on cliffs. If you give him tinder and flint, he will make a perfectly cozy fire in a few minutes!

name: Mold Dragon
description: The Mold Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Mold Dragon can also learn Terra and  Flame moves.      Poor Mold Dragon… He doesn’t have many friends because other dragons find him disgusting, and when he’s sleeping, they confuse him for rotten garbage and try to throw him away. Truth is he’s a really nice buddy!

name: Rockfeller Dragon
description: The Rockfeller Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Rockfeller Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      This 90s tycoon knows how to make a fortune. Hell produce gold for you to collect if you get him. You wont regret this investment!

name: Scrooge Dragon
description: The Scrooge Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Scrooge Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      The Scrooge Dragon might seem a bit cold-hearted at first, and indeed he is, but he is also a financial genius! If he includes you in his will, youll never want for gold, gems, or tomatoes again.

name: Wrestler Dragon
description: The Wrestler Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Wrestler Dragon can also learn Flame and  War moves.      Are you ready to get this dragon into the battle arena? His thousands of fans will be watching him and expecting him to win, because he is the star!

name: Clover Dragon
description: The Clover Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Clover Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      One, two, three, four…five-leaf clover! Assured and confident, this dragon never fails. You could say that he was born under a lucky star. Other dragons feel luckier when they’re close to the Clover Dragon. Will you be luckier when you get him?

name: Poker Dragon
description: The Poker Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Poker Dragon can also learn Ice and  Dark moves.      He holds all the cards. Or is he bluffing? Sometimes in life you have to take risks, but its best not to when youre playing with the Poker Dragon. In Las Vegas, hes the boss.

name: Juggler Dragon
description: The Juggler Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Juggler Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      This Dragon is an amazing performer. His tricks and talent are beyond anything you have seen so far. Be careful as well, because he is one cunning adversary.

name: Ace Dragon
description: The Ace Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Ace Dragon can also learn Nature and  Metal moves.      The Ace Dragon is a master at playing poker and other card games. You’ll have to be sharp to beat him in a poker tournament!

name: Speed Dragon
description: The Speed Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Speed Dragon can also learn Flame and  Metal moves.      The Speed Dragon is, as you may guess, the fastest dragon in Dragon City! Hes never late when meeting friends and likes to run wherever he goes. You can always find him training at the track! Beep beep!

name: Strong Dragon
description: The Strong Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Strong Dragon can also learn Metal and  War moves.      The Strong Dragon was born in a gym... So its not difficult to understand his passion for exercise. You dont want to make him angry, because he can tear you to pieces with his claws!

name: Master Dragon
description: The Master Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Master Dragon can also learn Sea and  War moves.      This dragon is truly a master when it comes to controlling the elements. Her masterful nature makes her attacks a mystical masterclass. Be careful when training her as shes already a master in disguise.

name: Chimera Dragon
description: The Chimera Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Chimera Dragon can also learn Light moves.      A dragon wrought from the immortal flame! The head of a lion with the body of a snake, he has goat horns and breathes a terrible flame of bright fire. Watch your enemies tremble at the sight of the Chimera Dragon.

name: Eclipse Dragon
description: The Eclipse Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Eclipse Dragon can also learn Dark and  Light moves.      The sun hides when the Eclipse Dragon rises. Old civilizations knew about this mythic dragon and could predict his appearances. When he was coming, they would prepare themselves by putting on UV400 sunglasses to enjoy the show!

name: Specter Dragon
description: The Specter Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Specter Dragon can also learn Electric and  Dark moves.      Some dragons enjoy living in shadows and darkness. This is the case with the Specter Dragon. When he gets bored, he likes to scare other dragons, which makes him quite unpopular with his peers.

name: Cat Dragon
description: The Cat Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Cat Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Cats are lovely. We all love to feed them, stroke them, play with them... and watch them on video! Youll enjoy seeing your cute Cat Dragon playing in his habitat. But dont forget to use him in battle too. Hell scratch up your most fearsome opponents.

name: Crossfire Dragon
description: The Crossfire Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Crossfire Dragon can also learn Terra and  Electric moves.      Of all his impressive features, the Crossfire Dragon is most proud of the magic tattoos on his body. Each tattoo grants the dragon a different power. Added together, they make him a hard opponent to fight!

name: Greenfluid Dragon
description: The Greenfluid Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Greenfluid Dragon can also learn Sea and  Electric moves.      The amazing Greenfluid Dragon was created from the magical goo of dragonstone. It has great powers and can change from a fluid to solid state in no time.

name: Chobby Dragon
description: The Chobby Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Chobby Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      Don’t bother telling Chobby Dragon he’s cool. He knows he is! It’s like “The Emperor’s New Clothes” - if you can’t see how cool he is, then look harder!

name: Jamaican Dragon
description: The Jamaican Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Jamaican Dragon can also learn Nature and  Flame moves.      The most laid-back dragon around. He likes lying on the grass and playing his bongos. He also spends long hours braiding his dreadlocks. Don’t even try to stress him out because that won’t work on him.

name: Blind Dragon
description: The Blind Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Blind Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Sometimes what looks like a weakness is actually a strength! The Blind Dragon has developed amazing hearing and smelling skills, making him perfect for espionage and mushroom finding!

name: Cookie Dragon
description: The Cookie Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Cookie Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      Crunchy and sweet, the Cookie Dragon breeds perfectly with the Milk Dragon. Wait! Does the Milk Dragon even exist? Who knows, but what we know for sure is that Santa brings bigger presents to Cookie Dragon Masters!

name: Elements Dragon
description: The Elements Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Elements Dragon can also learn Flame and  Sea moves.      This dragon is perfection itself! His elements are combined in such a way that no one element is more important than another, making it hard to find a balance between all of them.

name: Manglar Dragon
description: The Manglar Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Manglar Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      This dragon likes to live in the rainforest. He can camouflage himself to blend in with nature. The Manglar Dragon is as peaceful and strong as an ox!

name: Amethyst Dragon
description: The Amethyst Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Amethyst Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      One of the most beautiful dragons in the world, Amethyst Dragon is the sister of the Quartz Dragon! As you can imagine, her skin is pretty tough since it’s made of minerals – not like her heart, which is lovely and soft.

name: Peace Dragon
description: The Peace Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Peace Dragon can also learn Light moves.      The Peace Dragon spreads love and peace all over Dragon City. Be careful, though! If you are not peaceful enough, you will suffer the consequences!

name: Desert Dragon
description: The Desert Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Desert Dragon can also learn Flame and  Electric moves.      The Desert Dragon comes from the most arid place in the world and is used to high temperatures. He is so big because he stores lots of water under his rocky skin! This allows him to survive many weeks without drinking!

name: Twister Dragon
description: The Twister Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Twister Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Six wings for a sea dragon may seem too many, but watch what happens when he surfaces! Just by twisting his body, this awesome dragon can create the most destructive whirlwinds and tornadoes.

name: Sylvan Dragon
description: The Sylvan Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Sylvan Dragon can also learn War moves.      Sylvan Dragons are the guardians that keep dark shadows out of the elven woods. They are born and raised in the deepest parts of the forest, where they are trained to be a light force of nature.

name: Cosmo Dragon
description: The Cosmo Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Cosmo Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      Raise your head and look at the sky on a clear night to see the incredible Cosmo Dragon fly. Created from stardust and earth sand, his skin reminds us of the night and his wings of the universes greatness.

name: Columbus Dragon
description: The Columbus Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Columbus Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      Dragopher Columbus is famous for discovering the flying islands in 1492. All the dragons you own live on the islands he discovered!

name: Bavarian Dragon
description: The Bavarian Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Bavarian Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      Lift up your stein and give a loud "Prost!" for the Bavarian Dragon. He and all the other dragons are enjoying some pretzels before they dance on the tables.

name: Frankie Dragon
description: The Frankie Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Frankie Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      Did Doctor Frank really put together different dragon parts to create a new dragon? It does look quite scary! When its dark, the Frankie Dragon sneaks around and scares other dragons.

name: Halloween Dragon
description: The Halloween Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Halloween Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      The Halloween Dragon is the master of pranks. Whenever he throws his head in the air, people scream in shock. This is how he gets his kicks!

name: Animation Dragon
description: The Animation Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Animation Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      Its been a while since dragons evolved from frozen frames and began to walk, fly, and fight! And its all thanks to the animation wizards and magi! The Animation Dragon was the first of his kind, which is why hes so special and loved by all.

name: Joseon Dragon
description: The Joseon Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Joseon Dragon can also learn Flame and  Sea moves.      Hailing from an ancient dynasty in Korea, the Joseon Dragon is known for his wisdom and immense simplicity. Able to anticipate incoming attacks, he can blast his enemies with brutal force and stand strong against attempted attacks.

name: Sensei Dragon
description: The Sensei Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Sensei Dragon can also learn Light and  Pure moves.      The Sensei Dragon is surrounded by a mystical aura, and you can feel his magical presence whenever you are near him. He is so powerful that he was born with his adult stage (lvl 10)!

name: Oni Dragon
description: The Oni Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Oni Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      This Oni Dragon may have been a fearsome demon long ago, but then he discovered the power of Qi. In his attempt to become the strongest demon, he became peaceful and wise. He might not look like an ogre, but watch out, he can eat you in one bite!

name: Quartz Dragon
description: The Quartz Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Quartz Dragon can also learn Ice and  Nature moves.      Quartz is the element that the ancient druids used in their armors and rituals. It was the Quartz Dragon who taught the celtic civilization the special characteristics of this rock.

name: Sunset Dragon
description: The Sunset Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Sunset Dragon can also learn Metal and  Dark moves.      The best time to see this dragon is at sunset. Some people confuse him for a giant bat or a vampire dragon because of the way he looks. It is said that he can block the sun with his giant wings and his impressive stature.

name: Snowman Dragon
description: The Snowman Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Snowman Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      Snowmen are one of the loveliest things youll see at Christmas. But a Snowman Dragon is simply irresistible! Be careful not to hug him too tight or he could melt!

name: Necromancer Dragon
description: The Necromancer Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Necromancer Dragon can also learn Dark and  War moves.      The Necromancer Dragon likes to communicate with the deceased, summoning their spirits or raising their bodies from the dead. He uses the deceased as a source of hidden knowledge or as weapons. Rumor has it that he uses black magic to fuel his powerful spells.

name: Yoyo Dragon
description: The Yoyo Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Yoyo Dragon can also learn Light moves.      The Yoyo dragon has a huge heart and is the only one equipped to tackle Dragon City’s most dangerous gremlins. With his sword forever by his side, this brave dragon goes out at night to gremlin hunt and make sure the islands are well protected.

name: Shogun Dragon
description: The Shogun Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Shogun Dragon can also learn Flame and  War moves.      This Japanese commander has the power of 100 dragons, but his main virtue is his calm mind on the battlefield. Victory is the only result he knows, and to keep his honor, he will perform harakiri with no hesitation!

name: Hawaiian Dragon
description: The Hawaiian Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Hawaiian Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      This dragon has great rhythm, stunning moves, and always feels the groove. These are perfect qualities for this fun and festive dragon. Hes the first to arrive at any Hawaiian party!

name: Surf Dragon
description: The Surf Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Surf Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      If you dont see this dragon at first, you probably need to get atop some tall waves. Keep your eyes peeled. When he rides a surfboard, its art in motion!

name: Ukulele Dragon
description: The Ukulele Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Ukulele Dragon can also learn Terra and  Pure moves.      This dragon has got rhythm! Once he starts playing his ukulele, the groove spreads to all the other dragons, and they start dancing with him. His good vibes are contagious!

name: Steam Dragon
description: The Steam Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Steam Dragon can also learn Flame and  Ice moves.      This unique dragon is pure boiler pressure! Using his rare combination of elements, he developed his own element – Steam! This inexhaustible energy source will meet all your needs.

name: Howl Dragon
description: The Howl Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Howl Dragon can also learn Nature and  Electric moves.      After being bitten by a werewolf, this creature became a hybrid of beast and dragon. Even though the Howl Dragons element is Dark, he is also connected to Nature and Energy Elements.

name: Magnet Dragon
description: The Magnet Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Magnet Dragon can also learn Metal and  Electric moves.      Nowadays, the power of magnetism is no secret to us, and we know it is the most powerful force on earth. Breeding this dragon will be as difficult as getting two positive poles to touch!

name: Quake Dragon
description: The Quake Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Quake Dragon can also learn Sea and  War moves.      Some earthquakes are caused by tectonic plates - others occur when a Quake Dragon lands. This sudden release of seismic power can destroy towns and cities; thank the gods you are on a flying island!

name: Apocalypse Dragon
description: The Apocalypse Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Apocalypse Dragon can also learn Ice, Light and  Dark moves.      The most powerful of the four-elements dragons, he spells the end of an era! With his combination of four opposing elements, the Apocalypse Dragon is pure destruction - albeit unintentionally. He is so difficult to breed that you may never see him.

name: Millennium Dragon
description: The Millennium Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Millennium Dragon can also learn War, Terra and  Metal moves.      The most ancient of all four-element dragons can finally be yours! Within the Millennium Dragon lurks the infinite power of time. The rare combination of its elements makes it unique and matchless.

name: Forge Dragon
description: The Forge Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Forge Dragon can also learn Terra, Ice and  Flame moves.      The most incandescent of all four-element dragons is the one that inhabits the center of the earth. Flying between lava flows, the Forge Dragon is in charge of keeping the planets core molten.

name: Promethium Dragon
description: The Promethium Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Promethium Dragon can also learn Dark, Nature and  Electric moves.      The most unpredictable of all four-element dragons. He is the lord of quantum mechanics; his body is pure energy, so he can control all the matter surrounding him. Dont get too close, hes radioactive!

name: Abyss Dragon
description: The Abyss Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Abyss Dragon can also learn Dark, Ice and  Flame moves.      The most unknown of all four-element dragons. He combines the most antagonistic pairs of elements. Coming from the deep unknown, he is the master of light and darkness, fire and ice. Expect the unexpected!

name: Mirage Dragon
description: The Mirage Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Mirage Dragon can also learn Ice, Nature and  Electric moves.      The most elusive of all four-element dragons. For years, the Mirage Dragon was considered a myth - a fabrication of a few crazed Dragon Masters. Today we know he is real, but that doesnt mean hes easy to breed!

name: Supersonic Dragon
description: The Supersonic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Supersonic Dragon can also learn Electric, Terra and  Metal moves.      The fastest of all four-element dragons. The Supersonic Dragon is difficult to attain. He flies ten times the speed of sound and strikes before anybody can hear him coming. Youd better build a pretty nice habitat or he will leave before you even see him.

name: Core Dragon
description: The Core Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Core Dragon can also learn Pure moves.      The Core Dragon is one of the Space Dragons. He is in charge of creating new planets. As a Dragon Master, youd be pleased to have him in your city.

name: Basilisk Dragon
description: The Basilisk Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Basilisk Dragon can also learn Pure moves.      This dragon is a descendant of the great Basilisk from an age long forgotten. He has all the traits and wit of his ancestors, but has developed some new abilities too.

name: Dolphin Dragon
description: The Dolphin Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Dolphin Dragon can also learn Light moves.      From the Social Point Fan Art contest comes the Dolphin Dragon! Its said that these animals are social, but this particular one prefers a "Like" to a sardine!

name: Easter Dragon
description: The Easter Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Easter Dragon can also learn Light and  Nature moves.      This funny tiny dragon is here to bring colored eggs and candy to all the good little dragons. He is so cute and sweet... But dont lick him! This one is not made of chocolate!

name: Bookday Dragon
description: The Bookday Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Bookday Dragon can also learn Flame and  Pure moves.      This dragon is literatures greatest defender. Thanks to him, good stories survive for centuries and are passed down from generation to generation.

name: Lightbeam Dragon
description: The Lightbeam Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Lightbeam Dragon can also learn Light moves.      Such a beautiful thing! This mystic and noble dragon is one of the rarest of its kind. The Lightbeam Dragon is one of the Space Dragons. He will fill your breeding cave with pure essence.

name: Felidae Dragon
description: The Felidae Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       This creature likes living in the wild, but hes had a very hard life, always running away from hunters who want his skin as a trophy. Put him on your island and hell be your proud partner, grateful for having been saved.

name: Space Dragon
description: The Space Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Space Dragon can also learn War and  Dark moves.      Time is relative, especially for this dragon. He was born during the big bang in the oldest part of the universe. Since then he has been traveling between galaxies creating new planets.

name: Kaiju Dragon
description: The Kaiju Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Kaiju Dragon can also learn Sea and  War moves.      This horrifying Kaiju Dragon was first seen in 1954. It is said that he was born from atomic explosions, but he loves tomatoes, too. Some people know him as the King of the Monsters!

name: Acoustic Dragon
description: The Acoustic Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Acoustic Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      This unusually shaped dragon has the special ability to redirect soundwaves at will! While this may not seem super useful, it allows him to know all the secrets and gossip in Dragon City.

name: Unity Dragon
description: The Unity Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Unity Dragon can also learn Dark and  Sea moves.      This elegant space Dragon is the guardian of balance. He leads his fellow dragons, but hes not a leader. As an integral part of the cosmos, he ensures that all universal forces flow in a common direction.

name: Anniversary Dragon
description: The Anniversary Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Anniversary Dragon can also learn Nature and  Flame moves.      We have been together for two years... Its time to celebrate! But what a surprise! We peeked inside the cake we baked together with Cookie Dragon and discovered a new dragon! The Anniversary Dragon has arrived.

name: Pterodactyl Dragon
description: The Pterodactyl Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Pterodactyl Dragon can also learn Nature and  Electric moves.      The scariest dragon of the Jurassic period has come to join his fellows. You may be afraid of his teeth and spikes, but beware of his claws that can slice you in two.

name: Crowned Dragon
description: The Crowned Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Crowned Dragon can also learn Pure and  Light moves.      The Crowned Dragon is soccer royalty and one of the best players of Dragon City. This beloved dragon is admired and respected by all because he’d rather lose than leave another dragon behind. His love for teamwork is what makes him so great!

name: Cheerful Dragon
description: The Cheerful Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Cheerful Dragon can also learn Electric and  Light moves.      Everyone wants the Cheerful Dragon on their team. He’s always happy and is a good sport, even if he loses. He also has electrifying moves that are difficult to see and can beat any opponent in the blink of an eye!

name: Adored Dragon
description: The Adored Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Adored Dragon can also learn Dark and  War moves.
