The Adored Dragon is one of the most beloved dragons, not only by his fans, but his teammates as well. This skilled dragon is known for his tricks. They’re so good he’s even adapted them for battles.

name: Speedy Dragon
description: The Speedy Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Speedy Dragon can also learn Pure and  Light moves.      The Speedy Dragon is known for his swift plays and golden touch. This dragon is capable of generating huge crowds who come to watch his show-stopping skills and the touch of his magical foot!

name: Fastshoot Dragon
description: The Fastshoot Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Fastshoot Dragon can also learn War and  Flame moves.      The Fastshoot Dragon is known for his technical skill, speed, and acceleration but his greatest quality is his vision. He is able to detect and predict the movements of his opponents, which makes him a fearsome adversary!

name: Sportive Dragon
description: The Sportive Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Sportive Dragon can also learn Ice and  Pure moves.      Known by everyone as one of the calmest and most elegant dragons. A hero and example to many, he is respected and admired wherever he goes. Dont irritate him, because he can defeat you before you have time to react!

name: Brawny Dragon
description: The Brawny Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Brawny Dragon can also learn Dark and  Electric moves.      The Brawny Dragon is a show-off and loves to flaunt his skills. As long as this dragon is in the spotlight, he’s happy. The only thing that makes him angrier than losing is when another dragon takes his shine.

name: Slam Dragon
description: The Slam Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Slam Dragon can also learn Light and  Pure moves.      The Slam Dragon is a fighter, not a lover. This dangerous dragon is very combative and what he lacks in skill, he more than makes up for his physical aggression. His teammates like to use him when they’re losing and need a secret weapon.

name: Princess Dragon
description: The Princess Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Princess Dragon can also learn Nature and  Ice moves.      The Princess Dragon is one of the most beautiful creatures in Dragon City. Her long, blond hair dazzles everyone who looks at it. Youll fall in love with her!

name: Adventure Dragon
description: The Adventure Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Adventure Dragon can also learn Flame and  Light moves.      This is probably one of the most adventurous dragons on the flying islands! It is always hunting for ancient treasures, solving mysteries, and breaking curses. You’ll never be bored!

name: Cyborg Dragon
description: The Cyborg Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Cyborg Dragon can also learn Dark and  War moves.      Sent from the future, this cyborg has come to Dragon City to serve and protect it from villains. Half dragon, half machine, he has mighty strength.

name: Genie Dragon
description: The Genie Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Genie Dragon can also learn Light and  Pure moves.      If you’re looking to change your luck, look no further than the Genie Dragon. This mystic creature loves to make dreams come true. If you treat him well, your wish is his command.

name: Shaolin Dragon
description: The Shaolin Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Shaolin Dragon can also learn Flame and  War moves.      Shaolin kung fu is one of the oldest and most famous martial arts. This dragon is a Shaolin warrior from the Buddhist Temple on the Songshan Mountain and has exceptional martial art skills.

name: Sorcerer Dragon
description: The Sorcerer Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Sorcerer Dragon can also learn Dark and  War moves.      The Sorcerer Dragon only works for good, never for evil, and he can sense danger from miles away. Although he may seem rough around the edges, this powerful dragon uses his supernatural powers to protect and defend the helpless.

name: Hellgate Dragon
description: The Hellgate Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Hellgate Dragon can also learn Flame, Pure and  War moves.      Hellgate is a mischievous one. He makes dragons who are going to hell believe that if they bribe him, they can avoid the fires, but after accepting their gifts, he throws them in with no mercy anyway!

name: Albino Dragon
description: The Albino Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Albino Dragon can also learn Nature and  Light moves.      The Albino Dragon is a rare creature in Dragon City. Hes the only dragon with no skin color, and when hes angry, he shines so bright that he can blind his enemies. When this happens, he doesnt waste the chance to give them what they deserve.

name: Apache Dragon
description: The Apache Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Apache Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      A friend of peace. Fearless and honorable. The Apache dragon might seem like an unfriendly warrior at first, but he follows a code of honor, which makes him memorable and a valuable ally.

name: Sheriff Dragon
description: The Sheriff Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Sheriff Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      This dragon is always looking out for the welfare of others. Defender of the helpless, this tireless avenger always has troublemakers in his sights.

name: Mozart Dragon
description: The Mozart Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Mozart Dragon can also learn Ice and  Metal moves.      His musical notes sweeten the ear of everyone in Dragon City. A master like no other with a gift that makes him unique in his kind.

name: Detective Dragon
description: The Detective Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Detective Dragon can also learn Sea and  Dark moves.      When night falls and darkness descends upon the weak, the Detective Dragon will get to the bottom of things. This creature is the best at solving mysteries.

name: Astronaut Dragon
description: The Astronaut Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Astronaut Dragon can also learn Metal and  Light moves.      The first dragon on the moon. He is a living Dragon City legend. It takes supernatural efforts to go as far as he went. Not any dragon can do it.

name: Scientific Dragon
description: The Scientific Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Scientific Dragon can also learn Electric and  Pure moves.      With a super high IQ, Scientific Dragon dedicates his life to researching and solving the everyday problems of all dragons. Hes a lot tougher than he looks!

name: Nocturnal Dragon
description: The Nocturnal Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Nocturnal Dragon can also learn Metal and  War moves.      The Nocturnal Dragon does not care for praise or worship. Nor does he seek them. He simply enjoys watching from the night sky, where he is protected by the shadows.

name: Dragoonie Dragon
description: The Dragoonie Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra.       Dragoonie powah

name: Longhorn Dragon
description: The Longhorn Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Longhorn Dragon can also learn Nature and  Pure moves.      The Longhorn Dragon is a machine capable of crushing everything in his path. He uses his great horn and size to defend himself from the attacks of other dragons.

name: Explosive Dragon
description: The Explosive Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Explosive Dragon can also learn Metal and  Pure moves.      The Explosive Dragon has a burning fire inside that is always on the verge of exploding. He is a bold, fierce, and unpredictable dragon capable of wreaking havoc.

name: Necro Dragon
description: The Necro Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Necro Dragon can also learn Terra and  Metal moves.      Because of his appearance, the Necro Dragon doesnt have much success with breeding in Dragon City. Once a handsome dragon, the use of black magic twisted his appearance to resemble that of an undead dragon.

name: Allure Dragon
description: The Allure Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Allure Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      The Allure Dragon evokes all kinds of feelings in his wake. The female dragons go crazy for him, and he makes other dragons envious because of his attractive appearance.

name: Sad Dragon
description: The Sad Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Sad Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Sad Dragon is always sad! Surprise Party? Sad. New Island? Sad. Tomato Menu? Sad. We dont know what makes him happy!

name: Spiky Dragon
description: The Spiky Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Spiky Dragon can also learn Pure moves.      He was born in a hostile territory, the Dragon City mountains. It is not easy to survive up there, but for the Spiky Dragon, it is a piece of cake. With that massive spine armor and those jaws, who would dare to mess with him?

name: Amber Dragon
description: The Amber Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Beauty. The Amber Dragon can also learn Soul moves.      This dragon can only be obtained through breeding in the Ancient World!This peaceful, honey-colored dragon is one of the most respected members in the community. Other dragons come to him for advice because he is unbelievably wise.

name: Krait Dragon
description: The Krait Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Krait Dragon can also learn Pure moves.      The Krait Dragon was cast out of Krait society because he felt differently about the Krait way of life than the other dragons.

name: Golem Dragon
description: The Golem Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Golem Dragon can also learn Pure moves.      Golem arrives in Dragon City alone, disoriented, and overwhelmed. Sensing the fears and desires of those around him, he must keep himself from being drawn in, or he risks revealing his nature.

name: Ragnor Dragon
description: The Ragnor Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Ragnor Dragon can also learn Pure moves.      The Ragnor Dragon is a snake that can move quickly in the mountain terrain where he lives. He can inflict real pain with his tail of fire.

name: Copy Dragon
description: The Copy Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame.       Copy

name: Adamantium Dragon
description: The Adamantium Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Adamantium Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      The metal alloy he’s made of is indestructible. His long, flexible body allows him to trap all his rivals at once. Everyone knows there’s no way out of an adamantium knot!

name: Citadel Dragon
description: The Citadel Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Citadel Dragon can also learn Light moves.      Deus has entrusted the citys security to him, and it’s a task he is completely devoted to. He will proudly become the royal guard of your island. Strangers shall not pass while Citadel Dragon is in charge.

name: Boss Dragon
description: The Boss Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Boss Dragon can also learn War moves.      He’s the patriarch of a dynasty of dragons and controls the black market of Food and Gold. The authorities of Dragon City tried to catch him for years but have all died in suspicious circumstances, so to be safe, stay out of his way! Capeesh?

name: Rem Dragon
description: The Rem Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Rem Dragon can also learn Dark and  Pure moves.      The Rem Dragon has a special power: he can see into the thoughts of others when they sleep. At night hes wide awake, studying them and planning the best way to use their fears against them in battle.

name: Frost Dragon
description: The Frost Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Frost Dragon can also learn Ice and  Dark moves.      This majestic creature was born and raised high up in the mountains. His combination of thick fur and feathers has allowed him to survive the cold. He’s also an astute warrior - great to have by your side in battle!

name: Christreen Dragon
description: The Christreen Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Christreen Dragon can also learn Terra and  Light moves.      Because the Christreen Dragon looks so much like a fir tree, it makes him want to bring the same joy that these trees do at Christmas time. When the holidays arrive, he puts on shiny decorations and sails the skies. People make wishes when they see him!

name: Mistletoe Dragon
description: The Mistletoe Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Mistletoe Dragon can also learn Sea and  Ice moves.      The Mistletoe Dragon has only been to the city once. The fact that all the lovers kissed as he walked past made him pretty sad! He went back to the woods, feeling lonely, and now he only comes out for battle.

name: Motherly Dragon
description: The Motherly Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Motherly Dragon can also learn Pure moves.      A mother will always be there for her babies. She can forgive them for spitting fire at each other and stealing food from the farms. Having them back home safe and sound is all that matters at the end of the day.

name: Prophet Dragon
description: The Prophet Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Chaos. The Prophet Dragon can also learn Dream moves.      This dragon can only be obtained through breeding in the Ancient World!The Prophet Dragon is contacted by supernatural powers, and he speaks for them. In Dragon City, he’s like an intermediary between Deus and the earthly dragons.

name: Flawless Dragon
description: The Flawless Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Beauty. The Flawless Dragon can also learn Dream moves.      This dragon can only be obtained through breeding in the Ancient World!She wakes up, flawless. Posts up, flawless. Flying around the place, flawless. Shining around the town, flawless. This dragon, flawless. My dragon, flawless.

name: Rudolph Dragon
description: The Rudolph Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Rudolph Dragon can also learn Light moves.      The Rudolph Dragon is in charge of protecting Santa Claus Village. His job is a very important one, because if he fails, kids won’t get their Christmas presents! The good news is that he’s never failed: winter storms won’t stop him!

name: Balloon Dragon
description: The Balloon Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Happy. The Balloon Dragon can also learn Dream moves.      This dragon can only be obtained through breeding in the Ancient World!This dragon swallowed a large amount of helium when he was little, which gave him a really squeaky roar and made him float around his habitat. Now he can’t come down!

name: Dreamcatcher Dragon
description: The Dreamcatcher Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dream. The Dreamcatcher Dragon can also learn Soul moves.      This dragon can only be obtained through breeding in the Ancient World!Dreamcatchers filter out all bad dreams and only allow good thoughts into our minds. That’s why the dragons that live close to the Dreamcatcher Dragon are immensely positive.

name: Bride Dragon
description: The Bride Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Beauty. The Bride Dragon can also learn Happy moves.      This dragon can only be obtained through breeding in the Ancient World!She hasn’t found the dragon of her dreams yet, but when she does, she will be by his side for better, for worse, for richer, for poorer, in sickness and in health, until death do they part.

name: Gurgle Dragon
description: The Gurgle Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Magic. The Gurgle Dragon can also learn Happy moves.      This dragon can only be obtained through breeding in the Ancient World!This affable creature enjoys being around children. They love to pop him and see how he puts himself together again. He also smells really good.

name: Naughty Dragon
description: The Naughty Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Chaos. The Naughty Dragon can also learn Happy moves.      This dragon can only be obtained through breeding in the Ancient World!The Naughty Dragon is two-faced. He spreads lies among his friends to turn them against each other, so don’t ever believe anything he says!

name: Underworld Dragon
description: The Underworld Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Chaos. The Underworld Dragon can also learn Soul moves.      This dragon can only be obtained through breeding in the Ancient World!Underneath the streets there’s a whole world. The Underworld Dragon is the king there. He knows the sewage system by heart and uses it to go out and capture followers for his kingdom.

name: Mermaid Dragon
description: The Mermaid Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Beauty. The Mermaid Dragon can also learn Magic moves.      This dragon can only be obtained through breeding in the Ancient World!She grew up under the protection of Poseadus, Baron of the Mermaids, but now she is strong and ready to fly by her own wings, or in this case, swim by her own tail.

name: Illusion Dragon
description: The Illusion Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Magic. The Illusion Dragon can also learn Dream moves.      This dragon can only be obtained through breeding in the Ancient World!Its hard to distinguish between real life and illusion when this dragon is around. As a good-natured experiment, he likes to fabricate visions inside the minds of others.

name: Chakra Dragon
description: The Chakra Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Magic. The Chakra Dragon can also learn Soul moves.      This dragon can only be obtained through breeding in the Ancient World!Chakras are the energy centers of our bodies and control our flow of energy. The Chakra Dragon is an expert at finding these centers and making all the positive energy flow.

name: Touchdown Dragon
description: The Touchdown Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Touchdown Dragon can also learn Flame and  War moves.      The Touchdown Dragon used to be picked on by everyone in high school, but one day he joined the football team. Since he was really good at it, he quickly became the quarterback. Now he’s really popular!

name: Clay Dragon
description: The Clay Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Clay Dragon can also learn Nature and  Sea moves.      Remember when you mixed clay of all the different colors and the result was always a brownish-bluish-purplish mess? The Clay Dragon doesn’t have this problem. He makes colors come together in a beautiful way.

name: Spring Dragon
description: The Spring Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Spring Dragon can also learn Terra and  Light moves.      When nature shows its brightest colors, this dragon comes out to play. She loves fresh grass - not only looking at it, but eating it, too.

name: Twin Dragon
description: The Twin Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Twin Dragon can also learn Ice and  Light moves.      Oh, brothers. They fight each other all the time, but when one has a problem, the other does his utmost to help his twin.

name: Celtic Dragon
description: The Celtic Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Celtic Dragon can also learn Nature and  Terra moves.      The Celtic tribal society disappeared centuries ago, but this dragon remains a vestige of it. Now it has come to Dragon City to represent the Celtic culture.

name: Aqualung Dragon
description: The Aqualung Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Aqualung Dragon can also learn Metal and  Sea moves.      Aqualung was born a Terra Dragon, so he wasn’t naturally prepared to live in the sea, but he wanted so badly to be a Sea Dragon that he bought a diving suit to be able to live as one.

name: Seafloor Dragon
description: The Seafloor Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Seafloor Dragon can also learn Sea and  Light moves.      Part dragon, part coral reef. This creature is home to all sorts of limpets, so if you fight against him in battle, you’ll have to face his marine organisms too… and they’re not willing to lose their home!

name: Depth Dragon
description: The Depth Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Depth Dragon can also learn War and  Metal moves.      When this dragon is a baby, it’s hard to distinguish him from a crab, but when he grows up, he becomes quite impressive! Look out for the pincers on his wings.

name: Atlantean Dragon
description: The Atlantean Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       The Atlantean Dragon is the proud guard of the Heart of Atlantis, a stone that contains all the secrets of Atlantis Island. While hes on duty, no one shall take the stone.

name: Venetian Dragon
description: The Venetian Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Venetian Dragon can also learn Sea and  Flame moves.      The Venetian Dragon’s logic tells him that his beautiful porcelain mask is anonymity, and anonymity is freedom to do whatever he wants without consequences! He never takes his mask off!

name: Samba Dragon
description: The Samba Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Samba Dragon can also learn Flame and  War moves.      You won’t find another dragon that can shake it like this! She can carry out lots of attacks, but the truly lethal thing about her is her samba dancing.

name: Eggster Dragon
description: The Eggster Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Eggster Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      The Eggster Dragon doesn’t want to grow up. He’s even refusing to leave the egg he was born from! He just wants to eat chocolate and play with the Bunny Dragon for the rest of his life.

name: Gingerbread Dragon
description: The Gingerbread Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Gingerbread Dragon can also learn Terra and  Light moves.      Deus baked the Gingerbread Dragon himself, and the result is delicious! He only has one flaw, though: He is terrified of milk!

name: Bunny Dragon
description: The Bunny Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Bunny Dragon can also learn Terra and  Pure moves.      Easter is the Bunny Dragon’s favorite holiday. Every year he wears his bunny costume and plays hide and seek with the Eggster Dragon. The problem is that when these two come together, they can be quite mischievous…

name: Chocolate Dragon
description: The Chocolate Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Chocolate Dragon can also learn Nature and  War moves.      When did chocolate become evil?! This dragon uses its deliciousness to attract his enemies and then blasts them with chocolate bullets.

name: Box Dragon
description: The Box Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Box Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      He was born inside a box, and it was so comfy, safe, and dark that he never felt like coming out. He hates when people open his side flaps to look inside. He has a bit of a temper...

name: Equinox Dragon
description: The Equinox Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Equinox Dragon can also learn Light moves.      The Equinox Dragon has a theory: Everyone has a dark side and a light side. The secret to happiness is balancing these two in the same way the equinox perfectly balances day and night.

name: Sakura Dragon
description: The Sakura Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Sakura Dragon can also learn Sea and  Terra moves.      Cherry blossoms represent ephemeral beauty. The Sakura Dragon is indeed beautiful, but his beauty, far from being evanescent, remains eternal.

name: Hope Dragon
description: The Hope Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       Hope is the dream of the soul awake. Hope is the last thing you lose. Bring hope into your life and the Hope Dragon into your island!

name: Shakespeare Dragon
description: The Shakespeare Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Shakespeare Dragon can also learn Dark and  Metal moves.      “To breed or not to breed, that is the question.”

name: Recycling Dragon
description: The Recycling Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Recycling Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      See how clean your islands look? You can thank the Recycling Dragon for that. It’s also thanks to him that all the food leftovers are reused as stuffing for beds!

name: Flesh Dragon
description: The Flesh Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Flesh Dragon can also learn Chaos moves.      This incredibly strong dragon has governed the Titan Island since he overthrew his own father. His ambition has exceeded all bounds and now he has no friends, only subjects.

name: Dainty Dragon
description: The Dainty Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Dainty Dragon can also learn Terra and  Nature moves.      Her beauty reminds us of her distant relatives, the unicorns. This dragon also has a very special characteristic: when wind goes through her lacelike wings, it sounds like perfectly tuned music.

name: Void Dragon
description: The Void Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Void Dragon can also learn Pure, Metal and  War moves.      Blocked ears? Thats probably because this dragon has appeared silently from a black hole by your side. Look around slowly, try not to get him upset… and then run!

name: Rorschach Dragon
description: The Rorschach Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Rorschach Dragon can also learn Nature and  War moves.      The same way baby dragons look for animals in the clouds when they look at the sky, adults like to find shapes in the Rorschach Dragon. What each of them sees says a lot about their personality.

name: Beholder Dragon
description: The Beholder Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Beholder Dragon can also learn Pure, Ice and  Dark moves.      The eyes tall over this dragon’s body are there to distract his enemies. His inner eye is enough to look into their deepest fears. When he does this, he usually sees himself.

name: Mana Dragon
description: The Mana Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Mana Dragon can also learn Electric and  Flame moves.      There are many sources of power, and one of them is this dragon. With his help, you can be invincible, but if he sees that you’re not using your powers for good, he will take it all away in seconds.

name: Soldier Dragon
description: The Soldier Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Soldier Dragon can also learn Flame and  Dark moves.      A committed defender of Dragon City. You’ll find him on guard at the city borders or escorting Deus at habitat inaugurations. He doesn’t know any magical dragon attacks, but hey, he has a rifle.

name: Firefighter Dragon
description: The Firefighter Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Firefighter Dragon can also learn Terra and  Metal moves.      Every Master who owns a decent number of dragons of the Flame element should always have a Firefighter Dragon around. He can put out any fire, magical or not, in seconds.

name: Rockfire Dragon
description: The Rockfire Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       On a cold night, a bandit assaulted a smithy. He was looking for valuables to steal when a beast appeared from inside the forge and scared him away. From that day, the beast has been known as the Rockfire Dragon.

name: Ocean Dragon
description: The Ocean Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Ocean Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      Despite being born and raised in the ocean, this dragon can’t actually swim, he just walks on the ocean floor. His fins are not big enough to lift such a massive creature!

name: Patriot Dragon
description: The Patriot Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Patriot Dragon can also learn Terra and  Flame moves.      Oh, say! Can you see by the dawn’s early light how this dragon can fly like he’s sailing the skies?

name: Orc Dragon
description: The Orc Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Orc Dragon can also learn War moves.      Forged during a cruel war raging in far-off lands, the Orc Dragon will fight with ferocity until the end of time.

name: Summer Dragon
description: The Summer Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Summer Dragon can also learn Nature and  Light moves.      This dragon loves swimming in the sea more than anything in this world! Hes usually happy and peaceful, but if you tread on a little kids sand castle, he will make you regret it.

name: Infamous Dragon
description: The Infamous Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Infamous Dragon can also learn Ice and  Dark moves.      The Infamous Dragon is a beast as dark on the inside as you can see he is on the outside. His heart is so cold that it chills his entire body. The iciest dragon of the Titan Island family!

name: Cyclops Dragon
description: The Cyclops Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Cyclops Dragon can also learn Flame and  War moves.      This creature is a blood relative of the Infamous Dragon and the Flesh Dragon. He’s an expert at forging and has provided lots of dragons with fine weapons. However, when it comes to his own battles, he prefers brute strength.

name: Car Dragon
description: The Car Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Car Dragon can also learn Sea and  War moves.      This dragon is a deadly partner in battle: a pet and a flying car in one! He can both give you a ride into battle and defeat all your enemies there.

name: Motorbike Dragon
description: The Motorbike Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Motorbike Dragon can also learn Flame and  War moves.      Get your dragon running and head out on the highway, looking for adventure and whatever comes your way!

name: Mace Dragon
description: The Mace Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Mace Dragon can also learn Metal and  Dark moves.      While Thor has his hammer, you have this dragon, which is actually much better. Not only can he strike with his tail, but he also has quite a bite!

name: Faust Dragon
description: The Faust Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Faust Dragon can also learn Light, Ice and  Dark moves.      Powerful and confident, some have nicknamed her “The Femme Fatale of Dragon City” because she can use her shiny blue eyes to drive her opponents so crazy that they attack themselves.

name: Sentence Dragon
description: The Sentence Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Sentence Dragon can also learn Dark, Metal and  Flame moves.      Citizens with clean criminal records don’t know this dragon, but those who have broken the law hide whenever they see him, for he’s the one who carries out all of Deus’ sentences.

name: Bigface Dragon
description: The Bigface Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Bigface Dragon can also learn Ice and  Metal moves.      When he was abducted, he got stuck in the UFO’s airlock. The suction was so strong that he began to swell, and by the time he got in, his face was irreversibly swollen. Now he’s known for this peculiarity.

name: Dragotron Dragon
description: The Dragotron Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       The latest alien experiment: a baby dragon transformed into a space robot - a robot so powerful that, when used for bad, could be destructive. Master him and use his power and technology for good!

name: Fur Dragon
description: The Fur Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Fur Dragon can also learn Flame and  War moves.      Aliens experiment with the dragons they abduct. On this occasion, they were trying to genetically modify a ball of wool and turn it into a living Space Dragon. The result was… furry.

name: Molluck Dragon
description: The Molluck Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Molluck Dragon can also learn Soul moves.      The twisted mind of this experimental project. He thinks that the future of all dragons is to become aliens, so he wants to include them in his genetic experiments and turn them into space creatures at any cost.

name: Cruel Dragon
description: The Cruel Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Cruel Dragon can also learn Chaos and  Dark moves.      In spite of being cowardly and tyrannical, this dragon thinks he’s the greatest king the world has ever seen. He causes lots of problems and has an unstable personality. Will you be able to master him?

name: Graduation Dragon
description: The Graduation Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Graduation Dragon can also learn Light and  Ice moves.      It’s been four years of hard studying at the prestigious Dragon U, but the day has finally arrived! He’s got a thousand memories, his graduation gown is on… and a great summer lies ahead!

name: Cow Dragon
description: The Cow Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Cow Dragon can also learn Metal and  Pure moves.      The farmers always suspected that she wasn’t a real cow: Her milk was spicy, and one fine day she grew wings! It was then that they decided to send her to Dragon City, where she would fit in better.

name: Pig Dragon
description: The Pig Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Pig Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      This pig is no Babe. It loves to torment the sheep and the other pigs. Even the farmer has been afraid of it ever since he saw it flying by his window under the light of a full moon.

name: Sheep Dragon
description: The Sheep Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Sheep Dragon can also learn Dark and  War moves.      Earthquakes happen when the Sheep Dragon bleats. Under all that lovely white wool, there’s a cold black heart. This is a very dangerous creature.

name: Chicken Dragon
description: The Chicken Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Chicken Dragon can also learn Nature and  Light moves.      In the past, he used to stir up all the hens in his farmyard, so the farmer kicked him out. Now that hes in Dragon City, you’ll have to handle him carefully if you don’t want him to start a revolution.

name: Impassible Dragon
description: The Impassible Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       This dragon is used to being the king wherever he goes. He doesn’t like anyone getting in his way or trying to outdo him. He will stop anyone from catching up to him, by fair means or foul

name: Spark Dragon
description: The Spark Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Spark Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      The Spark Dragon has the most energy in Dragon City. So much so that when something isn’t working right he’s the dragon to call. His energy is so ongoing he can trigger a restart for just about everything, makes him perfect for battles!

name: Chrome Dragon
description: The Chrome Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Chrome Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      His metal scales protect him from prying eyes. Other dragons can see their reflection on his scales. Some of them realized that they would rather not look into a mirror!

name: Iceberg Dragon
description: The Iceberg Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Iceberg Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      This dragon has a shell of ice that protects him from external threats and damage. He got his protective coating when a storm enveloped him with ice while he was sleeping.

name: Forestry Dragon
description: The Forestry Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Forestry Dragon can also learn Light moves.      The master of all forests. They say that when he falls in love, trees go into bloom. On the other hand, if you see this dragon next to a withered tree, you should really stay away.

name: Fairy Dragon
description: The Fairy Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Fairy Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      A dragon and a fairy made a pact to protect each others species. They asked Deus to create a sort of intermediary between the two species. Thats how this dragon was born.

name: Wave Dragon
description: The Wave Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Wave Dragon can also learn Electric and  Light moves.      When the seas churn and the wind howls, this dragon is at his happiest. He loves to dive from high clifftops down into the depths of the ocean.

name: Anubis Dragon
description: The Anubis Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Anubis Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      He used to accompany the ancient Egyptians through their first days of afterlife, just so they wouldnt be afraid. After 3000 years, he has decided to quit that job and devote his life to battle.

name: Supernova Dragon
description: The Supernova Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Supernova Dragon can also learn Dark and  Electric moves.      There are entire galaxies mapped out on this dragons skin. The positions of the little luminous dots move as the universe changes.

name: Fervor Dragon
description: The Fervor Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Fervor Dragon can also learn Pure, Flame and  Dark moves.      He has the temperament of a demon and the greatness of a god. Hes one of the leaders of the fire element.

name: Gravity Dragon
description: The Gravity Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Gravity Dragon can also learn Metal, Electric and  Light moves.      A prodigy of nature. He has a central magic that holds his body in balance. Gravity is his ally, and thanks to that, he’s never lost even one scale.

name: Petal Dragon
description: The Petal Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Petal Dragon can also learn Light and  Terra moves.      Counting the petals on her head won’t tell you if the one you love loves you back, but this dragons good for other things, like quests and breeding!

name: Amazone Dragon
description: The Amazone Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Amazone Dragon can also learn Dark and  Nature moves.      Like all Amazons, she was trained in agriculture, hunting, and the art of war; but it is her dragon nature that makes her the Amazon Queen, the strongest warrior of them all.

name: Sap Dragon
description: The Sap Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       This dragon is made entirely out of sap, so she’s a very good friend of all the Nature Dragons. When their skin feels a bit dry, they just rub themselves against the Sap Dragon and immediately feel better.

name: Nisse Dragon
description: The Nisse Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Nisse Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      This forest dragon is known as “The Bad Lad” because of his mischievous attitude and bad intentions. He loves guiding lost dragons to the dark part of the forest and abandoning them there.

name: Nazca Dragon
description: The Nazca Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Nazca Dragon can also learn Ice and  Sea moves.      She has a sweet look but takes advantage of all the travelers who dare to go through the forest. She doesnt let them continue with their journey unless they pay her.

name: Imp Dragon
description: The Imp Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       This mischievous dragon is always seeking attention, but his pranks can be a bit upsetting sometimes. In the end, hes just a lonely little creature who gets too bored.

name: Handy Dragon
description: The Handy Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Handy Dragon can also learn Flame and  Metal moves.      Broken statue? Handy Dragon’s there to fix it! Farm not working? Call the Handy Dragon! Leaky Sea Habitat? The Handy Dragon’s what you need!

name: Ifrit Dragon
description: The Ifrit Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Ifrit Dragon can also learn Terra and  Dark moves.      This criminal has spent his whole life in and out of prison. He started with common offenses, like stealing some tomatoes, but his latest felonies include setting fire to an entire city!

name: Kooky Dragon
description: The Kooky Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Kooky Dragon can also learn Dark and  War moves.      No one wants to be a subject in this scientists experiments, so he tries his mad inventions on himself. Sometimes the results are great and sometimes… well, he ends up creating creepy hybrids.

name: Immortal Dragon
description: The Immortal Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       Rumor has it that when it was this dragon’s turn to die, he refused to cross The Styx; instead, he stole Charon’s boat and used it to sail back to the world of the living.

name: Heat Dragon
description: The Heat Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Heat Dragon can also learn Metal and  Flame moves.      When this dragon is angry and plotting his revenge, the temperature goes up. Believe us, you do not want to feel the heat of his fury.

name: Valiant Dragon
description: The Valiant Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Valiant Dragon can also learn Light, Metal and  War moves.      This hero belongs to an old world, far away in both time and space, where only the strongest survived. Imagine how mighty this dragon must be: He’s made it to our time and to our world!

name: Barley Dragon
description: The Barley Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Barley Dragon can also learn Terra and  Light moves.      Fresh and foamy and filled to the brim with happiness, this mischievous creature loves parties and music festivals but also enjoys a quiet day under the sun.

name: Homerun Dragon
description: The Homerun Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Homerun Dragon can also learn Electric and  Light moves.      He hits it high, he hits it deep, and it goes straight past center field! The ball is outta here! It’s a home run, his seventh one this season! The Dragon City Champions tie the game.

name: Frostbite Dragon
description: The Frostbite Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Frostbite Dragon can also learn Ice and  Dark moves.      It’s hard to battle in winter! Fire Dragons have trouble sparking their flames, Nature Dragons feel too sick to fight… Thankfully, this beast could fight even in the North Pole without shivering once.

name: Retired Dragon
description: The Retired Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Retired Dragon can also learn War and  Pure moves.      After decades of rearing young dragons for epic battles, the Retired Dragon has decided that he’s ready to explore the multiverse. He wants to do it alone, but no matter where he wanders, there will always be a dragon there to help him along the way.

name: Cyber Dragon
description: The Cyber Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Cyber Dragon can also learn Metal and  Electric moves.      The Cyber Dragon was never meant to see outside laboratory walls. Built as a test dragon for tech researchers, this robotic beast had enough poking and prodding and has since escaped the cold lab to develop not only a mind of its own but extreme curiosity.

name: Spartan Dragon
description: The Spartan Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Spartan Dragon can also learn Terra and  War moves.      Dragons, prepare for glory. This tireless warrior has arrived to lead your troops to victory. Because this… is… Dragon City!

name: Evil Dragon
description: The Evil Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Evil Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Born wicked, the Evil Dragon certainly lives up to his name. This dark dragon is known for harassing other dragons, causing them to live in fear. He couldn’t be good even if he tried.

name: Energy Dragon
description: The Energy Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Energy Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      This dragon concentrates so much energy that he’s like a walking big bang. He can create entire galaxies just by breathing. Impressive!

name: Dejavu Dragon
description: The Dejavu Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Dejavu Dragon can also learn Electric and  War moves.      Every time a new creature arrives to the island, the DéjàVu Dragon goes: “Heyyy, haven’t we met before?” He can be a bit confusing.

name: Wonder Dragon
description: The Wonder Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Wonder Dragon can also learn Pure and  Electric moves.      One of the most curious dragons. The Wonder Dragon is a great observer of his surroundings. He also has the most unexpected reactions to surprising events, like chuckling when someone sneezes!

name: Asier Dragon
description: The Asier Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       This dragon is a true fighter, a Dragon City hero. All the other dragons love him and know how great he is. Asier, youre our champion!

name: Amerindian Dragon
description: The Amerindian Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Amerindian Dragon can also learn Terra and  Pure moves.      He is a great warrior but also a spiritual leader. He encourages all the other dragons to love and protect the land that Mother Nature has given them.

name: Boreal Dragon
description: The Boreal Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Boreal Dragon can also learn Dark and  Light moves.      This dragon can be found in Norway between the end of fall and the beginning of spring. He emerges to dance with the spirits whenever the northern lights are bright.

name: Obscure Dragon
description: The Obscure Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Obscure Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Heres a real creature of the night - hard to see and also hard to catch. When this dragon is about to get caught, he spits out a cloud of dense purple smoke and uses it to make his getaway.

name: Barebone Dragon
description: The Barebone Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Barebone Dragon can also learn Flame and  Dark moves.      If your mom always tells you not to play with the bad boys, stay away from this dragon. However, if you’re looking for trouble, he will gladly become your partner in crime.

name: Yokai Dragon
description: The Yokai Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Yokai Dragon can also learn Light and  Electric moves.      Fighting a dragon is scary. Fighting a dragon and its ghostly double? Absolutely terrifying!

name: Ranger Dragon
description: The Ranger Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       The Ranger Dragon used to be scared of everything until one day he challenged himself to be braver. Now his bravery has turned into a full-time calling. This courageous dragon keeps the deserts of Dragon City safe and protected.

name: Bloody Dragon
description: The Bloody Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Bloody Dragon can also learn Dark and  Sea moves.      This dragon lives alone by a lake. He drowned in it long ago, but now hes alive again and furious that no one had saved him. He will kill anyone who comes into his territory.

name: Bushido Dragon
description: The Bushido Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Bushido Dragon can also learn Dark, War and  Pure moves.      The violent existence of this samurai is tempered by wisdom and serenity. Honor, courage, and respect are three indispensable values for him.

name: Crest Dragon
description: The Crest Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Crest Dragon can also learn Terra and  Nature moves.      His hair’s his crowning glory. He grooms it carefully to make sure it stands straight up. All the ladies just love that punk touch!

name: Bonfire Dragon
description: The Bonfire Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Bonfire Dragon can also learn Terra and  Nature moves.      Wood is supposed to burn to ashes when it’s on fire so… why doesn’t this wooden dragon burn to the ground? It’s magic!

name: Snail Dragon
description: The Snail Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Snail Dragon can also learn Nature and  Flame moves.      He’s slow but steady. In spite of being called “slug” by many disrespectful creatures, the Snail Dragon has the most positive, can-do attitude.

name: Mantis Dragon
description: The Mantis Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Mantis Dragon can also learn Nature and  Sea moves.      Why Deus decided it was a good idea to breed a Plant Dragon with a common mantis, no one knows… But the result is a happy creature who likes to help all the dragons that live in gardens!

name: Sand Dragon
description: The Sand Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Sand Dragon can also learn Terra and  Light moves.      If you want to find this dragon, you don’t need to look for him, you just need to follow the sand trail he leaves behind. He is a bit clumsy, but everybody loves him.

name: Bohemian Dragon
description: The Bohemian Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       The Bohemian Dragon lives inside a tree in her habitat, where she plays her music and writes her novels. Shes not very sociable, but when you get to know her, shes really nice.

name: Dual Dragon
description: The Dual Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       Two personalities, two ways of seeing the world. This dragon’s good side is very nice but also a bit insecure, so it lets the bad, confident side speak for the both of them.

name: Demigod Dragon
description: The Demigod Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Demigod Dragon can also learn War and  Light moves.      Entire cities have fallen at his feet. In the Middle Ages, this dragon was feared but also worshipped because whoever he favored in a war would win. Add him to your team and he will make you king.

name: Turkey Dragon
description: The Turkey Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Turkey Dragon can also learn Electric and  Terra moves.      The most important thing you need to know is that Turkey Dragons are not edible. We repeat: not edible! A man ate a roast Turkey Dragon once, and let’s just say he felt heartburn in the most literal sense.

name: Rocket Dragon
description: The Rocket Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Rocket Dragon can also learn Metal and  Ice moves.      Pure cybernetic fury. This dragon was designed by human minds, but they made it so perfect that it became self-sufficient and flew away from them and went straight to Dragon City.

name: Bark Dragon
description: The Bark Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Bark Dragon can also learn Nature and  Ice moves.      This dragon is the perfect example of integration with nature. His skin is made entirely of bark and instead of blood, sap runs through his veins.

name: Fate Dragon
description: The Fate Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       The ritual he follows for his predictions is quite impressive: He covers his eyes with his stole and lets the words flow. He’s so mystical that it is hard to decipher what he says.

name: Voltage Dragon
description: The Voltage Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Voltage Dragon can also learn Pure and  Light moves.      This dragons habitat is a high-risk area, mainly on stormy days. Hes dangerous to have around even for Deus - he makes his hair stand up. High voltage!

name: Wispy Dragon
description: The Wispy Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Wispy Dragon can also learn Light and  Ice moves.      This beautiful dragon arrives quietly, but when he leaves, you know he’s been around because of the trail of refreshing mist left in his wake.

name: Doctor Dragon
description: The Doctor Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Doctor Dragon can also learn Terra and  Light moves.      Before you even ask, the answer is yes: Dragon doctors’ handwriting is just as bad as human doctors’; but apart from that, theyre really helpful after Quests and League battles.

name: Grinchy Dragon
description: The Grinchy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Grinchy Dragon can also learn Dark and  Nature moves.      This creature absolutely loathes Christmas and everything related to it, so every year he tries to ruin the holidays for everyone. Sometimes he even succeeds. He’s great at making family members fight.

name: Yeti Dragon
description: The Yeti Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Yeti Dragon can also learn Sea and  War moves.      Everyone fears this dragon, so he’s used to a lonely existence. He doesn’t know how to socialize or make friends, but the truth is that under all that gray fur, there’s a warm heart.

name: Avalon Dragon
description: The Avalon Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       This creature is like the personal guard to the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse: he ensures that Conquest, War, Famine, and Death are spread across the world. Owning him assures victory, even against the Horsemen.

name: Wolfreeze Dragon
description: The Wolfreeze Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Wolfreeze Dragon can also learn Pure and  Dark moves.      This dragon can be found in the most arid parts of Antarctica. He enjoys the isolation and will attack anyone who comes close to his territory just to keep it that way.

name: Solstice Dragon
description: The Solstice Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Solstice Dragon can also learn Light moves.      This dragon can only be found on the longest night of the year, when the winter solstice takes place. So if you find one, persuade him to come with you! You’ll only get one opportunity per year!

name: Firewolf Dragon
description: The Firewolf Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Firewolf Dragon can also learn Dark and  Flame moves.      For most dragons, it would be a nightmare to live anywhere near the sun, but this one has actually built a house on the sun itself. His home has one of the best views in the entire universe.

name: Ignition Dragon
description: The Ignition Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Ignition Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      A swipe from the Ignition Dragon is hard to recover from. This creature’s claws are made of sharp metal, but what makes them lethal is that they can also burn. Just thinking about them can hurt your skin.

name: Nightmare Dragon
description: The Nightmare Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Nightmare Dragon can also learn Flame and  Metal moves.      Deus once had a nightmare that seemed so real his imagination merged with his power and this dragon was created.

name: Meditation Dragon
description: The Meditation Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Meditation Dragon can also learn Light and  Pure moves.      He spends most of his time in a trance. He seems harmless, but the truth is that meditation helps him to have spectacular control over his powers.

name: Asian Dragon
description: The Asian Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Asian Dragon can also learn Light and  Metal moves.      As the guardian of all ancient traditions and an expert in martial arts, she is treated with the highest respect and admiration in her homeland. Be wary of her darts!

name: Sunrise Dragon
description: The Sunrise Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Sunrise Dragon can also learn Terra and  Electric moves.      It is said that this dragon carries the sun on his back. The truth, however, is that the ball of light that orbits him is just a sphere so dazzling that it can be easily mistaken for our closest star.

name: Otoroshi Dragon
description: The Otoroshi Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Otoroshi Dragon can also learn Dark and  Sea moves.      A crawling demon is a creepy thing, but a crawling demon dragon is creepy and dangerous! Be alert when youre walking, as treading on an Otoroshi Dragon’s tail would be fatal!

name: Nobunaga Dragon
description: The Nobunaga Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       With his supreme battle skills, two arms would be more than enough for this dragon - but he has four arms… and two swords, making him all but invincible!

name: Tackle Dragon
description: The Tackle Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Tackle Dragon can also learn Electric and  War moves.      The Tackle Dragon is a sports superstar. He used to be a team mascot, but he learned so much from watching the game that one day he started playing for his team... and hes awesome!

name: Dancing Dragon
description: The Dancing Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Dancing Dragon can also learn Dark and  Terra moves.      Life is one giant musical for the Dancing Dragon. She’s always prancing around Dragon City singing at the top of her lungs. It doesn’t stop there, sometimes she forces the other dragons to wear costumes and do choreographed dances with her.

name: Diva Dragon
description: The Diva Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Diva Dragon can also learn Metal and  Sea moves.      The Diva Dragon is known for her diva-ish ways and her ever-changing look. She’s particular and likes things to be just right. If her tomatoes aren’t firm enough or her habitat isn’t at the right temperature, she’ll be the first to complain.

name: Vain Dragon
description: The Vain Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Vain Dragon can also learn Light and  Dark moves.      Fans of the Vain Dragon can’t get enough of him, and he can’t get enough of himself. No matter where he is, even in battle, every moment is a selfie moment, and he can’t resist the camera.

name: Demolition Dragon
description: The Demolition Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Demolition Dragon can also learn War and  Electric moves.      The Demolition Dragon is highly feared and can’t have nice things. This reckless dragon is wild and free and destroys everything she comes in contact with, including other dragons in battle.

name: Enigmatic Dragon
description: The Enigmatic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Enigmatic Dragon can also learn Pure, Metal and  Ice moves.      For centuries, kings from all over the world have traveled to Dragon City to try to steal a few of the Enigmatical Dragon’s crystals for their crowns, but they end up bowing down before him and begging for his protection.

name: Leaf Dragon
description: The Leaf Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Leaf Dragon can also learn Terra and  Pure moves.      The largest land mammal on Earth, the African elephant, weighs up to eight tons. The Leaf Dragon, on the other hand, is one of the lightest creatures and can move with even the slightest breeze.

name: Padron Dragon
description: The Padron Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Padron Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      One of the biggest threats to biodiversity and ecosystems is where and how we produce food. The Padron Dragon is here to alert the world about this!

name: Symbiotic Dragon
description: The Symbiotic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Symbiotic Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      Fresh water provides water for drinking, sanitation, agriculture, transport, electricity generation and recreation. It is also a major habitat for species such as the Symbiotic Dragon.

name: Sustainable Dragon
description: The Sustainable Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Sustainable Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      By making small changes in the way we eat or use energy, we can begin to ease the pressure on our natural resources. This is the message that the Sustainable Dragon wants to convey.

name: Tiamat Dragon
description: The Tiamat Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Tiamat Dragon can also learn Flame and  Electric moves.      Three heads, three personalities. The fire head is always furious and looking for a fight, the electric head loves to shock everyone, and the head in the middle just wants a normal life - but with the other two, it’s impossible!

name: Macha Dragon
description: The Macha Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Macha Dragon can also learn Nature and  Pure moves.      This friendly dragon is said to bring luck to her habitat mates, so everyone in Dragon City is always inviting her to live at their habitat!

name: Squid Dragon
description: The Squid Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Squid Dragon can also learn Nature and  Electric moves.      The Squid Dragon is the captain of the Ghost Ship. His duty is to carry the souls of those who perished in the sea from this world to the next.

name: Kraken Dragon
description: The Kraken Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Kraken Dragon can also learn Pure, Dark and  Ice moves.      Pirates claim to be free souls that obey no rules, but they are secretly ruled by the Kraken Dragon, a giant creature who can sink all their ships and riches in seconds if they don’t accept his rule.

name: Captain Dragon
description: The Captain Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Captain Dragon can also learn Metal and  War moves.      The dragon pirate ship is a crazy place, especially when the Captain Dragon is around. He loves having his crew fight each other just for his entertainment. All he needs to say is: “Show time!”, and the battles start.

name: Highborn Dragon
description: The Highborn Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Highborn Dragon can also learn Light, Electric and  Flame moves.      This noble dragon commands an army of eagles that watches over the entire dragon world. He takes a lot of pride in his duty!

name: Joke Dragon
description: The Joke Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Joke Dragon can also learn Light and  Flame moves.      What sound do you hear when dragons eat spicy salsa? The fire alarm!

name: Nessy Dragon
description: The Nessy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Nessy Dragon can also learn Sea, Ice and  Nature moves.      The Nessy Dragon gets bored if you keep him in his habitat all the time. Hes such a fast swimmer, and all he wants to do is show off in front of his rivals. He also loves a good battle!

name: Magma Dragon
description: The Magma Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Magma Dragon can also learn Flame, Metal and  Dark moves.      A mother dragon was flying over a volcano, when the egg she was carrying slipped through her claws. She thought shed lost her son forever, but she hadnt - her baby rose from the crater wrapped in magma, unstoppable.

name: Frozebeast Dragon
description: The Frozebeast Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Frozebeast Dragon can also learn Ice, Electric and  Dark moves.      Some mischievous souls love the heat, so hell could be a nice vacation for them. To make sure they don’t have too much fun, they’re sent to the cold branch of hell, where they are monitored by FrozeBeast.

name: Ozone Dragon
description: The Ozone Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Ozone Dragon can also learn Nature and  Terra moves.      This dragon is essential for the ecosystem of Dragon City! She keeps the air clean and protects the islands whenever the Sun Dragon shines a bit too much.

name: Glitter Dragon
description: The Glitter Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Glitter Dragon can also learn Electric, Light and  War moves.      All that glitters here is gold. This dragon played a decisive role in Dragon War I, so the king of his country had a gold suit of armor made for him so that everyone would know that he was a golden warrior.

name: Intraterrestrial Dragon
description: The Intraterrestrial Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Intraterrestrial Dragon can also learn Terra and  Dark moves.      The Intraterrestrial Dragon is one of the very few creatures that can survive on every layer of the Earth. Having spent most of his life investigating on his own has made him weird among the weird, as you can see.

name: Firefrog Dragon
description: The Firefrog Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Firefrog Dragon can also learn Nature and  Flame moves.      This dragon comes from the Earth’s inner core and, as you can see, creatures are a bit different there! The Firefrog Dragon is a rare and fascinating beast that will look great in your collection.

name: Choleric Dragon
description: The Choleric Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Choleric Dragon can also learn Dark and  Metal moves.      This is the dragon version of an armored tank: tough and steady, only more dangerous. Be careful with his spiky tail!

name: Reaper Dragon
description: The Reaper Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Reaper Dragon can also learn Ice, Electric and  Dark moves.      Many have seen the Reaper Dragon, but none have been able to tell us what it was like. The moment they saw him coming, they knew their time was up.

name: Bear Dragon
description: The Bear Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Bear Dragon can also learn Light and  Sea moves.      The Bear Dragon hibernates for 7 months every year and can be a bit lazy at times, but when he’s active, his strength and resistance make him a great partner in battle.

name: Panther Dragon
description: The Panther Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Panther Dragon can also learn Dark and  Light moves.      Panther Dragons are extremely rare and very few people have seen one, but those who have describe these creatures as quick and strong. They are also known to be stealthy hunters.

name: Snake Dragon
description: The Snake Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Snake Dragon can also learn Dark and  Metal moves.      This is quite a unique snake. Unlike the rest of his kind, he’s not very cunning. All he does is insult other jungle animals and hide behind the protection of stronger allies.

name: Tiger Dragon
description: The Tiger Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Tiger Dragon can also learn Terra and  Flame moves.      This feline dragon is one of the most respected creatures in the jungle. Regular tigers are very intelligent, have a great memory, and are very quick - this one is all that, plus she can fly!

name: Sunlight Dragon
description: The Sunlight Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Sunlight Dragon can also learn Metal and  Electric moves.      Sunlight Dragon’s skin has special light-absorbing cells which allow him to store lots of sunrays and shine brightly when the sun is gone. He’s also nice to have around when it’s cold… so warm!

name: Banana Dragon
description: The Banana Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Banana Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      The Banana Dragon looks harmless, but he’s actually really dangerous! He can attack you in all sorts of ways: his deadliest strategy is leaving his skin on the floor so that you slip and fall!

name: Wacky Dragon
description: The Wacky Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Wacky Dragon can also learn Ice and  Metal moves.      The Wacky Dragon used to be very serious, but then one day an attack he performed went wrong. Instead of hitting his opponent, it hit him! He went completely crazy, but at least hes pretty funny now!

name: Holi Dragon
description: The Holi Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Holi Dragon can also learn Ice and  Electric moves.      The Holi Dragon symbolizes the victory of good over evil. It has a very nice attitude towards life: play and laugh, forget and forgive. Celebrate the good things that happen!

name: Timetravel Dragon
description: The Timetravel Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       One of the most brilliant creations of the Dragon City labs. Magic, science and technology have come together to create a dragon that can travel back and forth through time!

name: Vanoss Dragon
description: The Vanoss Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Vanoss Dragon can also learn Dark, Metal and  Flame moves.      The Vanoss Dragon likes games, darts, hanging out with his friends, and above all… Knawledge. He also has a signature joke: “What do you call a magic owl? Hoodini!”

name: Crazy Dragon
description: The Crazy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Crazy Dragon can also learn Light, Ice and  Terra moves.      The Crazy Dragon might be mysterious, but he’s real serious. He’s also imperious and will leave you real curious. His name is the Crazy Dragon… won’t you like his videos?

name: Glowppy Dragon
description: The Glowppy Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Glowppy Dragon can also learn Flame and  Electric moves.      On a joyful summer night, fireworks lit up the sky. A spark reached a baby dragon and set his wings on fire. That fire never went out! Glowppy brings good feelings to everyone around him.

name: Caribbean Dragon
description: The Caribbean Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Caribbean Dragon can also learn Nature and  Pure moves.      This dragon lives by the coral reefs of the Caribbean Sea. He shares his space with thousands of tropical fish. He’s friendly to all sea creatures, but sometimes he does enjoy a grilled crab or two.

name: Drainbow Dragon
description: The Drainbow Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Drainbow Dragon can also learn Light moves.      This dragon was born under the rainbow of Rainbow Island, right here in Dragon City! Being a Dragon City native, not only does he have the protection of Deus, but also the support of Speedy & Greedy, the resource guardians.

name: Archer Dragon
description: The Archer Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Archer Dragon can also learn Ice and  Dark moves.      A technological twist to traditional archery: This dragon can produce laser arrows on his back and then shoot them with his tail. He never runs out!

name: Runner Dragon
description: The Runner Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Runner Dragon can also learn Light, Pure and  Terra moves.      This guy is as fast as a dragon gets: He can travel across all of Dragon City in less than a minute! He loves a good competition, even though nobody can really compete at his level.

name: Fencing Dragon
description: The Fencing Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Fencing Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      The Fencing Dragon is steady but agile. When you see him approaching you with caution, you would never imagine that he could swing his sword and defeat you in seconds. Be on guard!

name: Liquid Dragon
description: The Liquid Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Liquid Dragon can also learn Pure, War and  Ice moves.      This creature is flexible and resistant, but dont keep him too close to the Sun Dragon if you dont want him to dry up! "Be liquid, my friend!"

name: Dragasand Dragon
description: The Dragasand Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Dragasand Dragon can also learn Light, Metal and  Terra moves.      Dragasand is a truly robust creature! Dont be afraid to send him on the hardest survival missions, since he can traverse the longest deserts without a single drop of water.

name: Friendship Dragon
description: The Friendship Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Friendship Dragon can also learn Flame and  Metal moves.      This dragon really is the best friend you could have. When you’re sad, he will lift your spirits, and when you’re happy, he’ll be happy, too! If you don’t believe us, just look at his little yellow friend, who’s held onto him for years!

name: Airboss Dragon
description: The Airboss Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Airboss Dragon can also learn Nature and  Electric moves.      The Airboss Dragon has taken flying to the next level. He designed his own wings that allow him to go faster and further than anyone else. The boss of the sky has landed on Dragon City!

name: Rune Dragon
description: The Rune Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Rune Dragon can also learn Light, Pure and  War moves.      History keeps secrets from us, secrets that very few people and creatures know. The answers to these are written all over the Rune Dragons body, but to discover them, youll have to master him and learn to read the signs.

name: Brainy Dragon
description: The Brainy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       The Brainy Dragon may be tiny, but his plans are big! He’s capable of ruling the entire universe through sheer intelligence alone. Be prepared to join his galactic army or suffer!

name: Martian Dragon
description: The Martian Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Martian Dragon can also learn Electric and  Pure moves.      If you have never seen a dragon from Mars before, now you have! Martian Dragons are smart and friendly, but sometimes they have trouble understanding earthly habits, so try to be patient with them.

name: Hero Dragon
description: The Hero Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Hero Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      With a noble heart and a sword forged with bravery, the Hero Dragon has arrived to impose justice upon Dragon City.

name: Froyo Dragon
description: The Froyo Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Froyo Dragon can also learn Ice and  Metal moves.      He may look creamy and delicious, but do your best to resist the temptation: if you try to steal a scoop, you will suffer the consequences!

name: Draost Dragon
description: The Draost Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Draost Dragon can also learn Metal, War and  Nature moves.      A hand-picked student of Hanzo, the Guardian Dragon, Draost came to be a fearsome and skilled warrior. In return for his training, Draost swore eternal loyalty and service to his master.

name: Unicorn Dragon
description: The Unicorn Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Unicorn Dragon can also learn Pure and  Electric moves.      Just like a rainbow! This creature has magical properties that can cure lots of illnesses that no other treatment can. It also smells like cotton candy.

name: Rideable Dragon
description: The Rideable Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Rideable Dragon can also learn Ice and  Electric moves.      He used to be part of a carousel, but he hated that life, going around in circles all day, every day. One day he decided to escape and became a free dragon!

name: Terrifying Dragon
description: The Terrifying Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Terrifying Dragon can also learn Dark, Metal and  Electric moves.      Ready for a ride? Hop on the Terrifying Dragon, but only if you arent afraid of fire, intense speed, and the high probability of being devoured by one of his heads.

name: Night Dragon
description: The Night Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Night Dragon can also learn Terra and  Nature moves.      The Night Dragon not only provokes fear, but also disgust. Hes like a giant bat, so he can always be found lurking in dark, dusty corners.

name: Wolfish Dragon
description: The Wolfish Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Wolfish Dragon can also learn Electric and  Ice moves.      Wolfish Dragons are the official guards of the Lord of the Seas. They are loyal to their master and will mercilessly destroy all his enemies.

name: Toad Dragon
description: The Toad Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Toad Dragon can also learn Sea and  Pure moves.      You can find the Toad Dragon at nightfall bouncing from stone to stone. You won’t get much conversation out of him, since he is unsocial and bad-tempered. He tends to play dead when approached by fearsome dragons.

name: Nightglow Dragon
