description: The Nightglow Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Nightglow Dragon can also learn Pure, Flame and  Light moves.      Nothing glows in the dark like the fiery embers from the Nightglow Dragon. Use this loyal creature to lead your dragon army through the darkness, knowing with certainty that he will protect his master against the terrors of the night at any cost.

name: Goblin Dragon
description: The Goblin Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Goblin Dragon can also learn Dark and  Nature moves.      Safeguard your pumpkins - the sneaky Goblin Dragon is on the prowl! Hes obsessed with stealing as many pumpkins as possible from peoples yards, so naturally Halloween is the time of year he loves the most.

name: Hercules Dragon
description: The Hercules Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Hercules Dragon can also learn Nature and  Metal moves.      As one of the Star Warrior Dragons, the Hercules Dragon is fearless and unyielding in battle. Where others see enemies, he sees only vermin that he can effortlessly dispatch.

name: Moonlight Dragon
description: The Moonlight Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Moonlight Dragon can also learn Pure and  Dark moves.      Dragons are more sensitive to moonlight than other creatures. This one in particular spent a whole night staring at a full moon and became possessed by it. Now he directs the moons energy onto Dragon City.

name: Dracula Dragon
description: The Dracula Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Dracula Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      The king of the underworld doesnt like to be upstaged. If you were to try to steal the Throne of Bats from him, you would most likely fail and suspiciously disappear forever.

name: Vampiress Dragon
description: The Vampiress Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Vampiress Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      Antonya was an out-of-control dragon who used to destroy entire cities in Romania, but when she was about to vent her fury upon Transylvania, the Dracula Dragon made her a vampiress. Now she is cold-blooded and calm, but more evil than ever.

name: Werewolf Dragon
description: The Werewolf Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Werewolf Dragon can also learn War, Dark and  Metal moves.      Every full moon, this dragon needs to be chained down and watched by several guards. If he broke free, he would be able to destroy all of Dragon City in only a couple of hours.

name: Millennial Dragon
description: The Millennial Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Millennial Dragon can also learn Dark and  Pure moves.      The Millennial Dragon is the coolest of cool. This tech-savvy dragon never leaves home without his phone, has all the latest and greatest gear, and is the king of selfies.

name: Poisonous Dragon
description: The Poisonous Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Poisonous Dragon can also learn Nature, War and  Dark moves.      The Poisonous Dragon is a danger to all those around him. He doesnt even need to attack his enemies to make them turn green and fall flat on the floor. His toxic breath gets the job done!

name: Drace Dragon
description: The Drace Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Drace Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      This dragon has a special affection for the Ice Island. His armor and sword are entirely devoted to the protection of Broodby, the guardian of quick hatching.

name: Mwahaha Dragon
description: The Mwahaha Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Mwahaha Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      His evil laugh is feared throughout all of Dragon City. The Mwahaha Dragon has a twisted brain and plays dirty, so don’t ever trust him! Oh, and if you hear him laughing… run!

name: Lightspeed Dragon
description: The Lightspeed Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       This dragon was born with amazing speed, but after learning about the speed of light, he decided he still wasnt fast enough. So he achieved this speed and gained the name of Lightspeed Dragon!

name: Massif Dragon
description: The Massif Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Massif Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      This lonely creature lives in the mountains of Dragon City, away from all the noise and laughter always present on the floating islands. Dont feel sorry for him though - thats the way he likes to live.

name: Icewind Dragon
description: The Icewind Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Icewind Dragon can also learn Sea and  Electric moves.      The cold winter brings lots of dragons down from the mountains and onto flat land, but out of all of them, the Icewind Dragon draws the most attention; no one can move as gracefully in the snowy sky.

name: Penumbra Dragon
description: The Penumbra Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       This dragon can be found in the dark areas of the jungle where he reigns over all the animals that live there. To show off his power, the Penumbra Dragon lights up the energy he harbors within.

name: Drathic Dragon
description: The Drathic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       The tower in the Gothic Island hides secret breeding recipes that only Phaun has access to. This dragon protects all those secrets from curious eyes.

name: Scarecrow Dragon
description: The Scarecrow Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Scarecrow Dragon can also learn War and  Terra moves.      Crows are not the only ones to get freaked out by this dragon’s bad temper. He likes to have his personal space, but if you want to bug him a little, then follow the trail of straw to find him!

name: Dorothy Dragon
description: The Dorothy Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Dorothy Dragon can also learn Electric and  Light moves.      You never know where the Yellow Brick Road will take you, but if you’re willing to find out, grab your ruby slippers and call the Dorothy Dragon. She’ll be your partner in adventure!

name: Cowardly Dragon
description: The Cowardly Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Cowardly Dragon can also learn Dark and  Nature moves.      The Cowardly Dragon had a really tough childhood: all the other dragons called him a coward. But then one day he built himself those impressive wings and his confidence soared. Now he’s a hero!

name: Witch Dragon
description: The Witch Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Witch Dragon can also learn War and  Terra moves.      The Witch Dragon will walk into your life offering treats and compliments, but don’t trust her! When you least expect it, she will show her true self and take everything away from you, including your very soul.

name: Valentine Dragon
description: The Valentine Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       Valentine loves chocolate, long walks along the beach, starry nights, and candlelit dinners. If someone special is there… even better!

name: Conquest Dragon
description: The Conquest Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Conquest Dragon can also learn Metal and  Terra moves.      Just when it seemed there was no hope for the dragon race, the Conquest Dragon appeared. This magnificent creature has come to reconquer the world from evil with light and justice.

name: Warfare Dragon
description: The Warfare Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Warfare Dragon can also learn War and  Flame moves.      In an apocalyptic world, the Warfare Dragon still stands. With a legacy of hundreds of kingdoms destroyed, you’ll have to trust him when he says he has no master.

name: Hunger Dragon
description: The Hunger Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Hunger Dragon can also learn Pure moves.      When you see this dragon coming, you’ll know the apocalypse is here. He brings nothing good, only hunger and despair.

name: Deathly Dragon
description: The Deathly Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Deathly Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      All dragons know that when this dragon approaches them, their time has come. Deploy him on the battlefield to see how his presence alone makes your enemies shiver.

name: Tornado Dragon
description: The Tornado Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Tornado Dragon can also learn War and  Nature moves.      A terrible tornado was destroying Dragon City when a very special master called Sean summoned a pure force of nature: The Tornado Dragon. With great power and skill, this creature got the situation under control and saved the city. All thanks to Master Sean!

name: Kong Dragon
description: The Kong Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Kong Dragon can also learn Dark and  Nature moves.      The Kong Dragon lived on a peaceful island. When a Dragon Master discovered this island, he captured Kong and took him to the big city, where he planned to put him on exhibit. However, the dragon wreaked havoc across the city and escaped back to his island.

name: Geist Dragon
description: The Geist Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Geist Dragon can also learn Dark, Flame and  Terra moves.      Once there was an evil dragon who was defeated by the forces of Light. When he died, his spirit inhabited an empty egg. As his spirit grew stronger, he summoned even more spirits. Now he has the power of four dragons and is ready to conquer everything.

name: Beauty Dragon
description: The Beauty Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Beauty Dragon can also learn Nature and  Terra moves.      The Beauty Dragon is very independent. She tends to find herself in trouble, but she doesn’t need anyone to rescue her. There’s no problem she can’t overcome by herself.

name: Furious Dragon
description: The Furious Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Furious Dragon can also learn Nature and  Dark moves.      Everyone thinks the Furious Dragon is furious because he’s a massive beast filled with tons of rage. But it’s because he lives a life of isolation and is a bit lonely. Other dragons are afraid to be his friend but he’s a real softy inside.

name: Demonic Dragon
description: The Demonic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Demonic Dragon can also learn Flame and  War moves.      The devil longed for a friend, so he plucked a flame out of the pits of hell and breathed life into it. Out of the fire rose the Demonic Dragon, blazing in his radiant glory.

name: Freezox Dragon
description: The Freezox Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Freezox Dragon can also learn Dark and  Electric moves.      This futuristic dragon has managed to use ice in a smart yet lethal way. His wings are made out of sharpened stalactites that never melt, because he generates cold that circulates from inside his chest to the rest of his body.

name: Pyrex Dragon
description: The Pyrex Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Pyrex Dragon can also learn Flame and  Electric moves.      Space + fire! What more could you want? The Pyrex Dragon goes to the sun to charge his core with solar energy and then comes back to Dragon City supersonically fast!

name: Voltaix Dragon
description: The Voltaix Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Voltaix Dragon can also learn Electric and  Terra moves.      A thousand volts surround the golden armor of this powerful dragon. In year 2056, the Voltaix Dragon is one of the top fighters in Dragon City. He has come from the future to learn what he considers ancient techniques.

name: Poisonux Dragon
description: The Poisonux Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       Todays poison is nothing compared to poison from the future, and thats where this dragon comes from! One spit of poison from the Poisonux Dragon is enough to corrode and destroy an entire building.

name: Teacher Dragon
description: The Teacher Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Teacher Dragon can also learn Nature and  Light moves.      This dragon is respected and loved by the inhabitants of Dragon City. He taught math, geography, and poetry to all of them. He is also very strict: No mischief in his presence!

name: Seducing Dragon
description: The Seducing Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Seducing Dragon can also learn Dark and  Metal moves.      The Seducing Dragon is highly manipulative and on a mission control the minds of others. She uses her beauty and dark powers to infatuate weak minds and get what she wants.

name: W2s Dragon
description: The W2s Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The W2s Dragon can also learn War and  Flame moves.      This cool kid likes playing soccer and having fun with his friends. He likes to record his adventures and share them with other dragons. Anything to make them laugh!

name: Callux Dragon
description: The Callux Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Callux Dragon can also learn Dark and  Electric moves.      The Callux Dragon likes to be challenged. The crazier the challenge, the more he wants to do it! If theres an audience watching, even better!

name: Challenge Dragon
description: The Challenge Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Challenge Dragon can also learn Dark and  War moves.      The Challenge Dragon is very competitive, always wants to be number one, and takes everything too seriously. He will challenge any dragon: any time, any place. He doesn’t do it for fun either, he does it to win.

name: Scheme Dragon
description: The Scheme Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Scheme Dragon can also learn Pure and  Light moves.      If you ask the Scheme Dragon how he became one of Dragon City’s best players, he’ll tell you it was hard work and practice. However, this dragon is known for finding ways to get opponents’ strategies and using it against them.

name: Archaic Dragon
description: The Archaic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Archaic Dragon can also learn Terra, Nature and  Flame moves.      There was once an almighty dragon who ruled over an entire nation. When he got old, instead of dying, he turned to stone. In this way, he made himself eternal. For some centuries, he rested on the ground, but now his power has reawakened and he’s alive!

name: Machinery Dragon
description: The Machinery Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Machinery Dragon can also learn Dark, War and  Pure moves.      The Machinery Dragon was built inside the Dragon City Factory from bits and pieces of artifacts. He was supposed to be just a little fun experiment but came out a fully functioning creature.

name: Electrostatic Dragon
description: The Electrostatic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Electrostatic Dragon can also learn Electric, Light and  War moves.      Shockingly, the Electrostatic Dragon is more than just pure brawn - he’s also got brain. He harnesses the power of a thousand lightning bolts to deploy strategic attacks on his opponents. Don’t fly any kites when this guy takes to the skies!

name: Succuby Dragon
description: The Succuby Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Succuby Dragon can also learn Nature and  Pure moves.      When the Succuby Dragon isn’t shooting her fire-tipped arrows at miserable souls just to watch them suffer, she likes experimenting with new hairstyles and shopping for jewels to decorate her bow.

name: Glutty Dragon
description: The Glutty Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Glutty Dragon can also learn Dark and  Flame moves.      The Glutty Dragon wants to take down his boss, the Satanny Dragon, so he can claim hell as his own and ultimately, rule the entire world. But all those plans will have to wait until he’s finished his steak-devouring tour.

name: Cerbery Dragon
description: The Cerbery Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Cerbery Dragon can also learn Flame and  Terra moves.      This ferocious beast guards the gates of hell. He makes sure all the condemned souls never escape the fires of purgatory… unless you bribe him with milk and cookies – give him some of that, and sure, you can go out for a stroll!

name: Satanny Dragon
description: The Satanny Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Satanny Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      The Satanny Dragon will stop at nothing until all of hell submits to his will, but to make this diabolical plan a reality, he needs the help of his bodyguards: Succuby, Glutty, and Cerbery... If only they weren’t so distracted by steak, sugar, and shiny objects!

name: Betrayer Dragon
description: The Betrayer Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Betrayer Dragon can also learn War, Light and  Nature moves.      The Betrayer Dragon is on top of the world, but to get up there, he had to step on many of his competitors… and on many of his friends as well. Now he’s lonely, but the fear he evokes in others is all he needs to keep going.

name: Draek Dragon
description: The Draek Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Draek Dragon can also learn Dark and  Terra moves.      The Draek Dragon was born for battle. He is ferocious and entirely devoted to winning. That’s why he doesn’t get along that well with the Drato Dragon, whom he considers a distraction for the team.

name: Mongrel Dragon
description: The Mongrel Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Mongrel Dragon can also learn Metal and  Pure moves.      This dragon used to be a pet in a pirate ship, but one day he decided to conquer his own ship and become a captain! He keeps his crew well fed with the best bananas, and he can jump from ship to ship to steal gold from other pirates. He’s the best!

name: Viktor Dragon
description: The Viktor Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Viktor Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      A heartbreaker, a lover, an expert in the breeding mountain, a specialist of breeding events, and a creator of magnificent and exotic dragons! The Viktor Dragon knows breeding like no other.

name: Hoodini Dragon
description: The Hoodini Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Hoodini Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      The Hoodini Dragon is an expert in card attacks! No idea what a card attack is? Well… he just throws a deck of cards in his opponents face and runs away in the middle of the confusion. Not quite the fighter, this Hoodini Dragon.

name: Silly Dragon
description: The Silly Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Silly Dragon can also learn Metal and  Flame moves.      Half T-rex and half dragon, the Silly Dragon is much stronger than he looks. Underneath the funny faces and corny one-liners, theres a lean, mean fighting machine. Try him out and youll have a roaring good time!

name: Hound Dragon
description: The Hound Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Hound Dragon can also learn War, Metal and  Electric moves.      Not all dragons need to fly in order to hunt. The Hound Dragon uses the luminescent light on his head to lure in his enemies - and then finish them off with one bite.

name: Maori Dragon
description: The Maori Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Maori Dragon can also learn War, Sea and  Ice moves.      Kia ora! The Maori Dragon summons the powers of old to represent his tribe in battle. A fierce and proud warrior, he is no stranger to island life!

name: Franky Dragon
description: The Franky Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       After his first diabolical experiment escaped from his lab, Dr. Frank began to devise a new monster, a necrodragon so terrifying that its enemies would drop dead in fright. But will this one break through its chains as well?

name: Drato Dragon
description: The Drato Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Drato Dragon can also learn Nature and  Metal moves.      Drato is very clumsy most of the time. He can get easily distracted by his favorite thing in the world: Food. However, the truth is that he’s tremendously powerful, and when Draek pushes him hard enough, he can deliver earth-shattering attacks.

name: Sandcastle Dragon
description: The Sandcastle Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Sandcastle Dragon can also learn Sea and  Dark moves.      Sun, sand, and endless summer! The Sandcastle Dragon and his trusty pet crab, Clacky, loved life on the beach - but they longed for more. Now theyre on an adventure to the big city, and they cant wait to face every challenge along the way!

name: Nineties Dragon
description: The Nineties Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Nineties Dragon can also learn Electric and  Sea moves.      The Nineties Dragon is lively and energetic. When this spunky creature isn’t teaching others the proper technique to step aerobics or getting dragons’ muscles pumped, she’s watching Saturday morning cartoons and singing pop songs.

name: Useful Dragon
description: The Useful Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Useful Dragon can also learn Sea and  Pure moves.      There’s nothing this dragon can’t do! From fixing your kitchen sink to battling the largest dragons, and not to mention cleaning habitats from top to bottom, he can accomplish it all! If you ever need help, he’s the dragon to call.

name: Childish Dragon
description: The Childish Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Childish Dragon can also learn Pure, Electric and  Nature moves.      The Childish Dragon brings lots of joy to Dragon City. This youthful creature has a heart of gold and a vivid imagination. She likes to imagine multiverses full of wonder and her creativity is her best aid in battles.

name: Arzur Dragon
description: The Arzur Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Arzur Dragon can also learn Metal, Light and  Nature moves.      Noble, vigorous, handsome… and irritable like no other. The Arzur Dragon is capable of saving the world, but he’s always in such a bad mood that he’s more likely to set it on fire instead.

name: Dragem Dragon
description: The Dragem Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Dragem Dragon can also learn Ice and  Terra moves.      The Legends of Deus can always trust the Dragem Dragon. He’s the brains of the team and always makes the best decisions, even in critical situations. He even manages to hold back the Draek Dragon’s ferocious instincts.

name: Ra Dragon
description: The Ra Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Ra Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      When the Ra Dragon was just a hatchling, he snatched the sun from the sky and made it his plaything. As he has grown, so has his kingdom of worshippers. His blessing can bestow tremendous wisdom and strength - just ask the Sphynx Dragon!

name: Viktoria Dragon
description: The Viktoria Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Viktoria Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      The Viktor Dragon has found his better half: the Viktoria Dragon! Only she can match Viktor’s level of expertise in breeding events.

name: Dwelling Dragon
description: The Dwelling Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Dwelling Dragon can also learn Ice, Terra and  Metal moves.      Rivals tend to underestimate the Dwelling Dragon because of his lack of eyes, but he is as dangerous as any dragon can get. His sixth sense, his strategic skills and his strength have made him a true champion.

name: Draluxe Dragon
description: The Draluxe Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Draluxe Dragon can also learn Metal and  Flame moves.      The Draluxe Dragon is the heart and soul of the Legends of Deus. Her energy and friendliness keeps the group together. She does have a slight addiction for shiny things, though, so keep your Gold close when she’s around.

name: Berserk Dragon
description: The Berserk Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Berserk Dragon can also learn Flame and  Terra moves.      Fire and fury are no strangers to the Berserk Dragon. It is said that he was caged in a dungeon for many years, but he built up so much rage that he was able to tear down the walls with a roar and no one dared to stop him ever again.

name: Wilderbeast Dragon
description: The Wilderbeast Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Wilderbeast Dragon can also learn Metal and  Ice moves.      After fighting for Odin in an epic battle, the Wilderbeast Dragon was awarded the ability to take frozen spikes from his back and throw them with extraordinary precision right into the heart of his opponents.

name: Charging Dragon
description: The Charging Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Charging Dragon can also learn Electric and  Sea moves.      The Charging Dragons ferocity led the Vikings to victory so, as payment, they gave him one of their ships. He cant use it to sail given his size, but he likes to wear it as a suit of armor!

name: Norse Dragon
description: The Norse Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend.       A Norwegian smith sculpted him out of a big steel block while Magni, the Norse god of strength, also son of Thor, guided his gouge. That kind of makes this dragon Thor’s grandson! Isn’t that cool? He is respected by the whole community.

name: Chubby Dragon
description: The Chubby Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Chubby Dragon can also learn Sea and  Light moves.      Six pack abs? I don’t think so! The Chubby Dragon prefers to have six packs of bacon a week! He may not be the the healthiest creature around, but he sure is the happiest.

name: Hayabusa Dragon
description: The Hayabusa Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Hayabusa Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      The speed of the Hayabusa Dragon when he attacks can only be compared to that of a falcon diving onto its next victim. Simply flawless!

name: Experimental Dragon
description: The Experimental Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Experimental Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      This dragon is made from Cells of different creatures. Neither his looks or his acts make much sense, but what can you expect from a creation by Dragon Citys Wacky Lab?

name: Dracon Dragon
description: The Dracon Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Dracon Dragon can also learn Light, Electric and  War moves.      Only a legend can lead a group of legends! Dracon has the energy of Draluxe, the muscle of Draek, the heart of Drato and the brains of Dragem. It would be impossible to find a better representative for the Legends of Deus!

name: Headstrong Dragon
description: The Headstrong Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Headstrong Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      When Headstrong Dragon has a mission, he is unstoppable. Obstacles are nothing but opportunities to conquer them. Success may not be immediate, but he is unyielding in its pursuit. He may fall, but he always gets up.

name: Wingspan Dragon
description: The Wingspan Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Wingspan Dragon can also learn Electric and  Nature moves.      This little, impish dragon appears when you least expect it.  With wings three times the size of its body and colors that blend in, it moves so swiftly that if you blink, you miss it.  Mischievous but usually friendly.

name: Tailwind Dragon
description: The Tailwind Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Tailwind Dragon can also learn Ice and  Nature moves.      Good-natured and even funny, this dragon can lighten up the mood even in darkest situation. When everything seems lost, it can help you look at the bright side. And there is always a bright side!

name: Ironheart Dragon
description: The Ironheart Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Ironheart Dragon can also learn Metal and  Flame moves.      The extraordinary powers of this legendary dragon combine the hardness of metal and the potency and resilience of a beating heart, confusing its enemies who hardly have the weapons to fight such an unusual creature.

name: Fiend Dragon
description: The Fiend Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Fiend Dragon can also learn Electric, Metal and  Ice moves.      The Fiend Dragon is an evil-minded creature whose red and yellow features should warn you to run away. A merciless savage, his malevolent mind constantly engaged in some wretched plan to destroy everything around him.

name: Dreamy Dragon
description: The Dreamy Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Dreamy Dragon can also learn Light and  Dark moves.      The Dreamy Dragon is the protector of good dreams, gracefully moving through the night and using the three dreamcatchers adorning her beautiful head to snare your nightmares so you can peacefully restore your life energy.

name: Blade Dragon
description: The Blade Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Blade Dragon can also learn Metal and  War moves.      One of the most dangerous dragons, the Blade Dragon is ruthless and cutthroat when he strikes, although his giant blades can make his movements seem clumsy. He loves honing its fighting skills by mowing down his enemies.

name: Flora Dragon
description: The Flora Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Flora Dragon can also learn Terra and  Nature moves.      When this beauty leaves the forest, she spreads happiness, good luck and hope all around her. The Flora Dragon’s charm makes her irresistible, even to the most hard-hearted. She never has trouble getting what she wants.

name: Stinger Dragon
description: The Stinger Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Stinger Dragon can also learn War and  Electric moves.      A seriously destructive creature, the Stinger Dragon moves at breakneck speed, creating violent whirling winds and lightning all around him. In battle, his coiled body is extremely efficient, swiftly encircling his enemies and making it impossible to anticipate his blows.

name: Elephant Dragon
description: The Elephant Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Elephant Dragon can also learn Dark, Nature and  Sea moves.      A natural-born ruler, his wisdom and military might equal his strength. Don’t be fooled by his minimal armor and weaponry: he doesn’t need much. And be careful because, for better or for worse, he never forgets a face.

name: Striking Dragon
description: The Striking Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Striking Dragon can also learn Light, Nature and  Sea moves.      Striking Dragon is strikingly beautiful! His colorful, elegant figure immediately catches your eye. But what hides behind this beauty that flies like a butterfly but stings like a bee? Destruction for those who fail to see beyond the surface and consider it easy prey.

name: Power Dragon
description: The Power Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Power Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      This winged arachnid, a rarity in itself, combines the strength, speed and powers of a spider, making it able to quickly detect and anticipate his enemies’ next move and, through acrobatic leaps, entangle them in a poisonous web and merciless destroy them.

name: Atomic Dragon
description: The Atomic Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Atomic Dragon can also learn Electric and  Ice moves.      The destructive force of the Atomic Dragon is no idle threat. Harnessing the power of a hydrogen atom, once unleashed, there will be deadly consequences. Just take a look at his fuel-injected, muscular body, and you will grasp his ability to disintegrate his enemies.

name: Mighty Dragon
description: The Mighty Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Mighty Dragon can also learn Metal and  War moves.      The Mighty Dragon is a true powerhouse. His molecular structure, stronger than any known metal, makes him virtually indestructible. Harnessing his limitless stamina and vast kinetic energy, the Mighty Dragon can effortlessly deliver the most potent, efficient strikes.

name: Mastery Dragon
description: The Mastery Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Mastery Dragon can also learn Flame, Sea and  Terra moves.      The Mastery Dragon is an inspiration for other dragons as he has the intellect and mental and physical prowess to easily exercise command over his rivals, whom he always treats with respect, even after defeating them in the battlefield.  His courage and fairness are unparalleled.

name: Defender Dragon
description: The Defender Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Defender Dragon can also learn Light, War and  Nature moves.      If there is a dragon you want on your side, that is the Defender Dragon. Not only has he perfected the art of defense, his lightning-sharp mind and serpent-like body are prepared to go after anyone who disturbs his peace. Treat him fairly, and your enemies will become his own.

name: Infinity Dragon
description: The Infinity Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Infinity Dragon can also learn Light, Dark and  Flame moves.      The Infinity Dragon is the brainchild of a mathematician applying Moebius strip equations to real life. This dragon can twist his body in the strangest ways, giving it complete spatial control. When it encircles his enemies, they quickly lose track of where it begins and where it ends.

name: Hunter Dragon
description: The Hunter Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Hunter Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      The Hunter Dragon has the cunning and stealth required of all good hunters but multiplied times three. Defeating him requires extraordinary powers. Easily camouflaged and aided by great eyesight, he waits for the exact time to attack. After all, three pairs of eyes see better that one.

name: Blizzking Dragon
description: The Blizzking Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Blizzking Dragon can also learn Ice, Metal and  Electric moves.      The Blizzking Dragon is an imposing royal purple creature that can deliver a blizzard of ice-blue damage when provoked by his inferiors. His dagger-like features have been whetted in battle, where he has been jabbing, lacerating, and slicing anyone who dares to challenge his power.

name: Spiderknight Dragon
description: The Spiderknight Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Spiderknight Dragon can also learn Metal and  Dark moves.      After a long and arduous training, the Spiderknight Dragon has become a true role model for others of his kind. His armor may not be shiny, but he outshines others on the battlefield, expertly handling his sword and always demonstrating his sense of justice and mercy.

name: Conjurer Dragon
description: The Conjurer Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Conjurer Dragon can also learn Terra and  Dark moves.      The Conjurer Dragon is a master in the practice of magical arts and summoning the occult spirits to his side when he needs a little help from his friends. He uses spells and charms to weaken and confuse his victims. Watch out; he always has a trick up his sleeve to take advantage of others.

name: Pigheaded Dragon
description: The Pigheaded Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Pigheaded Dragon can also learn Nature and  Dark moves.      The Pigheaded Dragon is an obstinate one. He thinks he is always right and is unable to change his mind or his course of action, even when reality hits slaps him on the face. Granted, he is not the smartest of the bunch, but his muscles make up for what he lacks in brains.

name: Pursuer Dragon
description: The Pursuer Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Pursuer Dragon can also learn Electric, Sea and  Metal moves.      This dragon lady is mysterious and seductive. She uses her feminine wiles to exploit her enemies’ weaknesses. Beware of this powerful vamp who can entice her adversaries and lead them to destruction by just fluttering her eyelashes.

name: Skull Dragon
description: The Skull Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Skull Dragon can also learn Dark and  War moves.      Meeting this hooded dragon can send chills down your spine. The Skull Dragon is an eerie creature haunting the battlefield with the awful clanking and screeching sounds of his chains. Not many can withstand the madness of his stare and his otherworldly powers.

name: Iceling Dragon
description: The Iceling Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Iceling Dragon can also learn Dark, Ice and  Sea moves.      At a young age, the Iceling Dragon decided to leave his frozen home in search for adventure beyond the emptiness and silence of the ice fields. Although he has always lived in isolation and is self-trained, he has enough confidence to freeze any hot-headed adversary on its tracks.

name: Frightening Dragon
description: The Frightening Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Frightening Dragon can also learn Light, Metal and  Ice moves.      Exiled from his homeland early in life, the Frightening Dragon has been looking for new comrades for a long time. Unfortunately, this hair-raising creature loves to startle others by appearing out of nowhere, shocking and intimidating any potential pals.

name: Pungent Dragon
description: The Pungent Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Pungent Dragon can also learn Dark, Flame and  Metal moves.      This would certainly be an insipid world without the Pungent Dragon’s provocative presence, which anyone can smell way before he even shows up. This gruff smart-aleck manages to irritate even the most peaceful souls, which explains why he is constantly engaged in conflict.

name: Elusive Dragon
description: The Elusive Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Elusive Dragon can also learn Light, Dark and  Nature moves.      There is a vigilant creature in the shadows of the forest, seeing everything without being seen, and that is the Elusive Dragon. His moves are unpredictable and his presence ephemeral, but peaceful coexistence is guaranteed by this magnanimous dragon.

name: Goofy Dragon
description: The Goofy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Goofy Dragon can also learn Light, Electric and  Nature moves.      The Goofy Dragon is a playful creature that always manages to add comic relief to any serious confrontation. His antic shenanigans can make even the most solemn fall over with laughter. He is living proof that laughter is a powerful weapon.

name: Bjorn Dragon
description: The Bjorn Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Bjorn Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      The Bjorn Dragon was brought into the Terra Arena as a young cub and has since made it his home. He has eschewed the bells and whistles of other arenas, keeping it austere and akin to his rugged nature. Nothing more appropriate as the scene of the brutal combats held in it.

name: Katsumoto Dragon
description: The Katsumoto Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Katsumoto Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      When the Katsumoto Dragon was born, he was so hot that he scorched everything around him. That’s why is confined to the Flame Arena, feeding on fire from the surrounding volcanos that erupt when he is enraged. We have seen the end of many who dared step into this cauldron.

name: Lancelot Dragon
description: The Lancelot Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Lancelot Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      The Lancelot Dragon is the rock star of dragons, and his noble feats, some of which are the stuff of legend, have earned him a devoted fan base. His reputation extends far and wide, but when challenged, the clear streams of the Sea Arena aren’t enough to cool off his rage.

name: Fury Dragon
description: The Fury Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Fury Dragon can also learn Electric and  Sea moves.      The Fury Dragon is not deliberately evil, but he was born with a mission to defend what is moral and right, and that includes crushing anyone capable of turning his lush, beautiful world into a dust bowl. At the Nature Arena,  will face off the wicked and guilty without pity.

name: Ironscales Dragon
description: The Ironscales Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Ironscales Dragon can also learn Dark and  Light moves.      The Ironscales Dragon was so ugly that everyone used to pick on him, until a blacksmith took pity and gifted him with an iron armor to hide his looks and protect him from constant aggravation. At the Metal Arena, his rivals get a taste of the sour character of his early days.

name: Kyuubi Dragon
description: The Kyuubi Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Kyuubi Dragon can also learn Light and  Electric moves.      The Kyuubi Dragon is a very alluring and mysterious creature. He used to be an invisible spirit, but even with a body his presence is hard to spot. He moves stealthily and, like a spy, he is great at hiding and disguising himself. His enemies won’t even know what hit them until it is too late.

name: Gladiator Dragon
description: The Gladiator Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Gladiator Dragon can also learn War and  Metal moves.      The Gladiator Dragon was a war prisoner who earned his freedom fighting in the arenas. After his release, he earned the emperors respect and helped him conquer new lands. Each red feather on his helmet stands for a defeated enemy.

name: Augmented Dragon
description: The Augmented Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Augmented Dragon can also learn Metal and  Electric moves.      The Augmented Dragon’s body was completely burned in battle, but he was such a great warrior that military scientists decided to save his life by integrating technology into his damaged body. Now, his abilities are much enhanced and exceed those of his opponents.

name: Aquaking Dragon
description: The Aquaking Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Aquaking Dragon can also learn Metal and  Sea moves.      The Aquaking Dragon escaped from Atlantis just before it was destroyed. He can never be too far from water because he is at risk of dying by dehydration. He has the power to summon tsunamis and floods and drown his enemies.

name: Vigilante Dragon
description: The Vigilante Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Vigilante Dragon can also learn Dark, Metal and  War moves.      The Vigilante Dragon has made it his mission to fight crime and injustice, usually after dark. To do so, he relies not only on his superior intelligence, but also on keeping in peak physical condition and training vigorously. He is a brooding character who does not suffer fools lightly.

name: Vulpine Dragon
description: The Vulpine Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Vulpine Dragon can also learn Electric, Pure and  Ice moves.      The Vulpine Dragon was first spotted in the permanent frozen regions but has lately been seen in warmer areas. He is a peculiar creature, perhaps the offspring of two other dragons. Sly like a fox, with the powerful claws of a raptor and the sinewy body and mesmerizing eyes of a snake.

name: Luminaire Dragon
description: The Luminaire Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Luminaire Dragon can also learn Light and  Electric moves.      The Luminaire Dragon is a benevolent little creature who has a very clear mission: showing others the way out of the darkness. He can illuminate your path out of a dark cave or forest, but he can also shed light on a difficult situation and help you identify your true friends and real enemies.

name: Clarity Dragon
description: The Clarity Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Clarity Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      The Clarity Dragon is an expert at discerning good from evil. He and the Reason Dragon are closely bonded but bicker like an old married couple. Clarity finds Reason slow and lacking in imagination, while Reason puts Clarity down for hastily jumping to conclusions without proof.

name: Yin Dragon
description: The Yin Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Yin Dragon can also learn Dark, Ice and  Terra moves.      The Yin Dragon is from the north, where it is dark and cold, which explains its cantankerous nature. He and Yang Dragon complement each other and are most successful acting in tandem. When one’s power is down, the other’s is up. Some even suspect that they are one and the same.

name: Yang Dragon
description: The Yang Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Yang Dragon can also learn Light, Flame and  Nature moves.      The Yang Dragon is from the south, where it is sunny and warm, and he has a happy disposition. He and Yin Dragon do best when they team up and combine their strengths and weaknesses, which are a perfect match. Rumor has it that they are twins raised in different environments.

name: Origin Dragon
description: The Origin Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Origin Dragon can also learn Light, Electric and  Soul moves.      The Origin Dragon emerged from the primordial soup, where matter and energy combined to create all essential elements. His chromosomal make up is encoded with Clarity, Reason, Virtue, Empathy and Loyalty, making him perfect and powerful enough to enable the magic of breeding.

name: Bull Dragon
description: The Bull Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Bull Dragon can also learn Terra, Dark and  Pure moves.      Starting out life as an unusually large, browny baby, the Bull Dragon was used for sparring by older dragons, until he grew so powerful that they could no longer abuse him. Unfortunately, for them, he never forgets a face, and he is so obstinate that he will find them and make them pay.

name: Reason Dragon
description: The Reason Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Reason Dragon can also learn Flame and  War moves.      The Reason Dragon’s life mission is trying to make sense of things, verifying the facts and following strict logic because he knows bad reasoning can be fatal. He is obsessed with proof and loves to argue, especially with the Clarity Dragon. When these two meet, no one else can get a word in.

name: Virtue Dragon
description: The Virtue Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Virtue Dragon can also learn Nature, Sea and  Ice moves.      The Virtue Dragon sets the ethical standards for other dragons. His rightful authority is based on benevolence, protection of the weak, responsibility and self-control. He is never involved in anything petty, mean, or dodgy, but if he ever needs help, he relies on his pal, the Reason Dragon.

name: Empathy Dragon
description: The Empathy Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Empathy Dragon can also learn Electric, Light and  Dark moves.      The Empathy Dragon has a big heart. He can read other’s emotions and anticipate their behavior by putting himself in their place. He knows that great dragons err, and they err greatly, so he is slow to judge and quick to offer support. He is one of the wisest and most beloved dragons.

name: Loyalty Dragon
description: The Loyalty Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Loyalty Dragon can also learn Legend moves.      When the Loyalty Dragon finds a worthy cause or deserving friend, he totally commits and is willing to sacrifice himself even in the hardest circumstances. He is devoted to multiple missions, but since blood is thicker than water, his first allegiance lies with the Rarity Dragons.

name: Frostling Dragon
description: The Frostling Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Frostling Dragon can also learn Metal and  Dark moves.      Catastrophic climate change has forced the Frostling Dragon to spend his life in almost completely glacial conditions, making him a megastar of glaze ice and blizzards at the Ice Arena. Many of his rivals have ended up as trophies encased in ice.

name: Peevish Dragon
description: The Peevish Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Peevish Dragon can also learn Electric and  War moves.      The Peevish Dragon is a veritable grouch, pessimistic and cantankerous. Few take his rantings and predictions of doom and gloom seriously and find them hilarious. They know they are dealing with a grumbler and carry on. They also know a gentle heart hides behind that mean front.

name: Wandering Dragon
description: The Wandering Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Wandering Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      The Wandering Dragon is often seen ambling through the mysterious woods of Illusion Island looking for a victim of his absurd riddles, which he pulls from a bottomless satchel slung over his shoulder. The answer doesn’t matter, really, since where he comes from, everything is possible.

name: Permafrost Dragon
description: The Permafrost Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Permafrost Dragon can also learn Dark and  Sea moves.      The Permafrost Dragon survived in a frozen state for thousands of years, trapped between ice wedges practically since the Ice Age. But when climate change caused perennially frozen ground to start thawing, he managed to escape and is now in search of kindred spirits.

name: Rook Dragon
description: The Rook Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Rook Dragon can also learn Dark and  Nature moves.      At first sight, the Rook Dragon seems to be an exotic animal. But he is really a combination of architectural design and the eccentricity of a genius who spent his life playing with impossible machines unfit for the natural world. Despite his name, this dragon is no rookie in the battlefield.

name: Cubic Dragon
description: The Cubic Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Cubic Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      The Cubic Dragon is a mathematically-inspired wonder. As he moves his complex body made of interlocking solids, he seems to be dividing three-dimensional space into a fourth dimension. This optical illusion makes it extremely difficult for his enemies to focus and find his weak spot.

name: Strange Dragon
description: The Strange Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Strange Dragon can also learn Metal and  Light moves.      This enigmatic dragon can only inhabit the freakish world of the Illusion Island, where dragons can exist simultaneously in several planes. The Strange Dragon carries an intricate geometric figure, his emblem and powerful weapon, using its false perspective to confuse and frustrate his enemies.

name: Farm Dragon
description: The Farm Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Farm Dragon can also learn Terra and  Pure moves.      They say if youve got it, flaunt it. Well this dragon has the best produce in all of Dragon City and hes not afraid to tell you. He is known for his love of fresh fruits and vegetables and also his long lectures on sustainable farming.

name: Charged Dragon
description: The Charged Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Charged Dragon can also learn Metal, Dark and  War moves.      Watching the Charged Dragon in action is no doubt electrifying. He has a reputation as an inexhaustible fighter, actually drawing his energy from the battlefield. However, his virtue becomes his vice, as he must be continuously engaged or retire to his cave to recharge.

name: Burglar Dragon
description: The Burglar Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Burglar Dragon can also learn Dark, Terra and  Electric moves.      When the Burglar Dragon, also known as Kenny, was little he was quite lonely. However, when he learned to use his ghost hands, everyone was fascinated by his abilities. The problem is that he ended up using his hands to steal and draw the attention of his friends… He became a burglar!

name: Camouflaged Dragon
description: The Camouflaged Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Camouflaged Dragon can also learn Pure and  Terra moves.      The Camouflaged Dragon is an alluring creature, if you can spot it. This dragon has the ability to change its colors and patterns at will to match the environment. By resembling other close elements, he makes himself invisible when in danger or when it is his turn to become a predator.

name: Arsonist Dragon
description: The Arsonist Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Arsonist Dragon can also learn Dark, War and  Flame moves.      Arsonist is his name and fire is his game. He started his burning career with a group of rebel friends, but now he rides solo. Take heed as this dragon will torch anything in his way and feels absolutely no remorse.

name: Loch Dragon
description: The Loch Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Loch Dragon can also learn Sea, Light and  Nature moves.      Long ago, a fisherman felt an unusually strong tug that almost capsized his boat. In a panic, he cut the line and rowed away. That night, Loch Dragon surfaced from the bottom of the lake and has since become a bit of a legend. He remains an elusive creature, his name still stirring fear.

name: Pixel Dragon
description: The Pixel Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Pixel Dragon can also learn Dark and  War moves.      The Pixel Dragon came from another dimension through a cable, but a glitch happened, so he landed here in low quality! This made him feel ashamed in the beginning, but now hes happy because pixels are what make him unique.

name: Doom Dragon
description: The Doom Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Doom Dragon can also learn Flame, Dark and  War moves.      Rumor has it that if you face the Doom Dragon in the battlefield and lose, youll never win a battle again. This might only be a rumor, but most prefer not to tempt fate, so they just avoid him.

name: Nirvana Dragon
description: The Nirvana Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Nirvana Dragon can also learn Light, Nature and  Pure moves.      This majestic dragon is highly distinguished in Dragon City. Her feathers are made of the pure gold and her colors symbolize her prestige. She has the rare power of putting her enemies in a nirvanic state, allowing her to destroy at will.

name: Mist Dragon
description: The Mist Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Mist Dragon can also learn Ice, Terra and  Sea moves.      The Mist Dragon is constantly surrounded by a thick layer of mist making it impossible to see him until it’s too late... exactly how he likes it. With his fierce sneak attacks he always has the upper hand in battle giving him full control.

name: Everest Dragon
description: The Everest Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Everest Dragon can also learn Terra and  Legend moves.      He may look cute but take caution, this dragon is more dangerous than he seems. He’s quite stubborn and there are challenges to surviving him. If you don’t adapt, the results can be deadly. But hey, that’s why he’s so fascinating.

name: Wax Dragon
description: The Wax Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Wax Dragon can also learn Flame, Terra and  Pure moves.      The Wax Dragon started his career modeling in wax museums. He prides himself on always looking pristine and has not one drip out of place. Although he’s beautiful, look but don’t touch-he’ll stick to you and cause a third-degree burn.

name: Fire&ice Dragon
description: The Fire&ice Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Fire&ice Dragon can also learn Flame and  Ice moves.      This dragon is a walking juxtaposition. He’s a fiery force to be reckoned with, but also a cool and calm caretaker. You can find him traveling with his best friend, the Ice&Fire Dragon, trying to maintain the peace between the two sides.

name: Melted Dragon
description: The Melted Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Melted Dragon can also learn Ice and  Flame moves.      Curiosity melted the dragon. Since he was little, this dragon has always wanted to be a fire dragon. He longs to frolic in the solar coronas magnificent flares or relax in volcanic lava tubs with his friends, but every time he gets too close, the poor thing melts.

name: Nitrogen Dragon
description: The Nitrogen Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Nitrogen Dragon can also learn Metal and  Pure moves.      The Nitrogen Dragon is what happens when a certain someone, ahem Scientific Dragon, forgets to clean up the dragon lab and a bottle of nitrogen is spilled. This dragon is not to be treated lightly, one misstep can wreak deadly havoc.

name: Holy Dragon
description: The Holy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Holy Dragon can also learn Light, Electric and  Nature moves.      The Holy Dragon is a lover not a fighter, but if there’s anything she’s willing to fight for, it’s peace and truth. During her young dragon years she tried to be a rebel to fit in, but it didn’t last long. She has since embraced her goodness and others have followed her lead.

name: Desmuk Dragon
description: The Desmuk Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Desmuk Dragon can also learn Nature and  Light moves.      These immaculate creatures feathers are in high demand and rumored to have medicinal properties. To fight against extinction and the illegal feather trade, the few that are left migrated to Dragon City and hid in different portals.

name: Boulder Dragon
description: The Boulder Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Boulder Dragon can also learn War and  Light moves.      Some things get better with age and the Boulder Dragon is one of them. He’s literally been around for thousands of years and hasn’t eroded. He’s usually nice although, don’t make the mistake of asking exactly how old he is, or you’ll find yourself between a rock and a hard place.

name: Kitsune Dragon
description: The Kitsune Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Kitsune Dragon can also learn Legend and  Dark moves.      This is the only dragon to hold a record for fastest battle won. He can win a battle in a matter of milliseconds and he’s not even trained, just a natural. He was born with an innate skill that allows him to use the multiverse’s magnetic field to win battles. No fair right?

name: Anemone Dragon
description: The Anemone Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Anemone Dragon can also learn Flame and  Dark moves.      The Anemone Dragon may be rough and tough on the outside, but he’s a big softy on the inside. He likes to appear that way because if he laughs too hard it will trigger his poisonous tentacles and nobody wants that, now do they? Just ask the many friends he’s stung by accident.

name: Snapper Dragon
description: The Snapper Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Snapper Dragon can also learn Dark, Light and  Sea moves.      Fireflies can’t escape being eaten for dinner when the Snapper Dragon is around. In fact, he loves them so much that every time he hiccups, there are beautiful sprinkles of light.

name: Timeless Dragon
description: The Timeless Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Timeless Dragon can also learn Light, Dark and  Metal moves.      This dragon has been around for who knows how long. It is said that, whenever he starts to get old, he just turns around his magical hourglass and he goes back to the perfect age for dragons: 134 years old.

name: Battler Dragon
description: The Battler Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Battler Dragon can also learn Ice and  War moves.      The Battler Dragon is one you don’t want to mess with. For years he ran an illegal underground battle arena. The authorities eventually caught on to him but let’s just say he still fights dirty.

name: Inky Dragon
description: The Inky Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Inky Dragon can also learn War and  Sea moves.      This dragon takes his art seriously. He’s also a tad bit dramatic and doesn’t handle rejection very well. He tends to harbor resentment for anyone who doesn’t like his paintings. Just one criticism will have him throwing inkblots at you.

name: Emperor Dragon
description: The Emperor Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Emperor Dragon can also learn Metal, Pure and  Dark moves.      The Emperor Dragon hails from the east, where all light is born, and where he learned to harness this radiant energy to cause damage. His power is renewed from the circle of light at the center of the arena, and his rivals are exposed to such intensity that they tend to fade away.

name: Dumpling Dragon
description: The Dumpling Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Dumpling Dragon can also learn Legend, Pure and  War moves.      Let’s walk you through the last dinner party the Dumpling Dragon had…hmm, let’s see-Dragon City was filled with smoke, all the dragons cried, the end. To avoid this happening again in the future we try not to let him into the kitchen.

name: Pine Dragon
description: The Pine Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Pine Dragon can also learn Nature and  Ice moves.      The Pine Dragon is happiest all covered in snow, so every year when Christmas is over, he returns to his favorite spot at the very top of the mountain, where it’s nice and cold even in summer!

name: Shamanny Dragon
description: The Shamanny Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Shamanny Dragon can also learn Flame and  Dark moves.      The Shamanny Dragon does all sorts of crazy rituals and summons dark souls onto the battlefield to win. However, if he doesn’t concentrate well, he ends up summoning strange things like clowns and puppies!

name: Dogkun Dragon
description: The Dogkun Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Dogkun Dragon can also learn Light, Pure and  Metal moves.      The Dogkun Dragon’s focus in battle seems unbreakable, especially if it’s the Catkun Dragon who he’s fighting against. However, there is one thing that can distract him: Sausages!

name: Catkun Dragon
description: The Catkun Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Catkun Dragon can also learn Dark, Pure and  War moves.      When he’s not in an epic fight against the Dogkun Dragon or sharpening his claws, the Catkun Dragon can be found relaxing by the fire with a big bowl of milk.

name: Gear Dragon
description: The Gear Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Gear Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      This huge robot dragon literally defies the laws of physics. Equipped with high-grade steel, it has intense force and speed with no compromise. A unique build, it’s able to withstand brutal attacks and blast through intact buildings.

name: Kernel Dragon
description: The Kernel Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Kernel Dragon can also learn Electric and  Pure moves.      The Kernel Dragon plays an essential role in maintaining balance in Dragon City. Rings of energy and power, drawn from surrounding planets, orbit this dragon. However, when gorged with too much energy it uses the excess to attack.

name: Piston Dragon
description: The Piston Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Piston Dragon can also learn Metal and  Flame moves.      The Piston Dragon was auto racing’s secret formula...until it escaped. Designed with resiliency and an explosive burn, this dragon couldn’t bear being confined to life on the race tracks so it used its innovation to flee to Dragon City.

name: Turbo Dragon
description: The Turbo Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Turbo Dragon can also learn Electric, Metal and  Flame moves.      The Turbo Dragon isn’t just a hunk of metal, it’s ingenious. By usurping its automatic system, it created turbo energy to increase its power. And if that wasn’t enough, it sensitized it’s laser eyes and can detect motion from miles away.

name: Destiny Dragon
description: The Destiny Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Destiny Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      The purest dragon of the Primal element! It is said that just by standing close to him, you can feel his aura of magic and power. The Destiny Dragon is something like a King of Dragonverse.

name: Hard-headed Dragon
description: The Hard-headed Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Hard-headed Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      If Deus had a dollar for every time someone complained about the Hard-headed Dragon…He has a major ego and is so stubborn that no one wants to share a habitat with him. Good thing he knows how to put that hard head to use in battle.

name: Fuming Dragon
description: The Fuming Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Fuming Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      Hell hath no fury like the Fuming Dragon scorned. This dragon is actually pretty calm however, when provoked he releases a rage of destructive force. We hear the last dragon that made him angry was burned to a crisp. You have been warned.

name: Solar-powered Dragon
description: The Solar-powered Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Solar-powered Dragon can also learn Terra and  Flame moves.      What began as an initiative to make Dragon City greener has now taken on a life of its own. The Solar-powered Dragon requires little maintenance and is inexhaustible. It’s also robotically enhanced to ensure utter disintegration in battle.

name: Vulcan Dragon
description: The Vulcan Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Vulcan Dragon can also learn Terra, Flame and  War moves.      This feathered dragon is a rare breed that is only seen once every few years. No one is certain of its exact origins but it’s said to live in distinct areas in the upper slopes of dormant volcanoes and is resilient to extremely high heat.

name: Aquanaut Dragon
description: The Aquanaut Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Aquanaut Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      If you can’t tell already, this dragon loves the water. Although we’ll admit, he takes it a bit too seriously. He doesn’t really need the gear, he bought it second hand to make himself seem more legit.

name: Grass Dragon
description: The Grass Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Grass Dragon can also learn Nature moves.      The Grass Dragon’s favorite food is seaweed. He likes to have it for breakfast, lunch, and dinner and he doesn’t believe in sharing. Don’t try to steal a bite, he keeps a close count and will attack you if you do. Just a warning.

name: Ride Dragon
description: The Ride Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Ride Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      If you think taxi services are good, check out the Ride Dragon. It knows the fastest routes around Dragon City and doesn’t need to stop for gas. It will pick you up from anywhere as long as you promise not to change the radio station.

name: Verglas Dragon
description: The Verglas Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Verglas Dragon can also learn Ice moves.      Thousands of years ago archaeologists froze the Verglas Dragon and transported it to a museum. Little did they know by freezing it they were restoring it to its natural element. It broke free and now roams freely around Dragon City.

name: Sailer Dragon
description: The Sailer Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Sailer Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Someone once made the mistake of throwing the Sailer Dragon a surprise party. Not a good idea. This dragon is always on guard and suspicious of everyone. Next time just give him a cake or else he’ll use his extra eyes to spy on you.

name: Transcendence Dragon
description: The Transcendence Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Transcendence Dragon can also learn Light moves.      As a self-proclaimed rule protector, the Transcendence Dragon believes in following all the rules in Dragon City. Any rule he sees not being abided by will result in him setting up an immediate meeting with Deus, no questions asked.

name: Breaker Dragon
description: The Breaker Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Breaker Dragon can also learn Light moves.      Someone needs to tell the Breaker Dragon that it’s not okay to go around breaking things when you don’t get your way. Where do you think he gets his name from? This dragon has a serious temper, but we’ve been told he’s working on it.

name: Huntsdraco Dragon
description: The Huntsdraco Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Huntsdraco Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      This methodical hunter likes to hide in the shadows, light up his bulb to attract his victim’s attention and… dinner time! Then, on to the next one.

name: Chase Dragon
description: The Chase Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Chase Dragon can also learn Metal moves.      This dragon will give you goosebumps-and not the good kind. Working together with the Hellgate Dragon, he roams the city looking for those who have escaped from hell. He traded in his feet for wheels to make sure no one can escape for long.

name: Prewings Dragon
description: The Prewings Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Prewings Dragon can also learn Light and  Sea moves.      They may look innocent but be careful what you say around these dragons-they love to gossip. They’re always stirring up drama and can be seen running from habitat to habitat or lying flat on the ground eavesdropping to get some juicy dirt.

name: Masked Dragon
description: The Masked Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Masked Dragon can also learn Legend, Ice and  Metal moves.      The Masked Dragon leads a very ancient tribe in Dragonverse. Each of the feathers on his body belongs to a defeated enemy. He has never lost a battle, so no one ever doubts him as a true chief!

name: Mammatus Dragon
description: The Mammatus Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Mammatus Dragon can also learn Electric, War and  Dark moves.      This massive creature is one of the big guys at Dragonverse. He uses his thick tail to stun enemies and, once they’re paralyzed on the ground, he opens his big mouth and devours them!

name: Frilled Dragon
description: The Frilled Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Frilled Dragon can also learn Flame and  Dark moves.      The Frilled Dragon, otherwise known as Queen Frill, is high maintenance and wants the red carpet rolled out for her. She comes from a long lineage of royalty and expects to be treated as such. If not she will get extremely agitated and hostile.

name: Huntress Dragon
description: The Huntress Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Huntress Dragon can also learn Electric and  War moves.      Her unique skull in the shape of an arrowhead makes this dragon an exceptional huntress. She can aim like no other and once she sees her target from the sky, she dives flawlessly right on top of it.

name: Fiery Dragon
description: The Fiery Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Fiery Dragon can also learn Metal, Ice and  Dark moves.      There are rumors floating around that this dragon’s bark is worse than his bite, but let us be very clear...one sting from this dragon and you will need to seek immediate medical attention. So yes, he’s as aggressive as he looks.

name: Antimatter Dragon
description: The Antimatter Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Antimatter Dragon can also learn Pure, Legend and  Primal moves.      If this dragon’s unruly aggression or horns that emit exorbitant heat don’t scare you, then his black hole will. No one knows what’s inside of it because no one has ever escaped it. Its pull is so strong that not even light can escape.

name: Outcry Dragon
description: The Outcry Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Outcry Dragon can also learn Dark, Sea and  Ice moves.      The Outcry Dragon’s job was to protect legions of soldiers, but after they saw how aggressive he got every time he saw enemies, the generals decided to put him in the front line of battle, where he’s most useful, burning opponents before they can even approach soldiers!

name: Ovi Dragon
description: The Ovi Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Ovi Dragon can also learn Nature and  Light moves.      Don’t want your eggs coated in paint? Then hide them from this dragon. He dresses everything in bright colors and goes around stealing eggs to put his finishing touches on. But don’t worry, he gives them back… dripping in paint of course.

name: Enchanted Dragon
description: The Enchanted Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Enchanted Dragon can also learn Dark, Terra and  Flame moves.      The Enchanted Dragon is the master of manipulation. He lurks in the corners of the forest waiting to cast his powerful spells to get you right where he wants you. Once under his spell he will use you to get revenge on his enemies.

name: Ratabite Dragon
description: The Ratabite Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Ratabite Dragon can also learn Metal, Dark and  War moves.      The Ratabite Dragon was once kidnapped for experimentation by sketchy scientists and confined to life in a lab. He’s since then escaped but beware-all the testing left him aggressive, irate, and deranged.

name: Reddishi Dragon
description: The Reddishi Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Reddishi Dragon can also learn Light and  Terra moves.      This furry dragon has a serious thirst for knowledge and likes to get his hands into everything. His rummages and persistent questions can be a bit of a nuisance and keep everyone up at night but he’s so cute he gets away with it.

name: Neumon Dragon
description: The Neumon Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Neumon Dragon can also learn Sea and  Metal moves.      The Neumon Dragon was built for complete demolition. His body is made of pure metal and ice and is practically indestructible. Using his beady eyes and releasing razor-sharp ice chunks, he’s able to stop his enemies dead in their tracks.

name: Raino Dragon
description: The Raino Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Raino Dragon can also learn Nature and  War moves.      The Raino Dragon comes from the Eastern Mountains where virtue and strength are strong traits. Contrary to common belief it is not triggered by color but rather by movement so be very cautious if you happen to see it or else it will charge.

name: Swamp Dragon
description: The Swamp Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Swamp Dragon can also learn Nature and  Terra moves.      First you see it…now you don’t. You must be quick to spot this dragon. It loves to hide and is always on the lookout. It has an impeccable sense of sight and smell and can detect an enemy from miles away causing it to hide under water.

name: Corruption Dragon
description: The Corruption Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Corruption Dragon can also learn Ice and  Terra moves.      Don’t get too close to this one or he’ll hiss at you. He has an evil personality and destructive behavior. He thinks everyone is a goblin and mysteriously creeps around Dragon City. Fresh fish is the only thing that will calm him down.

name: Daybreak Dragon
description: The Daybreak Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Daybreak Dragon can also learn Metal, Flame and  War moves.      As a loyal servant to the queen, the Daybreak dragon has been trusted to watch over her most precious gold and jewels. But when the queen is away, this dragon will play. She loves playing dress up with all the gold and jewels.

name: Skeleton Dragon
description: The Skeleton Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Skeleton Dragon can also learn Dark and  Terra moves.      The Skeleton Dragon used to be a faithful knight until he died suddenly in battle. Still bitter and believing he was taken well before his time, he spends his days haunting Dragon City. When he’s around heads will roll…literally.

name: Gauntlet Dragon
description: The Gauntlet Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Gauntlet Dragon can also learn Dark and  Light moves.      The Gauntlet Dragon’s blaze is intense enough to set the entire city on fire.
