It has an insatiable rage that forces it to obliterate anything that stands in its way and when it flies through the city it leaves a sweltering trail of fire.

name: Gigantic Dragon
description: The Gigantic Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Gigantic Dragon can also learn Dark and  Light moves.      There was a time when the Gigantic Dragon led an entire tribe of massive creatures. However, after a tragic war, he was the only survivor of the tribe. Now he has no one to lead, but he still holds onto his crown.

name: Bomber Dragon
description: The Bomber Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Bomber Dragon can also learn Nature, Metal and  Flame moves.      After a small stint under the general, this dragon decided he didn’t like taking orders and would rather take matters into his own hands. He’s extremely territorial so if you even so much as look like a threat, he’ll drop a bomb.

name: Surprising Dragon
description: The Surprising Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Surprising Dragon can also learn Metal, Dark and  Nature moves.      If your instinct is to swaddle this dragon and make him your pet, remember that looks can be deceiving. Despite his cutesy reputation he is among the most aggressive and his attacks will leave you wishing you had looked and not touched.

name: Wisdom Dragon
description: The Wisdom Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Wisdom Dragon can also learn Sea and  Pure moves.      The Wisdom Dragon is truly exceptional. Not only has he read more books than any other dragon in Dragon City, but he also has a photographic memory allowing him to retrieve anything from his memory at will-including secrets for battles.

name: Neo-akimori Dragon
description: The Neo-akimori Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Neo-akimori Dragon can also learn Electric and  Metal moves.      Whether it’s his smooth talk, chiseled robotic jaw, or his hip style, the Neo-Akimori Dragon knows how to make all the ladies swoon. You’ll never catch him losing in battle because he does whatever it takes to keep his street cred.

name: Neo-izumi Dragon
description: The Neo-izumi Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Neo-izumi Dragon can also learn Electric and  Metal moves.      The Neo-Izumi Dragon is a pro with her sword. Her attacks are as incredible as she is and her skill is so good, she could attack with her eyes closed. Facts: the reason the Neo-Kira Dragon stays out of trouble is because she’s got his back.

name: Neo-kira Dragon
description: The Neo-kira Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Neo-kira Dragon can also learn Sea, Electric and  Metal moves.      If you’re looking to have a serious discussion with the Neo-Kira Dragon don’t bother-he’s not here for it. But, if you’re looking to let your hair down and stay up till all hours then he’s your dragon. Count on him to bring the fun!

name: Neo-hanzo Dragon
description: The Neo-hanzo Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Neo-hanzo Dragon can also learn War, Electric and  Metal moves.      The Neo-Hanzo Dragon couldn’t get his enemies nor his squad to take him seriously so he hired someone to build him a massive robotic hand with built-in electromagnetic force. Now everyone listens to him to avoid getting totally obliterated.

name: Alloy Dragon
description: The Alloy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Alloy Dragon can also learn Pure and  Dark moves.      The Alloy Dragon wanted to live a life of solitude but ever since it came out that his red gemstone is worth more than diamonds he now lives a life of defense. It’s a good thing his metal claws are sharp, sharp enough to sever a limb.

name: Warlord Dragon
description: The Warlord Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Warlord Dragon can also learn Flame, Terra and  Metal moves.      When it comes to the Warlord Dragon, it’s wise not to challenge him. He fearlessly claims everything he wants, and everything he wants he conquers. His war mentality keeps him one step ahead and his fiery sword torches anything it touches.

name: Peculiar Dragon
description: The Peculiar Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Peculiar Dragon can also learn Nature and  Electric moves.      Don’t be perturbed by this dragon’s weird behavior. The Peculiar Dragon used to have trouble fitting in but to avoid getting picked on he worked endlessly on his battle skills. Now, let’s just say he’s one of the most popular dragons around.

name: Heaven Dragon
description: The Heaven Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Heaven Dragon can also learn Pure, Nature and  Sea moves.      The Heaven Dragon holds the utmost standard of grace and virtue. She’s so pure that she instinctually attacks anything that is evil in her eyes, even if you don’t agree. Her blasts seem delicate, but make no mistake they are extremely fatal.

name: Durukuru Dragon
description: The Durukuru Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Durukuru Dragon can also learn Nature and  Light moves.      This dragon began concocting spells as a hobby-but now needs a tool belt to hold them all. His unmatched skills transformed him from novice to guru, with enough power to overthrow any enemy. A good reminder: big things come in small packages.

name: Bastion Dragon
description: The Bastion Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Bastion Dragon can also learn Metal, Sea and  Terra moves.      The Bastion Dragon is as chilling as his aura, which can be felt before he’s even seen. He never makes empty threats and always delivers on every one. As the most experienced warrior, his reputation matches his ruthlessness.

name: Einar Dragon
description: The Einar Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Einar Dragon can also learn Terra, Light and  Flame moves.      This beast has an instinct to ravage. Due to this, it was captured and held in chains for illegal battles by underground organizers. But being in chains only made him more aggressive. Unable to be contained-he escaped and is even more savage.

name: Mindrake Dragon
description: The Mindrake Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Mindrake Dragon can also learn Electric and  Ice moves.      Can’t sit still? Neither can the Mindrake Dragon. This funky creature relies on the electric power of the disco and won’t stop grooving until everyone has given their best shot at The Hustle. He’s never down, unless you turn off his tunes.

name: Protector Dragon
description: The Protector Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Protector Dragon can also learn Light, Metal and  Dark moves.      The Protector Dragon is a highly trained beast. Usually seen protecting the Malice Striker Dragon from predators, when no one is looking he uses the poison for himself, making him completely unstoppable and one to watch out for in battle.

name: Ternion Dragon
description: The Ternion Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Ternion Dragon can also learn Primal and  Pure moves.      Enemies of the Ternion Dragon never last long because this warrior is a well-oiled machine and has programmed himself to destroy all those against him. He never misses a beat and will ruthlessly go far and wide to ensure that the job is done.

name: Shielded Dragon
description: The Shielded Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Shielded Dragon can also learn Terra and  Metal moves.      The Shielded Dragon is the ultimate protector but he’s also a paramount attacker. His shields are made from naturally occurring metals, are highly impenetrable, and are self charging, so when he attacks there’s no limit to the damage he can do.

name: Furry Dragon
description: The Furry Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Furry Dragon can also learn Legend and  War moves.      This dragon would make for the perfect pet, but there’s one problem: his unique fur creates a sharp electric charge making him terribly aggressive. Who can blame him? All that voltaic energy has to be unleashed somehow.

name: Aqua Dragon
description: The Aqua Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Aqua Dragon can also learn Nature and  Pure moves.      Looks can be deceiving and that’s certainly the case with the Aqua Dragon. This fun dragon is full of energy and resisting the urge to pick it up can be hard however, while cute, it is venomous and its attacks are excruciatingly painful.

name: Modern Dragon
description: The Modern Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Modern Dragon can also learn Electric and  Light moves.      The Modern Dragon has arrived from the future, bearing not only lots of valuable information from the history to come, but also the most interesting technology. He himself is a robotic work of art!

name: Shadow Dragon
description: The Shadow Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Shadow Dragon can also learn Dark and  Flame moves.      The only light this dragon likes is the light it emits with its barreling flames. As the self-proclaimed protector of darkness, the Shadow Dragon thrives in obscurity and lurks in the corners of the night extracting any drop of light it sees.

name: Rogue Dragon
description: The Rogue Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Rogue Dragon can also learn Dark, Nature and  Legend moves.      Few have survived an attack from the Rogue Dragon and those that have, have it etched in their memory. With sharp serrated claws that draw energy from dark forces, this dragon follows no rules and does whatever he wants.

name: Eggshell Dragon
description: The Eggshell Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Eggshell Dragon can also learn Pure and  Sea moves.      The Eggshell Dragon is a hoarder and makes use of everything. He doesn’t believe in waste which is why when Humpty Dumpty had his great fall, this dragon found the remains and made a suit. Well, one man’s trash is another man’s treasure.

name: Psychic Dragon
description: The Psychic Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Psychic Dragon can also learn Nature, Dark and  Electric moves.      No one really knows if the Psychic Dragon actually has psychic abilities. He’s always trying to mind read, predict the future, and promises he can see things with his third eye. Odd thing is: he only sees himself winning all the battles.

name: Clockwork Dragon
description: The Clockwork Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Clockwork Dragon can also learn Metal, Electric and  Light moves.      Time flies when you’re having fun-except for when the Clockwork Dragon is around. It was once a beautiful display but got sick of wasting time not being used. Now it flies around the city giving ultimatums and warnings against wasting time.

name: Sketch Dragon
description: The Sketch Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Sketch Dragon can also learn Flame, Light and  Dream moves.      Deus made a few sketches for new dragons but wasn’t entirely happy with them…so he threw them out. The Sketch Dragon was upset by this but wanted to prove his worth. Who knew a 2D masterpiece could have such fierce attacks!

name: Praetorian Dragon
description: The Praetorian Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Praetorian Dragon can also learn Pure, Dark and  Light moves.      Things at the War Arena can get pretty messy, so from the start, the Praetorian Dragon was handpicked by Deus to oversee battles and keep the rule of law. He is the Arena’s permanent guard, but he occasionally jumps into battle himself to show how it is done.

name: Jolts Dragon
description: The Jolts Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Jolts Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      This dragon is a bit of an oddball and built a lightning rod on his head hoping to communicate with extraterrestrial creatures…it didn’t work. Instead, he’s constantly zapped with electricity that’s so powerful it wipes out anything he touches.

name: Gorge Dragon
description: The Gorge Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Gorge Dragon can also learn Pure moves.      This dragon spends most of his time brushing his hair and dishing out compliments… only so he can get them right back. Make sure to keep a list of adoring words on hand because if you don’t compliment him back you’ll never hear the end of it.

name: Primal Dragon
description: The Primal Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal.       If the Primal Dragon seems a little nervous, give him some time. He’s been looking for Dragon City for a while, but he kept getting distracted between portals. As one of the most playful dragons of the primal element, attention will make him happy.

name: Tamtam Dragon
description: The Tamtam Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Tamtam Dragon can also learn Pure, Flame and  Metal moves.      The Tamtam Dragon is really competitive and doesn’t take losing very well. If he can’t win…then no one can, that’s why he built a giant armor around him. With his defense taken care of, his only focus is attacking and winning battles.

name: Beach Dragon
description: The Beach Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Beach Dragon can also learn Terra, Light and  Ice moves.      This Dragon is always ready for the beach and knows how to soak up the sun. The sea is his sanctuary and makes him relaxed and chilled. He’s very friendly and won’t attack… unless you remind him one too many times to put sunscreen on.

name: Darkjester Dragon
description: The Darkjester Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Darkjester Dragon can also learn Flame, Electric and  Ice moves.      The Darkjester Dragon may be entertaining but he’s not to be trusted. With a different personality for every day of the week, his mesmerizing shows will keep you laughing, but his dark humor will put you in a trance and send you down the wrong path.

name: Copper Dragon
description: The Copper Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Copper Dragon can also learn Metal and  Light moves.      The Copper Dragon was cooked up using a mix of compounds in the dragon lab, but after noticing that he never loses a battle and only gets stronger with each hit, many dragons have begun an investigation to uncover this dragon’s true power.

name: Tsunami Dragon
description: The Tsunami Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Tsunami Dragon can also learn Sea, Dark and  War moves.      It would be a miracle if you could spot the Tsunami Dragon before it attacks but its speed makes it virtually unnoticeable until it’s too late. Oh and don’t bother trying to use fancy 3D equipment to track it either, it does what it wants.

name: Radiant Dragon
description: The Radiant Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Radiant Dragon can also learn Electric and  Light moves.      The Radiant Dragon used to be an Egyptian messenger, as a liaison between empires. She doesn’t like to stay in one place for too long and prefers to keep her silk wings moving. If her flow is disrupted, she will deliver more than just messages.

name: Fortune Dragon
description: The Fortune Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Fortune Dragon can also learn Dark and  Pure moves.      Feeling lucky? Then this dragon is for you! This creature has silent wings and is really hard to catch. The same magical powers it has to bring good luck, it uses to ward off its enemies. Catch it if you can, but careful it doesn’t slip away!

name: Stonework Dragon
description: The Stonework Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Stonework Dragon can also learn Light and  War moves.      Powerful Egyptian Pharaohs need even more powerful bodyguards. The Stonework Dragon has been the protector of Pharaohs for centuries. He’s naturally strong and his solid build allows him to destroy anything with just his pinky finger.

name: Sarcophagus Dragon
description: The Sarcophagus Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Sarcophagus Dragon can also learn Dark, Metal and  War moves.      This dragon is constantly on the run for the mistakes of his past life. So far he’s managed to escape enemies because he’s found the perfect hiding spot… his sarcophagus! If you see a beautiful one lying around, you may just get a surprise attack.

name: Onslaught Dragon
description: The Onslaught Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Onslaught Dragon can also learn Legend moves.      The Onslaught Dragon has a short fuse and so much raging power that it seeps through his pores. He is a destructive attacker capable of crushing his enemies in a matter of seconds and the aftermath he leaves behind is simply indescribable.

name: Burbi Dragon
description: The Burbi Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Burbi Dragon can also learn Sea, Legend and  Terra moves.      The Burbi Dragon is a sneaky little fellow. He has a rare ability to remain motionless for long periods of time. He uses this as a defense mechanism, staying really still tricking his enemies into thinking he’s a statue then…he attacks!

name: Coyote Dragon
description: The Coyote Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Coyote Dragon can also learn Terra and  Legend moves.      The Coyote Dragon is never up to any good. He’s a sly troublemaker who goes around looking for things to get into. This creature loves to cause a commotion and then frame others to take the fall. Avoid him, or you may end up in hot water.

name: Wailing Dragon
description: The Wailing Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Wailing Dragon can also learn War, Light and  Dark moves.      The Wailing Dragon is the son of a banshee sent out into the world to herald the ill fate of those who stray from a noble path. Outside the Pure Arena, he is a relentless torment. Inside its walls, his soul-piercing shrieks are amplified, and his rivals are unlikely to come out alive.

name: Delicate Dragon
description: The Delicate Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Delicate Dragon can also learn Pure, Nature and  Electric moves.      The Delicate Dragon comes from royalty and certainly likes to make it known. He never leaves home without his golden cuffs and his lace wings are custom-made. You can catch him dancing around the city throwing confetti everywhere.

name: Petrified Dragon
description: The Petrified Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Petrified Dragon can also learn Legend, Dark and  Terra moves.      The Petrified Dragon is the only beholder of the sword of destruction, which he stole from the Northern King after crafting a meticulous plan. After being transformed into imperishable stone, he now has all the destructive powers of the sword.

name: Magician Dragon
description: The Magician Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Magician Dragon can also learn Light, Legend and  Metal moves.      Becoming a good magician isn’t an easy path. Sometimes tricks go wrong and sometimes the consequences are irreversible. This might give you an idea of why this dragon wears a mask. It took him lots of practice and many accidents, but he became the best magician in Dragon City!

name: Two-colored Dragon
description: The Two-colored Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Two-colored Dragon can also learn Pure, Primal and  Dark moves.      The Two Colored Dragon is fickle, easily distracted, and likes to sleep for hours on end. Don’t make the common mistake of trying to pet her, she will come to you when she wants love and attention. Her one vice: a bowl of warm milk.

name: Blossom Dragon
description: The Blossom Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Blossom Dragon can also learn Primal, Terra and  Sea moves.      This dragon has made it her mission to keep the forest lush, and her elegance keeps it nice and healthy. But don’t be fooled, protecting nature isn’t for the faint of heart-those caught trying to destroy her home will pay the consequences.

name: Acrylic Dragon
description: The Acrylic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Acrylic Dragon can also learn Pure, Sea and  Metal moves.      Most painters see things and begin painting them in their mind, but according to the Acrylic Dragon, everything around him is his canvas and is much better sloshed in color. If you see him coming your way, find protection from the splatter.

name: Salamander Dragon
description: The Salamander Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Salamander Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      The Salamander Dragon is easy to find. If there’s heat, he will be there. This creature talks about the weather non-stop, loves basking in the sun, and always has a nice glow. He’s also known for throwing the best summer parties of Dragon City.

name: Neko Dragon
description: The Neko Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Neko Dragon can also learn Electric and  Magic moves.      Contrary to popular belief, the Neko Dragon will not make it rain gold in your habitats. She will however bring good luck for your battles. Legend has it that she will make any Dragon Master undefeated. Treat her well and she will do the same.

name: Nice Dragon
description: The Nice Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Nice Dragon can also learn Sea, Nature and  Electric moves.      Life is like a giant playground for the Nice Dragon. He’s very playful and often gets swept into a whirlwind of excitement. This excitement often leads to destruction so make sure you safety proof your habitats first.

name: Yggdrasil Dragon
description: The Yggdrasil Dragon is a Heroic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Yggdrasil Dragon can also learn Primal, Light and  Sea moves.      Heroic Dragons evolve to their young stage at level 10 and become adults at level 20.As the God of nature, this majestic creature is so powerful that vegetation grows wherever he steps and he can make any plant grow at will. With the Fae Dragons under his wing, he will stop at nothing to protect the beloved forests.

name: Matroix Dragon
description: The Matroix Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Matroix Dragon can also learn Legend and  Flame moves.      If you’re a fan of the Matroix Dragon, you’re not alone. As one of the biggest hits on DragonTube, this gaming creature has broken lots of records and has a whole army of followers. His high energy videos are addicting and loads of fun!

name: Lizard Dragon
description: The Lizard Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Lizard Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      The Lizard Dragon has the perfect strategy for battles: he sits and waits. Just when his enemies think it’s safe to come close, he will zero in and rapidly attack, leaving no time to escape…they fall for it every time and never see it coming.

name: Plume Dragon
description: The Plume Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Plume Dragon can also learn Ice and  Primal moves.      The Plume Dragon is famous for her highly coveted feathers, but she’s always alert and will put up a good fight before she lets anyone get close. Migrating from the snowy mountains, she can freeze her enemies mid-action from several feet away.

name: Flavored Dragon
description: The Flavored Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Flavored Dragon can also learn Legend, Sea and  Dream moves.      If you’re allergic to pollen steer clear of this dragon. Always more comfortable surrounded by plants and flowers, she decided to make a helmet made out of just that. She always sees the bright side of things and smells like spring.

name: Freedom Dragon
description: The Freedom Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Freedom Dragon can also learn Flame, Sea and  Metal moves.      The Freedom Dragon stands for truth and justice and is very serious, but the one day he lets loose: his birthday! Every year he throws a massive party and only asks for one thing in return: that everyone eat cake, celebrate, and watch fireworks!

name: Barbarian Dragon
description: The Barbarian Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Barbarian Dragon can also learn  Terra and  Primal moves.      To say that the Barbarian Dragon has no home training would be a complete understatement. This uncivilized beast is prone to violence and wants what he wants, when he wants it. Anything less will result in a blow from his massive mace.

name: Merchant Dragon
description: The Merchant Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Merchant Dragon can also learn Legend, Light and  Dark moves.      The Merchant Dragon is known for the amazing goods he sells to dragons for battles. But if there’s one thing he doesn’t like, it’s getting ripped off. So if you’re going to haggle with him, haggle well…or else he’ll seek revenge.

name: Dangerosaur Dragon
description: The Dangerosaur Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Dangerosaur Dragon can also learn Sea, Metal and  Dark moves.      When the Dangerosaur Dragon takes a step, the ground shakes…let that be a caution alert. This massive beast attacks first and thinks second. He loves a good chase and will hunt anything down whether on the ground or below the sea.

name: Slugabed Dragon
description: The Slugabed Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Slugabed Dragon can also learn Pure and  Nature moves.      The Slugabed Dragon is the dragon to call when you need a good distraction. With a wild imagination, her stories will take you to far off places. Her favorite hobby is sleeping under the stars which is where you will find her.

name: Scout Dragon
description: The Scout Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Scout Dragon can also learn Terra and  Nature moves.      Nothing escapes for long when the Scout Dragon is around. Using his stealth skills he is the master of sneak attacks and disguise. He can stake out for hours without taking a break, causing his enemies to sleep with one eye open.

name: Pathfinder Dragon
description: The Pathfinder Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Pathfinder Dragon can also learn Sea and  Terra moves.      The Pathfinder Dragon is the perfect guide. As a bit of a psychic she always knows where her enemies are and can identify things often ignored by the normal senses. By employing the galaxies, she knows exactly where to go and never gets lost.

name: Superspy Dragon
description: The Superspy Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Superspy Dragon can also learn Light, War and  Terra moves.      How the Superspy Dragon is able to seamlessly maneuver through dark worlds, track his enemies, and win every poker game at the party…no one knows. This dragon has the sharpest strategies and can create a plan in seconds, without being caught.

name: Savior Dragon
description: The Savior Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Savior Dragon can also learn Pure, Flame and  Electric moves.      The Savior Dragon once saved a cat from a tree and from then on has considered himself the savior of all dragons. Whenever there is danger, this angelic creature is there to step in and he doesn’t sleep until he knows all dragons are safe.

name: Glorious Dragon
description: The Glorious Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Glorious Dragon can also learn Pure, Light and  Ice moves.      The Glorious Dragon is as divine as they come. She is known to be peaceful and highly revered. However, what most don’t know is that she has another side. If triggered, her extraordinary power will be unleashed…which is anything but peaceful.

name: Hi-tech Dragon
description: The Hi-tech Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Hi-tech Dragon can also learn Metal, Dark and  Legend moves.      The Hi-Tech Dragon is a work of technological genius. It identifies and sizes up enemies from miles away and uses sensory software to detect the weak spots of its opponents. It’s aware of everything…so it completely annihilates every time.

name: Vainglorious Dragon
description: The Vainglorious Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Vainglorious Dragon can also learn Pure, Dark and  Flame moves.      The only thing this dragon cares about during battles is how he looks. Every attack is meticulously preplanned and he needs the light to be shining on his good side. Once he even hired a photographer to capture all his best moments.

name: Transmutation Dragon
description: The Transmutation Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Transmutation Dragon can also learn Ice and  Metal moves.      The only way to stay safe from the Transmutation Dragon is to avoid it. Scientists tried to keep it a secret but due to constant experimentation, this fatal beast has the fastest multiplying powers and brutal attacks that no one will survive.

name: Drummer Dragon
description: The Drummer Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Drummer Dragon can also learn War, Nature and  Electric moves.      The Drummer Dragon is driven by rage and sees nothing but evil. When this creature prepares to attack, he creates a charge in his body that fuels him through battle. He’s always on target and his horns will pierce the toughest materials.

name: Dandy Dragon
description: The Dandy Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Dandy Dragon can also learn Terra and  Metal moves.      The Dandy Dragon does everything with finesse and never leaves his habitat without his suit and tie. This classy dragon may be refined but don’t be fooled, he is a beast in battle and his attacks are just as classy and his style.

name: Engineer Dragon
description: The Engineer Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Engineer Dragon can also learn Electric moves.      The Engineer Dragon believes in efficiency and has many blueprints for Dragon City. With no time to waste, she’s ready to expand, and expand fast. She runs a tight ship and will go into attack mode if she catches someone sleeping on the job.

name: Online Dragon
description: The Online Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Online Dragon can also learn Metal, Electric and  Dark moves.      The Online Dragon is watching, listening, and heavily monitoring. He considers it his duty to spy on others and has an army of surveillance cameras that serve as his eyes and ears. Careful, destruction ensues if he sees something he doesn’t like.

name: Monarch Dragon
description: The Monarch Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Monarch Dragon can also learn Nature, Terra and  Flame moves.      If you see the Monarch Dragon gliding through the sky, summer has come. This creature loves nature, sprinkles lucky omen, and brings lots of color to the islands. Whatever you do, don’t try to trap it in a jar, this dragon loves to roam free.

name: Arctic Dragon
description: The Arctic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Arctic Dragon can also learn Ice, Legend and  Light moves.      The Arctic Dragon is a huntress from the northern mountains. Her ice wings help her zip through the air and her double coated fur provides built-in insulation. Her enemies rarely escape as she has acute skills and can survive for hours without sleep.

name: Rainwater Dragon
description: The Rainwater Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Rainwater Dragon can also learn Primal moves.      The Rainwater Dragon is a bit of a grump and likes to rain on everyone’s parade. He once tried to overturn the god of rain just so he could control the downpour. Don’t bother trying to share your good news with him, unless you want get drenched.

name: Arid Dragon
description: The Arid Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Arid Dragon can also learn Flame and  Dark moves.      The Arid Dragon is the true definition of creepy-crawly. This hair-raising dragon loves to terrorize its enemies and thrives off their fear. It uses vibrations to sense its surroundings and its teeth are sharp enough to cut through metal.

name: Wastelander Dragon
description: The Wastelander Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Wastelander Dragon can also learn War, Legend and  Electric moves.      Lethal chemicals are regularly released into the environment as a direct result of this toxic dragon. He thrives off hazmats and uses them against his rivals. He built a mask that allows him to control the chemical flow and blast his enemies.

name: Pollution Dragon
description: The Pollution Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Pollution Dragon can also learn Nature and  War moves.      The Pollution Dragon smells and has a hard time making friends. This poor creature will eat just about anything and was cursed by a witch to be a living landfill after being caught one too many times raiding the trash and leaving behind a mess.

name: Sandstorm Dragon
description: The Sandstorm Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Sandstorm Dragon can also learn Dark moves.      Getting lost in the Sandstorm Dragon’s winds is no joke. He’s very fickle and mainly dangerous because you never know when he’s going to show up and how long he’s going to stay. Depending on his mood, this dragon can cause violent destruction.

name: Sacred Dragon
description: The Sacred Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Sacred Dragon can also learn Nature and  Sea moves.      The Sacred Dragon was once the lead guardian of the gates of heaven, now this majestic creature spends her time protecting Dragon City. She’s attracted to all things angelic and never hesitates to use her celestial powers to destroy darkness.

name: Bling Dragon
description: The Bling Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Bling Dragon can also learn Metal, Legend and  Ice moves.      The Bling Dragon loves anything that shines. He’s spent years building his highly coveted collection of rare diamonds and jewels. Rumor has it he keeps it hidden in a secret vault in his habitat... but you didn’t hear that from us.

name: Shycon Dragon
description: The Shycon Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Shycon Dragon can also learn Dark, Terra and  Soul moves.      Lost behind the shadow of his brother, the Dracon Dragon, this dragon likes it best behind the scenes and often lets others take the credit for what he’s done. He’s powerful, yet bashful. But now he’s decided not to miss his chance to shine.

name: Rhythm Dragon
description: The Rhythm Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Rhythm Dragon can also learn Metal and  Light moves.      The Rhythm Dragon can only be beat if he’s standing perfectly still…but since he never is, he’s impossible to beat. This dragon loves to shake his groove thing and since there’s no beating him we suggest you join him.

name: Shredder Dragon
description: The Shredder Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Shredder Dragon can also learn Metal, Ice and  Dark moves.      The Shredder Dragon wears around his neck the banner of a dragon who once tried to enslave him. At least thats the story he tells. Well never know the version of the other dragon. No ones heard from him ever since he defied the Shredder Dragon.

name: Atlantis Dragon
description: The Atlantis Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Atlantis Dragon can also learn Primal, Sea and  Nature moves.      The Atlantis Dragon is a natural-born leader, headstrong, and always believes he knows what’s best. As the once guardian of Atlantis, he will remove all that stands in his way and lives by one rule and one rule only: follow his lead…or else.

name: Strongman Dragon
description: The Strongman Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Strongman Dragon can also learn Light and  Metal moves.      The Strongman Dragon is very helpful…or so it seems. Usually found flexing his muscles in front of the mirror, this solid beast uses any excuse to show off his strength - even if it means doing the chores that no one wants to do.

name: Forgotten Dragon
description: The Forgotten Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Forgotten Dragon can also learn Metal and  War moves.      The Skullface Dragon has a secret weapon when it comes to protecting his dungeons: The Forgotten Dragon. This brutal dragon is the first line of defense and is on duty 24/7. He has no feelings, making it easier for him to blast any rival.

name: Colorful Dragon
description: The Colorful Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Colorful Dragon can also learn Flame, Light and  Nature moves.      Everything is butterflies and rainbows for the Colorful Dragon…literally. This graceful creature only has space for positive vibes and will light up any room. Any negativity around this dragon will result in a blast of happiness.

name: Skullface Dragon
description: The Skullface Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Skullface Dragon can also learn Ice, Pure and  Legend moves.      Anyone who thinks they can enter the dungeons without facing the Skullface Dragon…think again! He is the king of the dungeons and rightfully so. His skills are unmatched and his roar is fierce enough to petrify any potential intruders.

name: Plasma Dragon
description: The Plasma Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Plasma Dragon can also learn Legend, Electric and  Flame moves.      The Plasma Dragon was once a pet dragon being sold on the black market, but its previous owners let it go because it was too hazardous. This dragon should never be anyone’s pet. It carries a ball of hot plasma, ready to attack at any moment.

name: Firevolts Dragon
description: The Firevolts Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Firevolts Dragon can also learn Flame, Electric and  Light moves.      Always having a thirst for destruction is exhausting, but not for the FireVolts Dragon. This mystic creature relentlessly pursues his enemies and can trigger electric currents strong enough to annihilate anything within proximity.

name: Guide Dragon
description: The Guide Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Guide Dragon can also learn Nature, Terra and  Metal moves.      Despite his rough demeanor, the Guide Dragon helps other dragons find their true potential. As the guardian of the soul universe, he’s not the easiest to win over, but he’ll be the best ally to those who can prove themselves worthy.

name: Kite Dragon
description: The Kite Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Kite Dragon can also learn Flame and  Electric moves.      The Kite Dragon always looks fun and innocent, flying high in the sky. But don’t be fooled, this sharp dragon is quietly observing his enemies and crafting his attacks. Be on the lookout, a day in the park may turn into an unexpected battle.

name: Ultimate Dragon
description: The Ultimate Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Chaos. The Ultimate Dragon can also learn Legend, Pure and  Primal moves.      The Ultimate Dragon is the ultimate attacker. This dragon jumps through universes with the goal to conquer. His multiple horns keep him protected while intimidating his enemies. His attacks are vicious and will make any perpetrator crumble in defeat.

name: Darksteel Dragon
description: The Darksteel Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Darksteel Dragon can also learn Dark, Metal and  Primal moves.      The Darksteel Dragon is highly unpredictable, you never know when he’s going to strike, but when he does it’s pure destruction. Using his sword, he can unleash over 200 million volts of legendary energy leaving his enemies fried.

name: Cake Dragon
description: The Cake Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Cake Dragon can also learn Light, Pure and  Happy moves.      The Cake Dragon isn’t as sweet as he looks. He’s very jealous and if there’s a party going on without him, he’ll show up uninvited. According to him, no celebration is complete without his presence.

name: Knife Dragon
description: The Knife Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Knife Dragon can also learn War, Legend and  Metal moves.      Believe it or not, the Knife Dragon is a gentle creature and loves to help others. With him, you can always have your cake and eat it too because you can always count on him to cut it!

name: Cloudberry Dragon
description: The Cloudberry Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Cloudberry Dragon can also learn Light and  War moves.      The Cloudberry Dragon used to protect the queen’s garden from parasites and sticky fingers looking to eat all her fruit, that is until he snuck one too many cloudberries and turned into one himself. Now he only protects himself so no one eats him.

name: Cherimoya Dragon
description: The Cherimoya Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Cherimoya Dragon can also learn Nature, Electric and  Terra moves.      The Cherimoya Dragon is young at heart and loves to play. This jovial dragon thinks life is one giant game of chase and hide and seek. But what he doesn’t know is that he gets chased because everyone thinks he’s fruit and wants to eat him.

name: Sweetest Dragon
description: The Sweetest Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Sweetest Dragon can also learn Terra, Light and  Pure moves.      The Sweetest Dragon can wreak havoc if he wants to. He has a two-ton chest, teeth sharper than knives, and a battle cry loud enough to stop his enemies in their tracks but the truth is: this beast is made of chocolate and is an ooey gooey softie inside.

name: Gelatin Dragon
description: The Gelatin Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Gelatin Dragon can also learn Nature, Sea and  Dark moves.      The Gelatin Dragon might look scary, but he’s one of the sweetest dragons around…literally. This gooey dragon’s fruit-flavored skin contains enough sugar to knock out any opponent.

name: Rambutan Dragon
description: The Rambutan Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Rambutan Dragon can also learn Flame, Nature and  War moves.      The Rambutan Dragon has one of the nicest, well-kept gardens in Dragon City, but don’t even think about trespassing. This aggressive green-fingered beast is very protective of his crops and sleeps with one eye open.

name: Durian Dragon
description: The Durian Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Durian Dragon can also learn Pure, Nature and  Light moves.      There’s no in-between with the Durian Dragon, he’s either loved or hated. This arrogant creature has never lost a battle and lives to boast about it. He’s a troublemaker, never backs down, and will take on any opponent.

name: Samurai Dragon
description: The Samurai Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Samurai Dragon can also learn Dark, Metal and  Light moves.      The Legend Arena, reserved only for elite warriors, is the setting of fabled clashes and where the Samurai Dragon can show off his rigorous military training, mastery of his sword and mythical combat skills. Being defeated by Samurai Dragon can only be seen as honorable.

name: Topaz Dragon
description: The Topaz Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Topaz Dragon can also learn Ice, Terra and  Pure moves.      Keeping the Topaz Dragon happy isn’t that difficult, just tell her she’s the prettiest of all her sisters. This dazzling beast may be a looker, but she’s never too pretty to unleash havoc and will always use her glimmering ways to justify it.

name: Goalie-t Dragon
description: The Goalie-t Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Goalie-t Dragon can also learn Pure, Metal and  Ice moves.      Anyone who thinks the Goalie-T Dragon is cute has already lost. As captain of the champion team, she treats every game like a battle and fools her opponents by pretending her passion is for the love of the game…make no mistake, she’s in it to win it.

name: Unbreakable Dragon
description: The Unbreakable Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Unbreakable Dragon can also learn Pure, Metal and  Terra moves.      Dragons all over Dragon City have placed bets on who will beat the Unbreakable Dragon…so far, no one has won. As the toughest dragon, she’s indestructible inside and out, so anyone looking to destroy her will most likely end up hurting themselves.

name: Warlock Dragon
description: The Warlock Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Warlock Dragon can also learn War, Dark and  Ice moves.      The Warlock Dragon is one of the scariest around, so scary in fact that most people have a hard time believing he isn’t evil. This mighty beast only uses his tremendous powers for good by protecting Dragon City from evil forces.

name: Phantom Dragon
description: The Phantom Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Soul. The Phantom Dragon can also learn Flame, Legend and  Dark moves.      The Phantom Dragon loves new dragons, so much so that he plays pranks on every new dragon that comes to Dragon City. This ghostly creature uses his rag doll as if it was possessed while turning himself invisible. Gets them every time.

name: Ghoul Dragon
description: The Ghoul Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Ghoul Dragon can also learn Terra and  Nature moves.      The Ghoul Dragon lives in an underground swamp and only comes out once a year during Halloween, to scare other dragons and steal their candy. His plan fails every year though because everyone thinks he’s adorable, not scary.

name: Jack-o-lantern Dragon
description: The Jack-o-lantern Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Jack-o-lantern Dragon can also learn Dark, Nature and  Flame moves.      It’s the revenge of the Jack-o’-Lantern Dragon. This creepy creature fell victim to Halloween pranks as a baby dragon, one too many times. Since then, he’s carved his own magical jack-o’-lantern to terrorize other dragons 365 days of the year.

name: Usurper Dragon
description: The Usurper Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Usurper Dragon can also learn Electric, War and  Metal moves.      The Usurper Dragon is not of this world. Coming from the multiverse, this curious dragon causes quite the commotion in Dragon City. From his peculiar ways, to his unbelievable powers and intergalactic attacks in battle.

name: Trihorn Dragon
description: The Trihorn Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Trihorn Dragon can also learn Dark, Light and  War moves.      The Trihorn Dragon is a fatal beast with a fatal mission: conquer the Dragonverse. If he is to be beaten, he is to be studied. He attacks instinctually and uses his third horn as a third eye to pick up the energy of his surroundings.

name: Dimensional Dragon
description: The Dimensional Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Dimensional Dragon can also learn Dark and  Terra moves.      Here one moment, gone the next: this is the life of the Dimensional Dragon. This charming dragon spends her time darting through dimensions. If you’re up against her in battle, don’t be surprised if she suddenly disappears in the blink of an eye.

name: Calaca Dragon
description: The Calaca Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Calaca Dragon can also learn Dark and  Nature moves.      The Calaca Dragon is the master of fright. This terrifying dragon creeps around Dragon City hiding in corners waiting for the chance to jump out when it’s least expected. If that doesn’t scare you, his attacks will.

name: Calaverina Dragon
description: The Calaverina Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Calaverina Dragon can also learn Dark, Light and  Flame moves.      The Calaverina Dragon can communicate with dragons across any universe and her services are highly requested. However, in order to do so, she must be dressed to the nines, and that can take a while. But when she’s finally finished she always looks amazing!

name: Equilibrium Dragon
description: The Equilibrium Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Equilibrium Dragon can also learn Light and  Ice moves.      The Equilibrium Dragon always plays nice and shows up when there’s conflict in Dragon City. This sweet dragon fights for justice and peace. If he gets wind of any tension, he’s there front and center to help resolve the issue.

name: Grove Dragon
description: The Grove Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Grove Dragon can also learn Primal and  Light moves.      The Grove Dragon sees the best in everyone, is one of the best encouragers, and has no problem making friends. He lives in the Alliance Fort and spends most of his time cheering Alliances on. He wants everyone to win!

name: Defense-t Dragon
description: The Defense-t Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Defense-t Dragon can also learn Electric and  Dark moves.      The Defense-T Dragon is the last line of defense and takes his role very seriously. He lets nothing past, has a take-no-prisoners approach, and is impossible to beat. He’s never intimidated and his four arms mean he’s even more accurate.

name: Catacombs Dragon
description: The Catacombs Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Catacombs Dragon can also learn Terra and  Primal moves.      The Catacombs Dragon may look dead, but he’s not! As the guardian of the underground temples, he has fail-proof strategies and there’s nothing he won’t do to protect the infamous dragons from centuries past.

name: Outlaw Dragon
description: The Outlaw Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Outlaw Dragon can also learn Metal, Dark and  Electric moves.      The Outlaw Dragon travels within the multiverse searching for resources he can steal to make himself more powerful. Precaution must be taken as this ominous creature will do anything to conquer, even if it means taking things that aren’t his.

name: Blacksmith Dragon
description: The Blacksmith Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Blacksmith Dragon can also learn Terra, Legend and  War moves.      When the Blacksmith Dragon is around it’s wise to tread lightly. This fiery dragon has a short temper and is extremely volatile. He doesn’t wait for explanations in order to attack, he just unleashes his fury on anything that comes close.

name: Chariot Dragon
description: The Chariot Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Chariot Dragon can also learn Metal, Terra and  Primal moves.      Word on the islands is that the Chariot Dragon is from a large metropolitan city. However, this country dragon has got a twang, likes to take life slow, and tries to convince everyone that there’s more Gold to the west of Dragon City.

name: Side-t Dragon
description: The Side-t Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Side-t Dragon can also learn Sea and  Pure moves.      The Side-T Dragon defies science and has the most endurance in Dragon City. This peppy dragon can survive on very little sleep and the word ‘fatigue’ isn’t even in his vocabulary. Any dragon up against him is usually exhausted within minutes.

name: Juventas Dragon
description: The Juventas Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Juventas Dragon can also learn Electric, Ice and  Metal moves.      If the Juventas Dragon looks young, it’s because she is. All dragons on the search to look forever young end up on her doorstep. She has powers to restore youth to any dragon, but she does nothing for free and will always ask for a favor in return.

name: Multidimensional Dragon
description: The Multidimensional Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Multidimensional Dragon can also learn Electric, Dark and  Legend moves.      The Multidimensional Dragon is connected to all the realms within the Dragonverse. He can locate any dragon on command. If dragons are looking for a nice vacation, they better inform this dragon first, or else there will be a search out for them.

name: Scorer-t Dragon
description: The Scorer-t Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Scorer-t Dragon can also learn Flame, Light and  War moves.      If anyone can bring a whole team back from nearly losing, it’s the Scorer-T Dragon. He’s the star of any team he’s on and has enough confidence to fill a stadium. This skillful dragon isn’t afraid to take risks to push the team to number one.

name: Redeemer Dragon
description: The Redeemer Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Redeemer Dragon can also learn Primal, War and  Legend moves.      The Redeemer Dragon used to turn red whenever he was angry and ready to go wild in battle. Now, this hot-headed beast makes baby dragons cry, is permanently red, and is always on the search for new enemies to destroy.

name: Bubblegum Dragon
description: The Bubblegum Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Bubblegum Dragon can also learn Nature and  Pure moves.      The Bubblegum Dragon found a way to turn his sweet tooth into a fierce force for battle. Beware of this cunning creature, his ploy is leaving sticky traps around the islands to capture his enemies, giving him time to craft the perfect attack.

name: Vicky Dragon
description: The Vicky Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Vicky Dragon can also learn Legend, Light and  Pure moves.      The Vicky Dragon is the spitting image of her mother, Viktoria, with all the charm and charisma of her father, Viktor. She’s impossible not to love and is used to getting her way because she has every dragon wrapped around her little finger.

name: Horai Dragon
description: The Horai Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Horai Dragon can also learn Flame, Ice and  Nature moves.      The Horai Dragon is the protector of seasons. This loveable dragon loves them all and knows the importance of having all four in Dragon City. This is why she goes out of her way to make sure not a single one is in jeopardy.

name: Hyperion Dragon
description: The Hyperion Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Hyperion Dragon can also learn War, Flame and  Primal moves.      The Hyperion Dragon is so massive that he can come across as scary, but this enormous creature has been protecting dragons for centuries. The Dragons of Seasons can attest, he will come to the aid of any dragon that needs him.

name: Zephyrus Dragon
description: The Zephyrus Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Zephyrus Dragon can also learn Nature, Electric and  Terra moves.      Every spring, the Zephyrus Dragon places fresh flowers in all the habitats and encourages every dragon to stop and smell the roses. This cheerful dragon believes in taking breaks for rejuvenation and finding balance, which makes him the most focused dragon.

name: Notus Dragon
description: The Notus Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Notus Dragon can also learn Flame, Terra and  Sea moves.      The Notus Dragon is a major player in bringing summer to Dragon City. He gets a lot of requests from dragons to bring summer early so the beach parties and fun in the sun can start early. But this wise dragon knows there’s a reason for every season!

name: Eurus Dragon
description: The Eurus Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Eurus Dragon can also learn Flame and  Terra moves.      Fall is the season for the Eurus Dragon. This amber creature loves the crisp breeze and the cool autumn colors. She makes crowns for everyone to wear and forces other dragons to sit around the fire, eat roasted chestnuts, and drink hot cider.

name: Uppercut Dragon
description: The Uppercut Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Uppercut Dragon can also learn Sea, Electric and  Nature moves.      The Uppercut Dragon is known for one move, and one move only. However, although he’s only got a single move up his sleeve, it’s really all he needs. With one blow, this dragon will have his enemies on the floor in defeat.

name: Scrapper Dragon
description: The Scrapper Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Scrapper Dragon can also learn Legend, Pure and  Primal moves.      The Scrapper Dragon is a destructive beast who channels energy from the universe through his metal armor and uses it to take out his opponents. His temper cannot be tamed and his claws are sharp enough to slice through metal.

name: Landslide Dragon
description: The Landslide Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Landslide Dragon can also learn Terra, Sea and  War moves.      Keep careful watch of the Landslide Dragon. She’s a planner and every move is meticulously mapped out. She watches her enemies, quietly plotting until she’s ready to strike, which she will do without any warning.

name: Contender Dragon
description: The Contender Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Contender Dragon can also learn Legend, Electric and  War moves.      The Contender Dragon is the reigning champ in Dragon City and loves to show off his belt. He is always up for battle, anywhere, anyhow. Each year he comes out with a signature move, each one more destructive than the last.

name: Brawl Dragon
description: The Brawl Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Brawl Dragon can also learn Metal, Flame and  Sea moves.      The Brawl Dragon loves a good scuffle. He goes around Dragon City looking for trouble and lives for the roar of the crowd. When he’s not scouting enemies to destroy, he’s in the gym working on becoming stronger for the next battle.

name: Grapple Dragon
description: The Grapple Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Grapple Dragon can also learn Primal and  Flame moves.      Many are intimidated by the Grapple Dragon, and that’s just the way he likes it. With his enormous muscles and powerful horns, this dragon is a big bully and uses scare tactics to frighten his enemies away.

name: Uller Dragon
description: The Uller Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Uller Dragon can also learn Legend, Sea and  War moves.      The Uller Dragon comes from the peaks of one of the coldest, highest mountains. Instead of fur, he was born with sharp ice crystals, which he uses as weapons. His most coveted one is on top of his head, and he will charge without hesitation.

name: Boreas Dragon
description: The Boreas Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Boreas Dragon can also learn Ice, Dark and  Sea moves.      The Boreas Dragon helps bring winter to Dragon City. He may be responsible for the cold, but dragons love him because he’s also responsible for the winter wonderland atmosphere on the islands, consisting of snow, pretty twinkly lights, and winter activities.

name: Lunatic Dragon
description: The Lunatic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Lunatic Dragon can also learn Electric, War and  Flame moves.      The Lunatic Dragon had one job: guard the mysterious machine. But when his curiosity got the best of him, he pulled the trigger... more than once. Now he’s absolutely insane and anything can set him off, making his moves unpredictable.

name: Heartbroken Dragon
description: The Heartbroken Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Heartbroken Dragon can also learn Pure, Ice and  Dark moves.      Every dragon must feel the bitter wrath of the Heartbroken Dragon. He used to be trusting of other dragons until he suffered tremendous heartbreak by the betrayal of an ally. Now he keeps his heart on his back and is slow to trust.

name: Gurkul Dragon
description: The Gurkul Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Gurkul Dragon can also learn Ice, Dark and  Electric moves.      The Gurkul Dragon spent most of his life as a bodyguard dragon, looking after various kings and queens. Now, he only protects himself, but he’s always on the lookout for danger and will extend himself to be a safeguard for any dragon that needs it.

name: Pyrotechnic Dragon
description: The Pyrotechnic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Pyrotechnic Dragon can also learn Legend, Light and  Electric moves.      The Pyrotechnic Dragon has a fascination with explosives. He either uses this fascination to create extraordinary firework shows that light up the skies of the island, or to detonate his adversaries.

name: Gunpowder Dragon
description: The Gunpowder Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Gunpowder Dragon can also learn Dark, Electric and  War moves.      The Gunpowder Dragon is a big fan of New Year’s. It’s his favorite time of the year and the only time he doesn’t get yelled at by other dragons for tossing explosives into the air.

name: Firecracker Dragon
description: The Firecracker Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Firecracker Dragon can also learn Light and  Pure moves.      The Firecracker Dragon is always ready for any occasion and does everything with a bang. She will light up any dragon’s mood and everyone knows that celebrations are not the same without her.

name: Glint Dragon
description: The Glint Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Glint Dragon can also learn Pure, Nature and  Legend moves.      The Glint Dragon is a hefty beast, but hes agile and fully protected. His pointed horns are weapons, even when hes just moving his head. And the sharp shards of metal on his back will cut any opponent if they come close.

name: Furfur Dragon
description: The Furfur Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Furfur Dragon can also learn Light, Sea and  Dark moves.      The Furfur Dragon is from the thick, tropical rainforest and is at one with nature. This shy, bushy dragon prefers to seek her enemies out behind the comfort of green thickets and robust trees making her the queen of camouflage.

name: Brave Dragon
description: The Brave Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Brave Dragon can also learn Metal, War and  Light moves.      The Brave Dragon was tired of seeing her best friend, the Side-T Dragon, teased for his high energy, so she decided to do something about it, she stood up for him. Since then, she’s made the promise to stand up for all dragons.

name: Root Dragon
description: The Root Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Root Dragon can also learn Nature, Terra and  Sea moves.      The Root Dragon loves to explore, is highly instinctual, and lets nature be his guide. This composed dragon only enters into battle when peace is at risk and navigates his way through the universes using his trusty staff.

name: Trend Dragon
description: The Trend Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Trend Dragon can also learn Dark and  Flame moves.      The Trend Dragon is the best-dressed dragon and has her finger on the pulse of everything new and fashionable on the islands. From the hottest Dragon Skins to the coolest Habitat decorations, she’s the go-to girl for all things swanky.

name: Terraformer Dragon
description: The Terraformer Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Terraformer Dragon can also learn Nature, Light and  Dark moves.      The Terraformer Dragon is a controversial figure. He searches the galaxies for new planets and claims that if dragons put their powers together, they can alter planets’ structures to support dragon life, thus allowing dragons to take over the universe.

name: Aquarelle Dragon
description: The Aquarelle Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Aquarelle Dragon can also learn Sea, Ice and  Light moves.      The Aquarelle Dragon has a knack for turning things around. Whenever there are dark times in Dragon City, she will cheer everyone up and make it better. This radiant dragon made a pact with Deus that she would always keep the islands bright and colorful.

name: Gouache Dragon
description: The Gouache Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Gouache Dragon can also learn Sea, Electric and  Terra moves.      The Gouache Dragon is a troublemaker, prankster, and the ultimate instigator. This mischievous dragon is constantly causing trouble for her own entertainment and thinks she’s slick, but she always leaves a trail.

name: Tempera Dragon
description: The Tempera Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Tempera Dragon can also learn Sea and  Dark moves.      The Tempera Dragon struts her stuff around Dragon City and thinks she’s in high demand because she’s worked with some of the world’s most famous artists. If her brushes aren’t washed and her canvases are not ready she will release her rage.

name: Init Dragon
description: The Init Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Init Dragon can also learn Flame, Metal and  War moves.      The Init Dragon is the self-proclaimed king of destruction. This beast is very combative and never backs away from a good battle. But he isn’t just all bulk and no brain, he’s clever and uses strategy to trick his opponents.

name: Millium Dragon
description: The Millium Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Millium Dragon can also learn Dark, Legend and  Soul moves.      The combined wishes of all Dragon Masters made the Millium Dragon real! As the thousandth dragon in the Dragon Book, he incarnates the history of Dragon City and opens a new era to come.

name: Decay Dragon
description: The Decay Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Decay Dragon can also learn Terra, Primal and  Metal moves.      The Decay Dragon is known for two things: His ominous energy and his toxic touch. Dragons keep their distance because it’s been said that everything he touches will immediately begin to decompose and waste away.

name: Cursedglow Dragon
description: The Cursedglow Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Cursedglow Dragon can also learn Dark, Ice and  Electric moves.      The Cursedglow Dragon is an agitator and is used to being a walking target for danger. This cocky dragon has a high threshold for pain, is always looking over his shoulder, doesn’t shy away from a battle, and has an eye for every occasion.

name: Spaceship Dragon
description: The Spaceship Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Spaceship Dragon can also learn Flame, Metal and  War moves.      The Spaceship Dragon wanted to go to the moon, so she built her own spaceship. Unfortunately, it didn’t have enough power to get there, but it was perfect for battles. Watch out for this laser blasting dragon!

name: Zhu Dragon
description: The Zhu Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Zhu Dragon can also learn Light and  Terra moves.      Normally, the Zhu Dragon is covered in mud and oinking around but since he knew it was Chinese New Year, he decided to spruce up a bit. This friendly creature invites everyone to come and celebrate in his temple.

name: Football Dragon
description: The Football Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Football Dragon can also learn Nature and  War moves.      There’s no greater fan of football than the Football Dragon. From historical touchdowns and fouls to running backs and quarterbacks, this dragon knows it all! He tried to join a team once, but he was terrible, so now he just dresses the part.

name: Whimsical Dragon
description: The Whimsical Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Whimsical Dragon can also learn Dark, Metal and  Terra moves.      The Whimsical Dragon is an unpredictable fierce attacker. Slow to attack, this relentless dragon hangs back to scope out his enemies, but they will never know when or where he will strike. And when he does, he is sure not to miss.

name: Spleenful Dragon
description: The Spleenful Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Spleenful Dragon can also learn Ice, Terra and  War moves.      Many dragons think that the Spleenful Dragon is hard on the outside and mushy on the inside, but that’s not the case. This snide dragon only likes to be alone and doesn’t believe in allies. He wears protective, spiky armor to ward off…everyone.

name: Book Dragon
description: The Book Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Book Dragon can also learn Nature, Legend and  Light moves.      The Book Dragon never loses a battle, what’s his secret? Unlimited knowledge. This brainy dragon knows all the secrets and best techniques. He’s dedicated his life to learning all there is to know about being the best and most powerful dragon.

name: Cupcake Dragon
description: The Cupcake Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Cupcake Dragon can also learn Pure and  Nature moves.      Life can be a bit tough for the Cupcake Dragon because every dragon wants to eat her, and they get upset when they can’t. Although she spends most of her time dodging sharp dragon teeth, she’s usually a good sport.

name: Admirer Dragon
description: The Admirer Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Admirer Dragon can also learn Pure and  Light moves.      The Admirer Dragon is the king of discreet and wants every dragon to feel special. Any dragon with a crush relies on this jolly creature to deliver gifts, candy, and letters to their special crush without disclosing their identity.

name: Overshadow Dragon
description: The Overshadow Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Overshadow Dragon can also learn Dark, War and  Metal moves.      The Overshadow Dragon is chilling and eerie. His battle tactics are simple: He lurks behind habitats and decorations to scare other dragons and while they try to recover from fright, he slips into his empty armor for battle.

name: President Dragon
description: The President Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The President Dragon can also learn Terra, Light and  Metal moves.      The President Dragon is the self-proclaimed president of Dragon City. Other dragons don’t mind because he always delivers on his campaign promises: Nice, big habitats and fresh tomatoes!

name: Vibrant Dragon
description: The Vibrant Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Vibrant Dragon can also learn Sea and  Flame moves.      When dragons are looking for an adventure, they call on the Vibrant Dragon. This vivid creature is never tired, always looking for the next venture, and will try anything at least once.

name: Mischievous Dragon
description: The Mischievous Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Mischievous Dragon can also learn Legend, Sea and  Nature moves.      The Mischievous Dragon is known for his bright colors, love of the sea, and trickster ways, but this fancy dragon has a bad reputation of showing off. However, what comes across as pride, is a powerful defense mechanism used to deter attackers.

name: Precious Dragon
description: The Precious Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Precious Dragon can also learn Pure, Ice and  Flame moves.      The Precious Dragon is one tough cookie, but when battles get too intense, she likes to go to her happy places. If you’re looking for her, she’s sure to be found in any small space thats filled with shiny objects.

name: Mime Dragon
description: The Mime Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Mime Dragon can also learn Terra and  Electric moves.      The Mime Dragon has always been the dragon of the party. He loves to tell silent stories and entertain a crowd. However, he’s not to be taken lightly. He likes to confuse other dragons in battle with ambiguous gestures so he can come out with the win.

name: Noble Dragon
description: The Noble Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Noble Dragon can also learn Light, Sea and  Electric moves.      The Noble Dragon took it upon herself to protect smaller dragons to ensure that they don’t get picked on. With her vibrant mane and floating pearl crown, this impressive dragon can’t help but demand attention whenever shes walking into a Habitat.

name: Katera Dragon
description: The Katera Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Katera Dragon can also learn War, Sea and  Dark moves.      Rumor has it that the Katera Dragon worked with the Battler Dragon and was the real mastermind behind the illegal underground battle arena. However, this has never been confirmed because if asked, this vicious creature will strike with his blades.

name: Platform Dragon
description: The Platform Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Platform Dragon can also learn Light, Flame and  Beauty moves.      The Platform Dragon always wanted to be a tall, adult dragon so she could prance around in platform heels. But, when she grew up, she remained small. To make up for lost time, she lives in a giant heel and makes the battlefield her ultimate runway.

name: Impure Dragon
description: The Impure Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Impure Dragon can also learn Pure and  Flame moves.      The Impure Dragon has an agenda to undo all the good deeds of the Pure Dragon. This fierce creature likes to bring the doom and gloom and hates seeing peaceful and happy dragons. Any good deed he’s ever done has always been by accident.

name: Youthful Dragon
description: The Youthful Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Youthful Dragon can also learn Pure, Light and  Electric moves.      The Youthful Dragon is known for his experimentation and is always tinkering with the newest devices. This energetic creature looks up to the Elder dragon and takes notes from him. He always adds his own, modern spin to all his advice.

name: Elder Dragon
description: The Elder Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Elder Dragon can also learn Pure, Light and  Terra moves.      The Elder Dragon has taken the Youthful Dragon under his wing. He shares everything from his best-kept battle secrets to his list of where the ripest tomatoes are. In his eyes, a win for one of them is a win for both!

name: Home Dragon
description: The Home Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Home Dragon can also learn Pure and  Terra moves.      The Home Dragon wanted to get out and explore the multiverse but there was one small problem: She knew she would miss home. So this resourceful dragon did what anyone would do…She brought it with her.

name: Village Dragon
description: The Village Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Village Dragon can also learn Terra, Nature and  Metal moves.      When the Nemesis Dragons were threatening winter in Dragon City, the Village Dragon wanted to help, so he built a village to host dragons. Now he’s the go-to dragon for all emergencies.

name: Castle Dragon
description: The Castle Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Castle Dragon can also learn Terra, War and  Dark moves.      Who doesn’t love a beautiful castle? That’s exactly what the Castle Dragon wants his enemies to think. This sneaky dragon is the master of disguise and doesn’t have to do much to lead his enemies into his trap! Once they’re inside, there’s virtually no escaping.

name: Maki Dragon
description: The Maki Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Maki Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      The Maki Dragon might seem small, cute, and bite-sized, but this petite dragon’s damage is bigger than her size. They say she sleeps with her one eye open and never lets an enemy escape.

name: Pythoness Dragon
description: The Pythoness Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Pythoness Dragon can also learn Flame, Terra and  Nature moves.      The Pythoness Dragon is the resident fortune teller in Dragon City. Dragons flock to her to find out what the future has in store for them. She’s steadfast in her readings though and if dragons disagree, they may have to face her in battle.

name: Nigiri Dragon
description: The Nigiri Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Nigiri Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      The Nigiri Dragon used to get really nervous before battles. But since focusing his energy, he’s now a ball of excitement and hard to beat. Most of the time this charming dragon wins just due to his pure joy.

name: Tempura Dragon
description: The Tempura Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Tempura Dragon can also learn War and  Sea moves.      The Tempura Dragon is a loyal and friendly dragon! This goofy creature gets along with everyone and loves to have fun. He often mistakes battles for playtime, which is part of his charm.

name: Onigiri Dragon
description: The Onigiri Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Onigiri Dragon can also learn Legend, Sea and  Pure moves.      The Onigiri Dragon is the one who taught the Nigiri Dragon how to focus his energy and not be nervous in battle. This solid beast isn’t a gentle giant nor is he soft and squishy.
