He is a colossal dragon with the aim to win any arena he steps into.

name: Electron Dragon
description: The Electron Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Electron Dragon can also learn Terra, Metal and  Pure moves.      The Electron Dragon is a science whiz and known for this methodical skills. When dragons are stuck between multiverses he’s usually the one to rescue them. He disappears for weeks at a time but no one panics because they know that he’s likely out gathering data.

name: Glace Dragon
description: The Glace Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Glace Dragon can also learn Ice, Metal and  War moves.      The Glace Dragon is a tough opponent and his enemies’ worst nightmare. This jagged dragon has a solid exterior to keep him protected at all times and his mouth is always filled with spiky ammunition, ready for any attacker.

name: Troll Dragon
description: The Troll Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Troll Dragon can also learn Terra and  War moves.      The Troll Dragon is old fashioned, perpetually grumpy, and never satisfied. This cranky creature has been in Dragon City a long time and always has the same mission: win every battle. He refuses help from younger dragons because he wants victory for himself.

name: Tentacle Dragon
description: The Tentacle Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Tentacle Dragon can also learn Sea, Electric and  Pure moves.      The Tentacle Dragon is a dangerous one. This fatal dragon is protected at all times. Sometimes she accidentally stuns other dragons just because they’ve gotten too close. She usually keeps to herself and can be seen floating in water habitats.

name: Dust Dragon
description: The Dust Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Dust Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      The Dust Dragon’s body is made of the earth’s finest jewels and minerals, but that’s really of no importance to him. This lazy dragon just wants a solitary life of peace and quiet and will start an avalanche if he is disturbed.

name: Baker Dragon
description: The Baker Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Baker Dragon can also learn Flame, Light and  Nature moves.      The Baker Dragon runs a bakery right by the farms on the floating islands. Hes famous for the enormous cake he bakes every year around Dragon Citys Anniversary. Its big enough for every dragon in the city to grab a slice!

name: Chibi-chum Dragon
description: The Chibi-chum Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Chibi-chum Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      For years, the Chibi-Chum Dragon thought that he was strange because he couldn’t make his horn grow. But as he grew older he discovered that he wasn’t weird, he was special: When he wins battles, his horn grows!

name: Chibi-chief Dragon
description: The Chibi-chief Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Chibi-chief Dragon can also learn Terra and  War moves.      The Chibi-Chief Dragon can be heard before he’s seen. This mighty dragon is not only a vicious attacker, but he’s also the ultimate lookout. He uses his distinctive call to warn his allies when he sees danger coming.

name: Chibi-chomp Dragon
description: The Chibi-chomp Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Chibi-chomp Dragon can also learn Flame, Terra and  Dark moves.      The Chibi-Chomp Dragon is already fierce and destructive by nature so imagine what he must be like when enemies attack the one thing he’s hyper-protective of: His little brother, The Chibi-Chum Dragon. He will go to the next level to defend his brother.

name: Chibi-churl Dragon
description: The Chibi-churl Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Chibi-churl Dragon can also learn Nature, War and  Flame moves.      The Chibi-Churl Dragon has worked his way up the ranks to become a boss dragon. This fire breathing beast is very demanding and expects everyone to fall in line. His attacks are so powerful, he can destroy an enemy with very little effort.

name: Wildfire Dragon
description: The Wildfire Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Wildfire Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      The Wildfire Dragon is a tumultuous beast with an inferno at his claws and fire pumping through his blood. All dragons keep their distance because this fierce dragon will use any excuse to attack an enemy, no questions asked.

name: Soda Dragon
description: The Soda Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Soda Dragon can also learn Dark and  Ice moves.      The Soda Dragon has an addiction to soda. Some say that he loves it so much, it runs through his veins. He says he can’t live without it and believes the sweet, carbonated drink is his secret weapon behind his wins in battle.

name: Binge Dragon
description: The Binge Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Binge Dragon can also learn Dark, War and  Electric moves.      When the Binge Dragon is into something, he goes all the way. Right now, this indulgent creature is obsessed with 3-D movies and won’t stop until he’s seen every last one. He’ll buy the movie snacks for any dragon that wants to join.

name: Doughnut Dragon
description: The Doughnut Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Doughnut Dragon can also learn Terra and  War moves.      Years ago, the Doughnut Dragon pasted sprinkles on himself to play a prank on his habitat. The prank worked, but he couldn’t remove the sprinkles. Now he permanently looks like a doughnut and tries his best to avoid getting eaten.

name: Burger Dragon
description: The Burger Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Burger Dragon can also learn Terra, Dark and  Nature moves.      The Burger Dragon is the greediest of all dragons and has a hunger that is almost impossible to satisfy. This ravenous beast is known for his atrocious table manners and his ability to swallow anything in his sight…including other dragons.

name: Mechano Dragon
description: The Mechano Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Mechano Dragon can also learn Electric, Dark and  Legend moves.      Made from the most advanced technology in the Milky Way, the Mechano Dragons robotic suit gives him extendable limbs with immense crushing power. For him, traveling through rough terrains is a piece of cake. Dragon and machine have become one!

name: Stardust Dragon
description: The Stardust Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Stardust Dragon can also learn Dark, Electric and  War moves.      The Stardust Dragon is the best friend of the Starhunter Dragon. When hes not accompanying his friend on the search for stars, he likes to dig in the space dust. Any precious crystals or gems that he finds are safely stored in his vessel.

name: Starhunter Dragon
description: The Starhunter Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Starhunter Dragon can also learn War moves.      The Starhunter Dragon will stop at nothing to collect a piece of every shooting star in the universe. The samples are used to power his space lasers, resulting in intense blasts that can scorch the battlefield. Dont get in his way!

name: Ufo Dragon
description: The Ufo Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Ufo Dragon can also learn Terra and  Electric moves.      Whether its creating crop circles or abducting farm animals, the UFO Dragon is always causing mischief! He is an expert at navigating the galaxies and his interdimensional spaceship holds more cosmic power than you think!

name: Boggy Dragon
description: The Boggy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Boggy Dragon can also learn Light, Nature and  War moves.      At first glance, the Boggy Dragon comes across as lush and tranquil, but in reality, he is slimy and mucky. He plays dirty in battle and uses strategies from the Wilderness Dragon like using his elements to distract his enemies.

name: Wilderness Dragon
description: The Wilderness Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Wilderness Dragon can also learn Dark, Flame and  War moves.      Just by looking at the Wilderness Dragon, it’s apparent that he’s capable of serious damage. This deadly beast serves up intense windstorms that will throw any enemy off their feet. He’s an unpredictable and quick force, which makes him difficult to beat.

name: Seashore Dragon
description: The Seashore Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Seashore Dragon can also learn Terra, Light and  Nature moves.      The Seashore Dragon may look carefree on the outside, but one pounce of his front paws results in a giant tsunami washing away his enemies. Outside of battle, he enjoys soaking up the sun and drinking from the coconuts that grow on his head.

name: Scarab Dragon
description: The Scarab Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Scarab Dragon can also learn Pure, Light and  Flame moves.      Using his magic bell, the Scarab Dragon can control every insect in the universe and summon lethal swarms that surround the enemy. His golden armor and enchanted sword give him the upper hand when in battle.

name: Lachlan Dragon
description: The Lachlan Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Lachlan Dragon can also learn Pure, Light and  Metal moves.      A fan favorite on DragonTube! Our favorite Australian Dragon can always be seen wearing his signature lightning bolt, along with his millions of fans! His high-energy videos are super popular and tons of fun!

name: Tank Dragon
description: The Tank Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Tank Dragon can also learn Metal, Flame and  Terra moves.      The Tank Dragon may look cute, but dont let her looks fool you! Her trusty tank has serious firepower and can blast enemies from the battlefield! Nothing has ever been able to stop her when shes on the move.

name: Techno Dragon
description: The Techno Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Techno Dragon can also learn War, Flame and  Dark moves.      This young rebel of a dragon has a thirst for danger and craves adrenaline. The Techno Dragon can be seen speeding around Dragon City...blink and youll miss him! His trusty motorbike is small but fast and his robotic limbs give him the advantage in battle.

name: Shelly Dragon
description: The Shelly Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Shelly Dragon can also learn Terra moves.      The Shelly Dragon is known for having the kindest heart in Dragon City. She is always helping her friends and looking after them, her shell is full of love. Dont expect her to arrive on time, though! She walks very slowly!

name: Kai-croc Dragon
description: The Kai-croc Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Kai-croc Dragon can also learn Pure, Nature and  Sea moves.      The Kai-Croc Dragon is known for being laid back and doesn’t take life too seriously, but this doesn’t mean that he has no bite. This easy-going dragon will snap at anything that stands in the way of his downtime.

name: Bucky Dragon
description: The Bucky Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Bucky Dragon can also learn Nature and  Electric moves.      One of the cutest dragons in Dragon City! The Bucky Dragon loves playing with his friend the Shelly Dragon on their play dates. His big eyes and floppy ears make him a popular addition to a Dragon Masters collection!

name: Fishmonger Dragon
description: The Fishmonger Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Fishmonger Dragon can also learn Sea, Metal and  Terra moves.      The Fishmonger Dragon has spent years training underwater with the fish and now hes ready for battle! He uses secret, aquatic fighting techniques with ropes and hooks, although swordfish are his favorite weapon!

name: Kitty Dragon
description: The Kitty Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Kitty Dragon can also learn Flame, Light and  Metal moves.      The Kitty Dragon wears a beautiful purple bow to match her fur and can usually be found playing with the Doggy Dragon, although not when hes in the pond! She doesnt like water but will happily laze around by the side, looking for fish to catch!

name: Stone Dragon
description: The Stone Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Stone Dragon can also learn Pure, Sea and  Nature moves.      The Stone Dragon looks like a cuddly, soft stuffed animal. Because of this, all her enemies tend to underestimate her. But this strong dragon is pure stone which helps her not only defeat enemies, but keeps her protected from extreme weather.

name: Doggy Dragon
description: The Doggy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Doggy Dragon can also learn Ice, Dark and  Metal moves.      The Doggy Dragon is a Dragon Masters best friend! A powerful, yet adorable dragon that is always by your side. He is always loyal to his friends. He loves to play fetch and go paddling in the pond. Watch out for his wet kisses!

name: Fun Dragon
description: The Fun Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Fun Dragon can also learn Flame and  Terra moves.      The Fun Dragon is always the life of the party! He is a jolly fellow who prefers to relax, or better float, in his swimming pool all day long! Everyone wants to be his friend because hes just so fun!

name: Joy Dragon
description: The Joy Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Joy Dragon can also learn Electric, Nature and  Metal moves.      With his dashing bow tie and charming mask, the Joy Dragon quite literally is a bundle of joy! Even on rainy days not a dull moment is had with this guy. Known for his famous fruity punch, he is the perfect party planner!

name: Happiness Dragon
description: The Happiness Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Happy. The Happiness Dragon can also learn Legend, Light and  War moves.      This gentle giant is always finding an excuse to party! The Happiness Dragon has his party poppers at the ready for any special occasion, and who could resist? His infectious smile always brightens up the room.

name: Maxauron Dragon
description: The Maxauron Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Maxauron Dragon can also learn Metal, Ice and  War moves.      The Maxauron Dragon was born with sharp spikes and massive arms. As a baby dragon, he used to get teased, but now his large arms are his best asset. One little tap will have any enemy knocked over and defeated!

name: Past Dragon
description: The Past Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Past Dragon can also learn Terra, Nature and  Flame moves.      Long lost partner of the Future Dragon, the Past Dragon knows everything that has ever happened. He has witnessed the good and bad in the world but now just wants to live in the moment. What will happen when he meets his twin from the future?

name: Future Dragon
description: The Future Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Future Dragon can also learn Metal, Ice and  Electric moves.      Long lost partner of the Past Dragon, the Future Dragon can foresee everything that will ever happen. He used to use his abilities for personal gain, but now hes on a quest to find his partner. What will happen when past and future collide?

name: Neo-kumagai Dragon
description: The Neo-kumagai Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Neo-kumagai Dragon can also learn Electric, Sea and  Light moves.      This rebel is young at heart and is always up for a playful battle with her friends. However, when the Neo-Kumagai Dragon gets serious, she can emit powerful beams of light energy using her very own laser inventions.

name: Raider Dragon
description: The Raider Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Raider Dragon can also learn Metal, Flame and  Electric moves.      The Raider Dragon and his rider Doug are known for raiding the lands of others. He stops at nothing to defeat his enemies and steal their gold, although theres one puzzle he just cant solve... Where has the Tracker Dragon hidden her treasure?

name: Tracker Dragon
description: The Tracker Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Tracker Dragon can also learn Terra, Ice and  Metal moves.      Sometimes found by the Explorer Dragons side, the Tracker Dragon is the perfect companion when looking for lost treasure! Although, she isnt very materialistic, so some say she has hidden all her valuables somewhere in the Dragonverse...

name: Wind Dragon
description: The Wind Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind.       He may look bulky but this breezy dragon can be seen zooming around the stratosphere! The Wind Dragon can control all the air currents and clouds in the sky.  He uses his attacks from a distance, preferring to blow the enemy away, as opposed to close contact.

name: Explorer Dragon
description: The Explorer Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Explorer Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      The Explorer Dragon fulfills her wanderlust by traveling the lands and sailing the seas! She is able to navigate through any terrain and is prepared to face all types of challenges as well as any dragons that interrupt her expeditions!

name: Raven Dragon
description: The Raven Dragon is a Heroic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Raven Dragon can also learn War and  Legend moves.      A powerful yet misunderstood dragon, its purple energy can tear down mountains. The Raven Dragon has been Nyxs minion for as long as it can remember... But does it really want to fight on the side of evil or is it victim to Nyxs charm?

name: Toy Dragon
description: The Toy Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Toy Dragon can also learn Flame, Light and  Electric moves.      Its always a bundle of fun when the Toy Dragon is around! Even though he has to be wound up every few hours, his infectious smile never seems to fade. He tries to be scary but hes a child at heart.

name: Jewel Dragon
description: The Jewel Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Jewel Dragon can also learn Light, Electric and  Metal moves.      The Jewel Dragon is a true collector and the Bling Dragon’s best friend. This fancy dragon likes to collect jewels and will stick them anywhere she can. Her motto in life is: Everything deserves a bit of shimmer and shine!

name: Psychedelia Dragon
description: The Psychedelia Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Psychedelia Dragon can also learn Legend, Metal and  Ice moves.      Spreading happiness wherever she goes, the Psychedelia Dragon is the queen of good vibes! She prefers to hypnotize her enemies with music and rainbows as opposed to physical attacks. And she certainly rocks that flower crown!

name: Rap Dragon
description: The Rap Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Rap Dragon can also learn Metal, Terra and  Sea moves.      You certainly dont want to get into a rap battle with this one! The Rap Dragon is known for his inventive rap-style as well as his swagger, of which some say he has too much! And if he starts to drop some lyrics about you, his floating stones are heading right for you!

name: K-pop Dragon
description: The K-pop Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The K-pop Dragon can also learn Nature and  Sea moves.      The K-Pop Dragon has the style, the stage presence, and the voice... His dragon fans are crazy about him! His melodic battle strategies are sure to keep the enemy entranced, most likely making them their number 1 fan!

name: Whipper Dragon
description: The Whipper Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Whipper Dragon can also learn Metal, Ice and  Electric moves.      The Whipper Dragons family didn’t worry when she shaved her hair into a mohawk, or when she threw out all her clothes and got completely different ones. Although, when she bought a whip… they started to worry. Their little rebel had become a serious fighter!

name: Kyokushin Dragon
description: The Kyokushin Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Kyokushin Dragon can also learn Pure, War and  Flame moves.      Through hard training, discipline, and self-improvement the Kyokushin Dragon found the "ultimate truth". He focuses this knowledge and energy into skilled fighting techniques that even the biggest dragons are no match for.

name: Chains Dragon
description: The Chains Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Chains Dragon can also learn Metal, Electric and  Flame moves.      The Chains Dragon is a fearsome fighter who shows little mercy. He is skilled in combat using chains and maces... But if youre looking for a way to calm him down, put on his favorite playlist! Hes always happy to show you his new tunes!

name: Crusher Dragon
description: The Crusher Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Crusher Dragon can also learn Primal, War and  Metal moves.      The Crusher Dragon has always had a unique style, and we love him for that! Never afraid to be different, the Crusher Dragon does what he wants when he wants. Dont get caught up in any of his attacks, though, as theyll leave you crushed!

name: Temple Dragon
description: The Temple Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Temple Dragon can also learn Pure, Light and  Flame moves.      The Temple Dragon has been around for thousands of years. It is an ancient beast who has withstood the ravages of time and lived to tell the tale. Although, dont be fooled by its wisdom... You dont want to be in the firing line of its flaming wheels.

name: Hollowtress Dragon
description: The Hollowtress Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Hollowtress Dragon can also learn Pure, Sea and  Metal moves.      A villainous entity who feeds on the luminescence of light dragons. The Hollowtress Dragon converts their energy into dark matter, using it to build her underworld lair, a place where light dragons would be unlucky to wander into. However, the Stellartress Dragon isnt usually far behind.

name: Native Dragon
description: The Native Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Native Dragon can also learn War, Nature and  Electric moves.      The Native Dragon has survived some of the greatest ancient battles. Usually found among other Native Dragons, they can cause lethal stampedes, creating a sea of electric and fire. Nothing can stop this creature when it is on the move.

name: Exotic Dragon
description: The Exotic Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Exotic Dragon can also learn Light and  Terra moves.      The Exotic Dragon is a rarely seen creature, usually found napping in its camouflaged hideout. Dragons believe it is good luck to spot one from a distance, but those who wander too close will have to face a seriously grumpy fellow who doesnt like to be disturbed!

name: Stellartress Dragon
description: The Stellartress Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Stellartress Dragon can also learn Pure, Flame and  Electric moves.      Known as the heroine of light and stars, the Stellartress Dragon developed her luminescent powers from a young age. She plays a crucial role in the defense of younger, innocent light dragons. Defense against what, you may ask? Her arch-nemesis, the Hollowtress Dragon.

name: Prowling Dragon
description: The Prowling Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Prowling Dragon can also learn Primal, Nature and  Terra moves.      A silent hunter whose chosen prey would be lucky to escape... The Prowling Dragon is known for her striped coat, which is rather visible from afar, thats why she became an ambush predator. When you see her ivy stripes, its already too late for you!

name: Sword Dragon
description: The Sword Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Sword Dragon can also learn Legend, Dark and  Flame moves.      The Sword Dragon is rarely sighted, some still believe it is an urban legend... But this majestic dragon is far from just being a made-up story! Its attacks come quick and fast, using its sword that can cut through anything, except perhaps, the shield of the Shield Dragon...

name: Elven Dragon
description: The Elven Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Elven Dragon can also learn Legend and  Nature moves.      Heiress to the throne of the dragon-elven Kingdom, the Elven Dragon is eager to see what lies beyond the confines of her Habitat. She has long-awaited a journey of sorcery and adventure, so after brushing up on her high elven magic, she is ready to face anything.

name: Shield Dragon
description: The Shield Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Shield Dragon can also learn Metal, Ice and  Terra moves.      The Shield Dragon can defend itself against any attack that may come its way. Dragons rarely bother to fight this sturdy opponent as they know its shield is impenetrable. However, there is one dragon that may just be up for the challenge, one that uses its mighty sword...

name: Dwarf Dragon
description: The Dwarf Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Dwarf Dragon can also learn Dark and  Terra moves.      The Dwarf Dragon has always been a fearsome fighter. He has been wielding his trusty axe ever since he was little and now most dragons tend to stay clear from his powerful blows! Being an explorer at heart, what Island will he conquer next?

name: Blaze Dragon
description: The Blaze Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Blaze Dragon can also learn Flame moves.      The Blaze Dragon paints the sky red with its flickering flames, leaving a trail of fire tornadoes in its wake. The resulting ruby sky may look beautiful from afar, but get too close and youre sure to be looking for new eyebrows!

name: Poliwind Dragon
description: The Poliwind Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Poliwind Dragon can also learn Sea moves.      A boisterous amphibian fellow who loves to wallow in shallow swamps and pools. Dont underestimate him though, this creature can whip up water tornadoes and whirlpools in a matter of seconds, leaving the foe soaked and dazed.

name: Pyramid Dragon
description: The Pyramid Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Pyramid Dragon can also learn Light, Flame and  Terra moves.      One of the 7 Wonders dragons, the Pyramid Dragon is an ancient beast that is worshipped by many. Each battle it wins gains it more power, pride, and followers...soon itll have an army at its feet.

name: Android Dragon
description: The Android Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Android Dragon can also learn Electric, Metal and  Ice moves.      The Android Dragon was once a mere pile of scrap metal until the Scientist Dragon came along and constructed a beast of pure metal and energy. It soon learned about its origin and, not wanting to take part in its creators evil plans, left to roam the universe looking for friendship.

name: Savage Dragon
description: The Savage Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Savage Dragon can also learn Flame, Terra and  War moves.      The Savage Dragon is a skilled hunter and battler that has had years of combat experience. Usually found in packs, occasionally along with the Blood Raptor Dragon, it can roast enemies in seconds... Where is the aloe for those burns?!

name: Petra Dragon
description: The Petra Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Petra Dragon can also learn Primal, Light and  Flame moves.      The Petra Dragon is one of the oldest 7 Wonders dragons. It has battled and traveled far and wide, and lived to tell the tale! It may not say much, but other dragons only need to look into its eyes to know it means business.

name: Scientist Dragon
description: The Scientist Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Scientist Dragon can also learn Light, Metal and  Sea moves.      The Scientist Dragon started his life a curious and humble researcher of energy, but when he realized the full potential of his laboratory creations, his motives became much darker. Now he uses his explosive potions to destruct and obliterate.

name: Colosseum Dragon
description: The Colosseum Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Colosseum Dragon can also learn War and  Metal moves.      A brave gladiator who lives for the applause of the crowd, the Colosseum Dragon likes to put on a show when he destroys his enemies. Hes trained his whole life for the ultimate battle and nothing will stop him earning his victory.

name: Mccreamy Dragon
description: The Mccreamy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Mccreamy Dragon can also learn Ice, War and  Flame moves.      The McCreamy Dragon is a fan favorite on DragonTube! This skilled battler is known for his trickshotting abilities that can wipe out any opponent on the field. Watch out for this creamy foe!

name: Kingpin Dragon
description: The Kingpin Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Kingpin Dragon can also learn Metal, Dark and  War moves.      A sworn enemy of the Boss Dragon, the Kingpin Dragon is a mafia rival when it comes to the black market of Food and Gold. He has been rallying up the troops for a big showdown, hopefully resulting in him being the Citys sole kingpin...

name: Gargantuan Dragon
description: The Gargantuan Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Gargantuan Dragon can also learn Light, Sea and  Terra moves.      The sheer size of this beast is enough to ward daring enemies away. The Gargantuan Dragon stands tall above the majority of other dragons and, instead of retaliating, it usually just stands there absorbing attacks, until its foe is tired out.

name: Hotcold Dragon
description: The Hotcold Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Hotcold Dragon can also learn Ice and  Flame moves.      It was a rare occurrence when a dragon egg came into contact with molten lava and freezing water at the exact same time... The egg didnt freeze nor melt, rather the HotCold Dragon was born! This elemental beast is a master of temperatures.

name: Conqueror Dragon
description: The Conqueror Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Conqueror Dragon can also learn War, Light and  Nature moves.      The Conqueror Dragon is one of the mightiest gladiators in Dragon City. Training all his life, he has risen through the ranks and beaten all but one competitor... The Gladiator Dragon! Who will succeed and earn the respect of the crowd?

name: Indigo Dragon
description: The Indigo Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Indigo Dragon can also learn Light, Metal and  Electric moves.      Once wrapped around an opponent, escape is impossible. The Indigo Dragon may look beautiful in appearance but venture too close and youll soon be transfixed by its stare... Gullible prey may even try to catch its mechano-ball.

name: Bonekeeper Dragon
description: The Bonekeeper Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Bonekeeper Dragon can also learn War, Legend and  Nature moves.      Even from an early age, the Bonekeeper Dragon has had a tough life, but hes back and more powerful than ever! Wearing the bones of his ancient ancestors, he channels the energy of the afterlife through his staff and obliterates his opponents.

name: Kabuki Dragon
description: The Kabuki Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Kabuki Dragon can also learn Light, Sea and  Nature moves.      If you come across the rare Kabuki Dragon, youll be mesmerized by his hypnotic movements and melodic tunes...and thats exactly what he wants. Hallucinations soon follow, and before you know it, youre on the floor knocked out cold.

name: Holibreeze Dragon
description: The Holibreeze Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Holibreeze Dragon can also learn Electric, Nature and  Metal moves.      The Holibreeze Dragon is a festive fellow who loves to spread joy, quite literally, around Dragon City. While flying high, he releases treasures from this bell for all the young dragons down below. If youre on his naughty list, though, expect something else!

name: Trident Dragon
description: The Trident Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Trident Dragon can also learn Ice, Sea and  Light moves.      Who will win the battle to become King or Queen of the ocean? The Trident Dragon is the Poseidon Dragons biggest threat... Both have been trying for years to conquer the murky depths and rule over every sea creature. A salty battle is looming!

name: Baubleblast Dragon
description: The Baubleblast Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Baubleblast Dragon can also learn War, Flame and  Terra moves.      He may look festive, but the Baubleblast Dragon is, in fact, one of the most fearsome sky warriors. Using his ornamental bombs, he can blast his way through enemy lines with ease. To refuel, he usually gives the Eggnog Dragon a visit!

name: Swashbuckler Dragon
description: The Swashbuckler Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Swashbuckler Dragon can also learn Metal, Sea and  Dark moves.      Once a young apprentice of the High Marauder Dragon, the Swashbuckler Dragon learned to become one of the most fearsome sailors of the Seven Seas! From island to island she defeats villains with her trusty parrot side-kick and her partner, the Trident Dragon.

name: Blackfrost Dragon
description: The Blackfrost Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Blackfrost Dragon can also learn Pure, Nature and  Dark moves.      The icicles growing on its body have formed naturally over hundreds of years, making this cold-blooded creature one heavy beast! The Blackfrost Dragon leaves sheets of black ice wherever it goes, so be prepared for some slippy terrain when battling this one!

name: Icenodon Dragon
description: The Icenodon Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Icenodon Dragon can also learn Light, Pure and  Primal moves.      The Icenodon Dragon is an ancient creature that has withstood the test of time. Parts of its body are made from never-melting ice - one touch and your fingers would be frozen solid! It uses the water vapor in the air to freeze its enemies.

name: Eggnog Dragon
description: The Eggnog Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Happy. The Eggnog Dragon can also learn Pure, Light and  Ice moves.      If the Eggnog Dragon shares his eggnog with you, then that must mean youre "egg-stra special" to him! They say that he has a secret recipe that makes him stronger in battle...

name: Stocking Dragon
description: The Stocking Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Happy. The Stocking Dragon can also learn Legend, Light and  Terra moves.      Big things come in small packages! The Stocking Dragon always has an eclectic mix of gifts and trinkets in his stocking... You never know what youll pull out. Fancy a lucky dip?

name: Jolly Dragon
description: The Jolly Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Happy. The Jolly Dragon can also learn Pure, Light and  Sea moves.      If you spot this legendary dragon flying over Dragon City, you may be in for a treat! The Jolly Dragon drops treats and toys for those below, but if hes in a bad mood, the best idea is to stay clear!

name: Wreath Dragon
description: The Wreath Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Happy. The Wreath Dragon can also learn Legend, Light and  Nature moves.      Born with its tail around its precious golden star, the Wreath Dragon is always happy to get the party feeling festive! Other dragons come from all over to see their annual lights show, hundreds of Wreath dragons lighting up the sky!

name: Gift Dragon
description: The Gift Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Happy. The Gift Dragon can also learn Light and  Flame moves.      No peeking, youll have to wait to open the Gift Dragons huge bowed box! Usually found making deliveries of presents, the Gift Dragon would like, just this year, to receive some presents of his own...

name: Abnormal Dragon
description: The Abnormal Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Abnormal Dragon can also learn War, Nature and  Terra moves.      The Abnormal Dragon is a sight to behold! Its 3 heads work in unison to do everything, such as eating, moving, and projecting radioactive vomit! But the smaller head holds a lot more brain power! It looks like it is concocting a wicked plan...

name: Triumphant Dragon
description: The Triumphant Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Triumphant Dragon can also learn Legend, Sea and  Metal moves.      One roll of his die instantly powers up his mechanical armor, leaving the foe on the resulting end of a super-charged bolt of golden energy. Flawless movements and smooth attacks mean the Triumphant Dragon is also a sight to behold when in the arena.

name: Feral Dragon
description: The Feral Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Feral Dragon can also learn War, Ice and  Terra moves.      After having lived in the deep wilderness for years, the Feral Dragon knows a thing or two about how to survive! Its powerful horns can cause serious damage, however its enemies usually run away at just the sight of this beast!

name: Engine Dragon
description: The Engine Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Engine Dragon can also learn Electric, Metal and  Flame moves.      High octane, high performance, high speed... This machine has it all! When the Engine Dragon goes full throttle, youd be silly to stand in its way, it stops for no one!

name: Fuel Dragon
description: The Fuel Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Fuel Dragon can also learn Flame, Terra and  Sea moves.      The Fuel Dragon can create fuel from the bones of his primal ancestors, so the Engine Dragon is always pestering him for a top-up! Although, with the environment in mind, the Fuel Dragon would much rather prefer using a more renewable source!

name: Tire Dragon
description: The Tire Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Tire Dragon can also learn Sea and  Terra moves.      When hes not carrying out a speedy tire change at one of the Engine Dragons pitstops, the Tire Dragon can usually be found doing donuts in dragons habitats! If theres a smell of burning rubber, then this guy has most likely passed by!

name: Nyami Dragon
description: The Nyami Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Nyami Dragon can also learn Light, Pure and  Ice moves.      The Nyami Dragon is one of the most resourceful dragons on the islands. Many believe him to be a protector of the elements and he can make ordinary things unique and beautiful. In fact, his favorite thing to do is make music with the seashells he finds.

name: S-rank Dragon
description: The S-rank Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The S-rank Dragon can also learn Metal, Light and  Electric moves.      The S-Rank Dragon takes no prisoners when shes racing around the City, Shell do everything in her power to blast you off the track and overtake you. If youre smart, youll get out of her way.

name: Outrunner Dragon
description: The Outrunner Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Outrunner Dragon can also learn Metal, Dark and  Flame moves.      If youre spinning out after hitting a tomato, then youre probably on this guys tail! The Outrunner Dragon is always in first place, so why not send the Shelly Dragon after him just before he crosses the finish line!

name: Purpureus Dragon
description: The Purpureus Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Purpureus Dragon can also learn Legend, Flame and  Electric moves.      Known for having the prettiest eyes in the land, one glance and youll be lost in a sea of purple. The Purpureus Dragon will hypnotize you with her beauty, right before she breathes glistening, yet scorching, purple fire!

name: Thunderbolt Dragon
description: The Thunderbolt Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Thunderbolt Dragon can also learn Legend, Electric and  Terra moves.      Charred remains of the landscape indicate that the Thunderbolt Dragon has passed by. It struggles to keep its energy rays under control, thus making him disliked by others, but when it concentrates on focusing its energy, most battle opponents flee!

name: Cryogenic Dragon
description: The Cryogenic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Cryogenic Dragon can also learn Wind, Dark and  Pure moves.      Whats that lurking beneath the ice? If youre unlucky enough to be venturing into the Cryogenic Dragons territory then you better make a run for it! This beast hunts for sport and to him, youre just one more pawn in his game.

name: Icetrek Dragon
description: The Icetrek Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Icetrek Dragon can also learn Terra, Electric and  Metal moves.      If youre having to travel in arctic conditions then you best bring along the Icetrek Dragon! This nomad is an expert in sub-zero exploration, even the toughest dragons require his help when it comes to navigating the ice caps.

name: Snowdrift Dragon
description: The Snowdrift Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Snowdrift Dragon can also learn Nature and  Sea moves.      This dragon is used to the harsh elements of arctic lands. The Snowdrift Dragon cuts through snow mounds using its razor-sharp appendages, so dont get in its way when its foraging in the icy terrain.

name: Fondue Dragon
description: The Fondue Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Fondue Dragon can also learn Light, Flame and  Terra moves.      Chocolate fondue, cheese fondont! Dont even bother bringing up the dairy alternative to this sweet treat, the Fondue Dragon is all about the chocolate! Dragons from all over gather to get a taste of this secret recipe.

name: Smores Dragon
description: The Smores Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Smores Dragon can also learn Dark, Flame and  Nature moves.      If youre looking for the worlds best smore, then this dragon knows the perfect ratio of cracker and marshmallow! Gather around the campfire as the Smores Dragon rustles up some tasty treats! Would you like some more?

name: Destruction Dragon
description: The Destruction Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Destruction Dragon can also learn War, Dark and  Flame moves.      Everyone blames the Destruction Dragon for their problems, luckily, the Creation Dragon is always there to fix things... However, in reality, it is the Creation Dragon that has a streak of evil. The Destruction Dragon is tired of these false claims and wants revenge!

name: Fudge Dragon
description: The Fudge Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Fudge Dragon can also learn Dark, Flame and  Sea moves.      Oh, fudge! is usually the response of anyone on a diet when the Fudge Dragon drops by to say hello... You wont be able to resist his mouth-watering candy! Take a bite and let your troubles slip away!

name: Bonbon Dragon
description: The Bonbon Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Bonbon Dragon can also learn Light, Terra and  Nature moves.      His bitter personality perfectly matches his bitter chocolate center. Dont be fooled by his sweet, delicate exterior, the Bonbon Dragon would rather cause mischief than play with other dragons.

name: Creation Dragon
description: The Creation Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Creation Dragon can also learn Pure, Light and  Sea moves.      Although it may look like the Creation Dragon is the good member of this duo, the truth is quite the opposite! It uses the Destruction Dragon as a scapegoat, pretending to be a hero, when actually its only desire is to create...so it can then destroy.

name: Lachy Dragon
description: The Lachy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Lachy Dragon can also learn Legend, Dark and  Nature moves.      Every fortnight, millions of fans come to see the Lachy Dragon in battle. His signature lightning bolt is known throughout Dragon City as well as his trickshots!

name: Celebration Dragon
description: The Celebration Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Celebration Dragon can also learn Light, Flame and  Electric moves.      Theres always something to celebrate somewhere, right? The Celebration Dragon will turn even the smallest of events into a huge party. Is it because he loves the company of other dragons? No. He does it for the free food!

name: Masquerade Dragon
description: The Masquerade Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Masquerade Dragon can also learn Dark, Metal and  Ice moves.      Is this dragon the bell of the ball or the beast of the ball? The Masquerade Dragon thrives off anonymity, so unveiling its true identity is virtually impossible. It enters and leaves the parade without anyone noticing.

name: Tri-feather Dragon
description: The Tri-feather Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Tri-feather Dragon can also learn Primal and  Metal moves.      This dragon is a deadly triple threat... Friendly, cuddly, and full of love! If you ask nicely, he may give you a feather to wear in the parade, their violet glow is highly desired by other dragons!

name: Maraca Dragon
description: The Maraca Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Maraca Dragon can also learn Legend, Sea and  Flame moves.      "My name is Mara and I shake my maracas" is this dragons famous catchphrase. She can be heard singing it in the parade, which she is a part of every year, of course!

name: Parade Dragon
description: The Parade Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Parade Dragon can also learn Electric, Nature and  Terra moves.      Parties, parades, and piñatas, the three things you cant live without...according to the Parade Dragon anyway! Are there smaller dragons controlling it from the inside? I guess well never know, so just join the fiesta and dance, dance, dance!

name: Cleopatra Dragon
description: The Cleopatra Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Cleopatra Dragon can also learn Terra, Flame and  Light moves.      Behind her mesmerizing beauty lies a calculated and cunning dragon. The Cleopatra Dragon is a strong leader who didnt get there by following the orders of others, no, shes an independent individual who gets what she wants.

name: Lucky Dragon
description: The Lucky Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Lucky Dragon can also learn Nature, Sea and  Legend moves.      Who needs skill when youve got luck? The Lucky Dragon possesses probability-altering powers, meaning things just always seem to go his way in battle, whether he intends it or not! Hes certainly your lucky charm!

name: Daisy Dragon
description: The Daisy Dragon is a Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Daisy Dragon can also learn Sea and  Terra moves.      The Daisy Dragon is often found following the Green Meadows Dragon around, as he always leaves a trail of brightly colored daisies behind him. The Daisy Dragon will happily make you a daisy chain or flower crown, just ask nicely!

name: Bee Dragon
description: The Bee Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Bee Dragon can also learn Flame, Terra and  Nature moves.      Whether youre looking for an un-bee-table fighter or an un-bee-lievable teamplayer, the Bee Dragon can certainly bee the queen of your team! But, bee-ware, she isnt a fan of your bee-littling puns...

name: Frostfire Dragon
description: The Frostfire Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Frostfire Dragon can also learn Dark, Ice and  Flame moves.      Even at the coldest of temperatures, the FrostFire Dragon can generate immense levels of heat. This dragon lures cold, vulnerable prey into its lair as they seek this not-so-innocent heat source...

name: Hummingbird Dragon
description: The Hummingbird Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Hummingbird Dragon can also learn Wind, Sea and  Nature moves.      Dont be fooled by its dainty movements, the Hummingbird Dragon certainly packs a punch! It loves to show off its muscles, but is this just vanity or a deadly threat? Better not to find out!

name: Fertility Dragon
description: The Fertility Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Fertility Dragon can also learn Wind, Nature and  Terra moves.      Little is known about this elusive dragon, but upon her arrival, dragons claim to be cured of all injuries or ailments. Many will spend years searching for her, as sometimes, she is their only chance of survival.

name: Bananoss Dragon
description: The Bananoss Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Bananoss Dragon can also learn Legend, Nature and  War moves.      With millions of fans, the Bananoss Dragon is one of the most popular dragons on DragonTube! As well as being part of the Banana Bus Squad, he loves chilling with friends and is always up for a laugh. Definitely a must-have on your team!

name: Blazefrost Dragon
description: The Blazefrost Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Blazefrost Dragon can also learn Light, Flame and  Ice moves.      The BlazeFrost Dragon is a powerful hybrid of fire and ice. It will provide heat and warmth for young dragons lost in the arctic tundra, unlike its malevolent cousin, the FrostFire Dragon...

name: Emberscale Dragon
description: The Emberscale Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Emberscale Dragon can also learn Terra, Light and  Nature moves.      Team Flame or Team Ice? That is the question you must answer if you want the Emberscale Dragon to be part of your team, and yes, there is a right answer! Flame always triumphs Ice, right?

name: Frostscale Dragon
description: The Frostscale Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Frostscale Dragon can also learn Sea, Dark and  Nature moves.      Team Ice or Team Flame? That is the question you must answer if you want the Frostscale Dragon to be part of your team, and yes, there is a right answer! Ice always triumphs Flame, right?

name: Infernal Dragon
description: The Infernal Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Infernal Dragon can also learn Dark, Terra and  War moves.      Originating from below the worlds tectonic plates, the Infernal Dragon has magma flowing through its veins and diamonds in its core. It never gets cold. Never.

name: Chillheart Dragon
description: The Chillheart Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Chillheart Dragon can also learn Light, Sea and  Electric moves.      With a heart as cold as ice, youd think this dragon was without empathy, but this is quite the contrary! The Chillheart Dragon is one of the kindest and warmest dragons, metaphorically speaking...its body is ice cold!

name: Hatchling Dragon
description: The Hatchling Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Hatchling Dragon can also learn Primal and  Light moves.      No one really knows what lies within its hardened skull, probably very little... Just make sure to get out of the way when these dragons start stampeding.

name: Awakened Dragon
description: The Awakened Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Awakened Dragon can also learn Legend, Sea and  Nature moves.      If awakened from its century-long slumbers, it is said that, for some seconds, time will stop and reality as we know it will be turned upside down... Best let the Awakened Dragon wake up naturally!

name: Vitality Dragon
description: The Vitality Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Vitality Dragon can also learn Sea, Terra and  Light moves.      This dragon is vibrant, bubbly, and has a real zest for life! She travels the lands sharing the magic elixir held in her necklace... One drop and youll feel as good as new!

name: Harvest Dragon
description: The Harvest Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Harvest Dragon can also learn Terra, Sea and  Light moves.      Feeling peckish? Got the munchies? The Harvest Dragon always has an abundance of food in her cornucopia and she is willing to share with all. Whatever your favorite is, shes got it!

name: Galestorm Dragon
description: The Galestorm Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Galestorm Dragon can also learn War, Electric and  Sea moves.      Bolts of lightning uncontrollably strike the land below when this dragon is flying around. A powerful storm isnt usually far behind, and most dragons have to take shelter, making the Galestorm Dragon rather unpopular!

name: Alebrije Dragon
description: The Alebrije Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Alebrije Dragon can also learn Legend, Nature and  Flame moves.      An unconventionally beautiful beast that comes to you in your dreams, the Alebrije Dragon can appear in all different shapes and sizes, sometimes as a strange combination of different dragons!

name: Fiesta Dragon
description: The Fiesta Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Fiesta Dragon can also learn Flame, Electric and  Nature moves.      The Fiesta Dragon should always be top of your guest list when planning a party! He brings tasty food, music, and laughs. Tip: Dont challenge him to a chili eating contest, he is an expert on spicy food!

name: Xolotl Dragon
description: The Xolotl Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Xolotl Dragon can also learn Legend, Electric and  Flame moves.      A sinister dragon that is often associated with lightning and death. The Xolotl Dragon strikes fear in any who see, think, or hear of him. Although, he does have canine-like qualities, could he really be a Dragon Masters best friend?

name: Pinata Dragon
description: The Pinata Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Pinata Dragon can also learn Sea, Flame and  Light moves.      He may look soft and fluffy, but the Piñata Dragon is actually one sturdy beast! Dont even think about giving him a whack... He is not made of candy! He will come to your party, though!

name: Lazarbeam Dragon
description: The Lazarbeam Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Lazarbeam Dragon can also learn Dark, Flame and  War moves.      Your fave has landed in Dragon City! The LazarBeam Dragon is a skilled fighter... He merrily marauds enemy lands and will yeet his opponents off his floating Islands!

name: Ravager Dragon
description: The Ravager Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Ravager Dragon can also learn Flame, Terra and  Pure moves.      Said to have come from a lost world, it wasnt until one Dragon Master managed to tame this beast and accompany him back to his home. What lies on the other side of the portal? Roars of undiscovered Primal dragons...

name: Valor Dragon
description: The Valor Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Valor Dragon can also learn Light, Metal and  Flame moves.      One of the bravest and most fearless dragons, the Valor Dragon shows great courage in the face of danger, especially when in battle. She fights for all dragons, whether old or young, big or small, shes got your back!

name: Tri-ice Dragon
description: The Tri-ice Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Tri-ice Dragon can also learn Ice and  Metal moves.      Tri-Ice or dry ice? This dragon has not one, not two, but three razor-sharp, ultracold horns protruding from its head, meaning it is not easy prey for other Primal dragons. It emits super cold air.

name: Aerosoar Dragon
description: The Aerosoar Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Aerosoar Dragon can also learn Wind, Sea and  Nature moves.      Flocks of Aerosoar Dragons soar the sky in search of unsuspecting prey below. They skim the top of the sea by lowering their long jaws into the water while in flight. They are speedier than most.

name: Treetop Dragon
description: The Treetop Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Treetop Dragon can also learn Terra, Nature and  Pure moves.      Standing tall above the rest, the Treetop Dragon is a peaceful creature that just likes to get on with its day. However, if provoked, this dragon can use its astonishing weight to crash down onto enemies.

name: Stegoshock Dragon
description: The Stegoshock Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Stegoshock Dragon can also learn Electric, Metal and  Light moves.      Living in close quarters with the Spinokrok Dragon means you need the ultimate defense, and the Stegoshock Dragon has just that! The sturdy plates on its back are more than just impenetrable, they will also give you a nasty shock!

name: Spinokrok Dragon
description: The Spinokrok Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Spinokrok Dragon can also learn Dark, Sea and  Pure moves.      The apex predator of the primal-dragon world, the Spinokrok Dragon is a hunting master both on the land and in the sea. Its long, reptilian jaws clamp down on prey and as if they were a chew toy.

name: Tyrano Dragon
description: The Tyrano Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Tyrano Dragon can also learn War, Dark and  Pure moves.      The unofficial King of the primal-dragon world, theres nothing the powerful jaws of the Tyrano Dragon cant crunch through. Only one creature has come close to dethroning this beast... The Spinokrok Dragon!

name: Fireflower Dragon
description: The Fireflower Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Beauty. The Fireflower Dragon can also learn Flame, Light and  Nature moves.      A beautiful dragon that lights up the gloomy forests of Dragon City, usually to help those who have wandered too far. The petals of a Fireflower Dragons tail are said to have magical properties!

name: Heatwave Dragon
description: The Heatwave Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Heatwave Dragon can also learn Pure, Light and  Metal moves.      By exhaling a gust of hot hair, the Heatwave Dragon can melt anything, including Ice dragons! He also enjoys a bit of stand-up, so watch out, hell roast you...with his insults!

name: Glimmer Dragon
description: The Glimmer Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Glimmer Dragon can also learn Sea and  Nature moves.      The Glimmer Dragon is nocturnal, meaning it only leaves its Habitat at night. Usually traveling in groups, these creatures light up the night sky in beautiful shades of blue and green.

name: Preston Dragon
description: The Preston Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Preston Dragon can also learn Electric, Light and  War moves.      A fan favorite on DragonTube, the Preston Dragon has finally made his way to Dragon City! His tons of followers love his high-energy videos and crazy content!

name: Deluge Dragon
description: The Deluge Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Deluge Dragon can also learn  Legend and  Metal moves.      Some dragons never adapted to live in water, but the Deluge Dragon doesnt care... It plans to flood the lands, submerging everything and everyone. Sea dragons will rule once again!

name: Uniting Dragon
description: The Uniting Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Soul. The Uniting Dragon can also learn Legend, Sea and  Light moves.      The Uniting Dragon brings together dragons of all shapes and sizes and unites the Islands in Dragon City. Its beautiful rainbow coloring represents all the different dragon elements in Dragon City.

name: Nightshade Dragon
description: The Nightshade Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Nightshade Dragon can also learn Wind, Sea and  War moves.      Ever get the feeling that someone, or something, is following you? You cant see the Nightshade Dragon, but he can always see you. He waits in the dark for his unsuspecting victims. You wont catch him, no one will.

name: Homeland Dragon
description: The Homeland Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Homeland Dragon can also learn Pure, Terra and  Nature moves.      The Homeland Dragon was born and raised in Dragon City but loves to travel the Dragonverse and explore new places. He often recounts tales of his adventures with other dragons. He always returns home.

name: Spectacle Dragon
description: The Spectacle Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Happy. The Spectacle Dragon can also learn Light, Electric and  Flame moves.      Are you wearing your spectacles? Grab them quick as you dont want to miss the famous firework displays of the Spectacle Dragon! He is an expert in pyrotechnics and can create beautiful nighttime spectacles!

name: Aegis Dragon
description: The Aegis Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Aegis Dragon can also learn Light and  Metal moves.      Protector of the dragon realms, the Aegis Dragon never leaves home without his trusty shield. The shield is said to make a frightening roaring sound during battle, a sound which most dragons are terrified to hear.

name: Sidemen Dragon
description: The Sidemen Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Sidemen Dragon can also learn Metal, War and  Flame moves.      What do you get when 7 of DragonTubes biggest stars join forces? The Sidemen Dragon, of course! This seven-headed beast always has its fans eagerly waiting for the epic Sidemen Sunday!

name: Trench Dragon
description: The Trench Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Trench Dragon can also learn Dark, Legend and  Ice moves.      A dragon better known as the keeper of abyssal treasure, the Trench Dragon can withstand pressures deep within the ocean. No light ever reaches its aquatic underworld, so it expertly uses its other senses to hunt trespassers.

name: Eddievr Dragon
description: The Eddievr Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Eddievr Dragon can also learn Light, Primal and  Ice moves.      Híjole! The EddieVR Dragon has landed in Dragon City! He is usually seen hanging out with his pals the JoshDub and Mully dragons or playing some rather frightening VR video games!

name: Magmatricity Dragon
description: The Magmatricity Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Magmatricity Dragon can also learn Electric, Pure and  War moves.      A dragon better known as the keeper of volcanic treasure, the Magmatricity Dragon rules over an underground, electrified kingdom. Its minions are the first to attack any trespasser who dares to disturb this dragon.

name: Joshdub Dragon
description: The Joshdub Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Joshdub Dragon can also learn Legend, Sea and  Light moves.      A member of the DragonTube trio along with his boys, the EddieVR and Mully dragons, the JoshDub Dragon creates hilarious videos and always has millions of fans waiting to watch his next VR adventures!

name: Pyroclastic Dragon
description: The Pyroclastic Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Pyroclastic Dragon can also learn Light, Wind and  Dark moves.      A trusted minion of the Magmatricity Dragon, the Pyroclastic Dragon thrives in volcanic terrain. This fast-moving dragon surrounds trespassers with hot gas and rocky debris and can burn anything in its path.

name: Mully Dragon
description: The Mully Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Mully Dragon can also learn War, Ice and  Pure moves.      With tons of views of DragonTube, the Mully Dragon is one of our favorite VR gamers! Hes always making his fans laugh especially when hes with his mates, the JoshDub and EddieVR dragons!

name: Astrophile Dragon
description: The Astrophile Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Astrophile Dragon can also learn Primal, Dark and  Sea moves.      Born with the beauty of the moon, protected by the cursed bones of the sun, and blessed by the stars of the universe... The Astrophile Dragon travels through space to protect and guide those who have lost their way.

name: Croconile Dragon
description: The Croconile Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Chaos. The Croconile Dragon can also learn War and  Metal moves.      A ferocious dragon with a vicious attitude and an indiscriminate diet...thats right, the CrocoNile Dragon will happily eat anything or anyone. Its ravenous hunger means it continually grows bigger the more it eats.

name: Fresh Dragon
description: The Fresh Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Fresh Dragon can also learn War, Metal and  Legend moves.      A fresh, new dragon with epic skills! The Fresh Dragon has finally made his much-awaited appearance in Dragon City! Add him to your team for some legendary power!

name: Fortitude Dragon
description: The Fortitude Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Fortitude Dragon can also learn War, Light and  Pure moves.      When in pain, the Fortitude Dragon gets stronger, meaning that foes are actually hesitant to attack it... Just when you think this beast is at its weakest, it will breach enemy lines and devour all with its three heads.

name: Lifemelt Dragon
description: The Lifemelt Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Lifemelt Dragon can also learn Legend, Electric and  Flame moves.      A well-known battle commander among the community of War dragons, the Lifemelt Dragon will quite literally melt your life away. By enveloping battlefields in a scorching blaze, any sign of life will quickly be turned to ash.

name: Ali-a Dragon
description: The Ali-a Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Ali-a Dragon can also learn Terra, Metal and  Wind moves.      Ready to join the Ali-A Army?! The Ali-A Dragon has finally landed in Dragon City... Add this superstar dragon to your collection and take your team to stardom!

name: Hurricane Dragon
description: The Hurricane Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Hurricane Dragon can also learn Legend, Light and  Flame moves.      Unlike other Wind dragons, the Hurricane Dragon has not warmed to the newly formed Wind community. It considers itself an outsider and will form hurricanes just to watch young Wind dragons get blown away and lost forever...

name: Dangertimber Dragon
description: The Dangertimber Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Dangertimber Dragon can also learn Dark, Nature and  Electric moves.      (J)ust lost in the woods? (Ö)vercome with fear? (T)ook a wrong turn? (U) should escape. (N)ever come back. (N)ow is your chance.

name: Quasar Dragon
description: The Quasar Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Soul. The Quasar Dragon can also learn Electric, Light and  Pure moves.      An extremely luminous creature, the Quasar Dragon emits large amounts of energy and light and can be seen from huge distances. No one has ever made it within touching distance of this dragon.

name: Possessed Dragon
description: The Possessed Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Possessed Dragon can also learn Nature, Flame and  War moves.      What do you think really happens to those discarded jack-o-lanterns left on the street to rot? Lost dragon souls often become trapped inside, forcing them to roam the lands as a Possessed Dragon for eternity.

name: Thedooo Dragon
description: The Thedooo Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Thedooo Dragon can also learn Flame, Dark and  Legend moves.      This iconic dragon, TheDooo Dragon, has finally made his way to Dragon City! An exceptional rockstar and avid videogamer, you definitely want this guy on your team!

name: Patchwork Dragon
description: The Patchwork Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Patchwork Dragon can also learn Metal, Ice and  Primal moves.      Assembled together by remaining parts of fallen dragons, the Patchwork Dragon roams the night in search of more unsuspecting victims who will soon become just another patch on this dragons body...

name: Crustocean Dragon
description: The Crustocean Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Crustocean Dragon can also learn Metal and  War moves.      Crustocean Dragons live on the seafloor, usually huddled together in groups, using their hard exoskeletons to provide a shield of solid, spikey protection against predators. Watch out for them when going for a paddle!

name: Muselk Dragon
description: The Muselk Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Muselk Dragon can also learn Flame, War and  Pure moves.      Whether youre looking for power, skill, or just some laughs, the Muselk Dragon is the guy for the job! Mr. Muselk is waiting to be added to your collection!

name: Divination Dragon
description: The Divination Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Divination Dragon can also learn Legend, Dark and  Terra moves.      An omniscient dragon who offers her fortune-telling abilities to those that seek the pure truth. The Divination Dragon can help you, but beware, not everyone receives the answers they were hoping for.

name: Elixir Dragon
description: The Elixir Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Elixir Dragon can also learn Dark, Flame and  Sea moves.      Every creature that has drunk the Elixir Dragons potion has got one thing in common, theyve never been seen again... Created by the Alchemist Dragon, this elixir is said to have magical properties, but no one knows for sure.

name: Diablo Dragon
description: The Diablo Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Diablo Dragon can also learn Light and  Nature moves.      The Diablo Dragon can grant you your hearts desires, however, everything comes at a cost. Dont be tempted, Dragon Masters, for we should know better than to make a deal with the devil.

name: Coven Dragon
description: The Coven Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Coven Dragon can also learn Terra, Metal and  Electric moves.      A student of the dark arts, the Coven Dragon specializes in black-ice magic. Once a year, these dragons meet atop a hidden glacier to share their tips of world domination and ensure their coven is as strong as ever.

name: Agile Dragon
description: The Agile Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Agile Dragon can also learn War moves.      A small but mighty powerhouse, the Agile Dragon can charge towards enemies at unimaginable speeds. Its protective exterior can withstand brute forces even though it is lightweight. They sometimes run alongside each other in packs.

name: Autumn Dragon
description: The Autumn Dragon is a Common Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature.       Once a year, elderly Nature Dragons will begin to lose their shades of green and, overnight, will undergo metamorphosis into Autumn Dragons. This recent discovery has shed light on the life cycle of Nature Dragons.

name: Alchemist Dragon
description: The Alchemist Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Alchemist Dragon can also learn War, Legend and  Ice moves.      An expert on magical substances, the Alchemist Dragon provided the Elixir Dragon with the "elixir of life". Dragons are queuing up to take a sip, although there are rumors that this potion is actually an "elixir of death"...

name: Dream Dragon
description: The Dream Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Dream Dragon can also learn Dream, War and  Light moves.      Dragon City has got a new resident... The Dream Dragon has finally arrived! Add this popular guy to your collection and form your ultimate dream team!

name: Doorbuster Dragon
description: The Doorbuster Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Doorbuster Dragon can also learn Primal, Flame and  Electric moves.      Always on the lookout for the best deals in Gems and Food, this dragon will make sure youve haggled down to the best possible price! The Doorbuster Dragon is also an extreme couponer, but if you try to rip her off...shell rip your head off!

name: Ragnarok Dragon
description: The Ragnarok Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Ragnarok Dragon can also learn Dark, War and  Flame moves.      Meaning the fate of the Gods, the Ragnarök Dragon has lived through epic battles of monsters and Gods not known to the Dragonverse. It has seen things it cannot unsee. It does everything to protect us.

name: Jormungandr Dragon
description: The Jormungandr Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Jormungandr Dragon can also learn Sea, Dark and  Terra moves.      Meaning huge monster, the Jörmungandr Dragon is a giant serpent-like dragon that is long enough to wrap itself around all of the Islands in Dragon City. When it releases its grasp, the Ragnarök battle will begin.

name: Allfather Dragon
description: The Allfather Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Allfather Dragon can also learn Metal, Ice and  Dark moves.      After drinking from a magical well, and sacrificing his eye to do so, the Allfather Dragon was granted an unimaginable amount of knowledge of the Dragonverse. Other God dragons often turn to him for counsel.

name: Freyja Dragon
description: The Freyja Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Freyja Dragon can also learn Metal, Ice and  Light moves.      A powerful heroine who symbolizes love and beauty, as well as war and death... The Freyja Dragon, whose name also means Lady, oversees battles and uses her sorcery to manipulate them. Her pal is the Isis Goddess Dragon.

name: Vanargand Dragon
description: The Vanargand Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Vanargand Dragon can also learn Ice, Primal and  War moves.      Meaning Monster of the River Van, the Vanargand Dragon is a giant canine-like dragon. This monstrous creature is able to fatally bite any God dragon, giving him a powerful reputation within the Dragonverse.

name: Krampus Dragon
description: The Krampus Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Krampus Dragon can also learn Ice, Primal and  Dark moves.      Half-demon, half-dragon, the Krampus Dragon lives in the nightmares of the young. On Christmas Eve night, you better hope you have been good, for even the Lady of Christmas Dragon cannot save you from his chains.

name: Bard Dragon
description: The Bard Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Bard Dragon can also learn Legend, Flame and  Terra moves.      A well-traveled dragon whose experiences inspire her to create enchanting songs and melodies. The Bard Dragon uses her spellbinding musical talents to immobilize enemies and aid allies in need.

name: Sleigh Dragon
description: The Sleigh Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Sleigh Dragon can also learn Legend, Happy and  Light moves.      Dont you hate it when youve got millions of presents to deliver in just one night? It may seem impossible, but not if you give the Sleigh Dragon a call! No one really knows how he does it, better not to ask.

name: Caroling Dragon
description: The Caroling Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Caroling Dragon can also learn Ice and  Beauty moves.      Whats your favorite Christmas carol? Let the Caroling Dragon know and join her in festive sing-along around your dragons habitats! Dont try to outsing her, though, for she is the star of the show!

name: Monk Dragon
description: The Monk Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Monk Dragon can also learn Flame, Electric and  Sea moves.      After being trained from birth in a mystical form of martial arts, the Monk Dragon has joined the High Druid Dragon and the Bard Dragon in the heroes quest. He certainly packs a punch!

name: Scheherazade Dragon
description: The Scheherazade Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Scheherazade Dragon can also learn Light, Legend and  Flame moves.      A legendary queen and storyteller, the Scheherazade Dragon has many stories to recount, 1001 to be exact! If you want to hear them all, you will have to be patient, as she likes to make you wait!

name: Sinbad Dragon
description: The Sinbad Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Sinbad Dragon can also learn Flame, Electric and  Terra moves.      A fierce sailor that would even give the High Marauder Dragon a run for his money! The Sinbad Dragon has fought all kinds of monstrous Sea dragons while on his nautical adventures... He has many stories to tell!

name: Aladdin Dragon
description: The Aladdin Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Aladdin Dragon can also learn Electric, Legend and  Metal moves.      The Aladdin Dragon didnt have a dime to his name, but after suddenly coming into a large sum of wealth, he now boasts garments of gold! And no, this dragon doesnt need an airborne piece of tapestry, he has wings... duh.

name: Founder Dragon
