description: The Founder Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Founder Dragon can also learn Ice, Flame and  Electric moves.      Passion? Check. Innovation? Check. Awesomeness? You bet ya! Creating fun for everyone while having a blast at the same time, if theres any dragon you want on your team, then this is the one! Remember, Dragon Masters: Work Hard, Play Hard!

name: Hydroelectric Dragon
description: The Hydroelectric Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Hydroelectric Dragon can also learn Electric, Metal and  Light moves.      By using the rivers and waterfalls in Dragon City, the Hydroelectric Dragon can generate masses of clean energy. She is a powerful water beast who has joined the revolution against the Crude Oil Dragon.

name: Solar Dragon
description: The Solar Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Solar Dragon can also learn Flame, Electric and  Sea moves.      The leader of the revolution to make Dragon City a greener place... The Solar Dragon! He has gathered a team of other renewable dragons to take down the polluted Crude Oil Dragon.

name: Blue Dragon
description: The Blue Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Blue Dragon can also learn Ice and  Light moves.      Looking into this dragons eyes is like peering into a glistening lake of azure water. Although not the most powerful, this dragon has gone on to create the Purple Dragon and Green Dragon!

name: Nuclear Dragon
description: The Nuclear Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Nuclear Dragon can also learn Metal and  Electric moves.      Albeit a little unstable, the Nuclear Dragon has put her differences aside to join the fight against the Crude Oil Dragon. However, those around her have to be wary, for a spontaneous meltdown may be imminent.

name: Biomass Dragon
description: The Biomass Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Biomass Dragon can also learn Nature and  Electric moves.      One of the oldest forms of producing energy in Dragon City was with the help of the Biomass Dragon. It can burn parts of itself to power your Islands! It detests the Crude Oil Dragon.

name: Eolic Dragon
description: The Eolic Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Eolic Dragon can also learn Electric, Metal and  Ice moves.      With his expert manipulation of the air currents, the Eolic Dragon soars the skies while generating energy for the Islands below. He one day hopes that Dragon City will be a completely green place!

name: Yellow Dragon
description: The Yellow Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Yellow Dragon can also learn Light and  Ice moves.      The Yellow Dragon is goofy and playful, so dont be surprised if it splashes you with yellow paint! This dragon represents everything Epic, so if youre an expert collector of the Epic rarity, you definitely need this dragon!

name: Purple Dragon
description: The Purple Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Purple Dragon can also learn Dark, War and  Flame moves.      The powerful creation of the Red Dragon and the Blue Dragon... The Purple Dragon is the epitome of everything Legendary! Having this dragon on your team shows youre an expert in training the Legend element.

name: Peacock Dragon
description: The Peacock Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Peacock Dragon can also learn Nature, Sea and  Primal moves.      These Desert Lands are so warm! I cant believe the Inspector fell for my fake love interest in him... He released me from jail to live our Happily Ever After together but little does he know Ill soon be far, far away from here! Mwah-ah-ah-ah!

name: Red Dragon
description: The Red Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Red Dragon can also learn Flame, War and  Primal moves.      The strongest of the Color dragons, the Red Dragon is a beast of pure passion, love, and fury. His creations, the Purple Dragon and Orange Dragon, hope one day to also achieve his coveted Mythical status!

name: Professor Dragon
description: The Professor Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Professor Dragon can also learn Legend, Dark and  Ice moves.      A highly respected dragon who is certainly capable of creating poisons and toxins, the Professor Dragon is far from a teachers pet. Some say he has lost his mind, others believe he has a nefarious plan. His alibi? A meeting with the High Diabolical Dragon!

name: Green Dragon
description: The Green Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Green Dragon can also learn Wind, Legend and  Terra moves.      When the Very Rare Blue Dragon met with the Epic Yellow Dragon, it came as a complete surprise that a new Legendary dragon was created! But hey presto, the Green Dragon is ready to get down to business!

name: Orange Dragon
description: The Orange Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Orange Dragon can also learn Flame, Pure and  Electric moves.      With the same beautiful coloring of the sun, you can feel the warmth of Orange Dragon ever when afar. She was labeled a dragon of fire, but she proved us wrong and showed us she is a being of pure light.

name: Gardener Dragon
description: The Gardener Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Gardener Dragon can also learn Sea and  Terra moves.      No one would suspect the gardener, right? After been treated unfairly by richer, more powerful dragons, the Gardener Dragon has had enough. Some say he was seen harvesting an odd-looking Tomato... His alibi? Working overtime in the gardens, as usual.

name: Scarlett Dragon
description: The Scarlett Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Beauty. The Scarlett Dragon can also learn Flame, Light and  Nature moves.      You may not like her humanoid form, but dont be fooled, looks can be deceiving... Her innocent glances hide her expertise in martial arts, meaning she is clearly capable of committing the perfect crime. Her alibi? Kicking butt in the dojo!

name: Colonel Dragon
description: The Colonel Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Colonel Dragon can also learn Primal, Electric and  Flame moves.      The Colonel Dragon is a wealthy hunter who loves gold and trophies... You might even say he loves Golden Trophies! He throws money at witnesses to keep their mouths shut, but sooner or later his past will likely be revealed. His alibi? Convicted in another fraudulent case!

name: Socksfor1 Dragon
description: The Socksfor1 Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Socksfor1 Dragon can also learn Happy, Metal and  War moves.      He can do it all... The Socksfor1 Dragon has landed in Dragon City at last! If you need a professional space dragon added to your team, then this is the guy!

name: Inspector Dragon
description: The Inspector Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Inspector Dragon can also learn Pure, Ice and  Wind moves.      Not bad, Dragon Master! You managed to solve this without me! After fighting off the vicious Deputroll, I fled to the Desert Lands with the Arid Ambassador–you may remember him from our last case!

name: Yesteryear Dragon
description: The Yesteryear Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Yesteryear Dragon can also learn Sea, Terra and  Dark moves.      What was Dragon City like before the invention of Farms and Habitats? Well, youll have to ask the Yesteryear Dragon! He has traveled from the past by jumping through the High Chronos Dragons time portals.

name: Clown Dragon
description: The Clown Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Clown Dragon can also learn Dark, Ice and  Electric moves.      Although the Ringmaster Dragon usually keeps him in check, sometimes the Clown Dragon manages to escape... He loves to lurk in drains or sewers and offer unsuspecting young dragons a shiny red balloon.

name: Dystopia Dragon
description: The Dystopia Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Dystopia Dragon can also learn Electric, Metal and  Pure moves.      A dragon from the dystopian future who comes with grave warnings... The Dystopia Dragon has joined forces with the time-traveling High Chronos Dragon to set Dragon City on a different timeline and prevent society from falling.

name: Ringmaster Dragon
description: The Ringmaster Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Ringmaster Dragon can also learn Nature, Flame and  Metal moves.      Is this the greatest show? The Ringmaster Dragon certainly has a million dreams to make it so! Watch the crowd come alive and be transported to the other side!

name: Projectile Dragon
description: The Projectile Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Metal. The Projectile Dragon can also learn Light and  Wind moves.      The clear daredevil of the show, the Projectile Dragon will launch himself high into the sky causing the bystanders below to gasp with fear. Why gasp? Well, might we remind you that this adrenaline junkie is wingless!

name: Pyromaniac Dragon
description: The Pyromaniac Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Pyromaniac Dragon can also learn Flame, Light and  War moves.      A new recruit to the show, the Pyromaniac Dragon has channeled his impulse to set fire to things into his act. His trusty fire baton mesmerizes the crowds. Get too close, however, and youll be left with no eyebrows!

name: Magicienne Dragon
description: The Magicienne Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Magic. The Magicienne Dragon can also learn Dark, Sea and  Nature moves.      Although her colleagues dont like to admit it, the Magicienne Dragon really is the star of the show! Spectators come from all over to see her mastery of the dark arts. Her act will leave you questioning reality.

name: Abominable Dragon
description: The Abominable Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Ice. The Abominable Dragon can also learn War, Electric and  Primal moves.      A history-making competitor, the Abominable Dragon represents the glacial tribes first-ever entry into the Tribal Tournament. It seems they have put their pacifist beliefs aside to show the other tribes whos really boss.

name: Crevasse Dragon
description: The Crevasse Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Crevasse Dragon can also learn Sea, Nature and  Pure moves.      One of the favorites to win this years Tribal Tournament, the Crevasse Dragon is a formidable Sea warrior with a few tricks up her sleeve. She has the full support of her aquatic tribe behind her!

name: Underground Dragon
description: The Underground Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Underground Dragon can also learn Metal and  Electric moves.      Hes the underdog in this years Tribal Tournament, its the Underground Dragon. His competitors may not see him as a real threat, but could this finally be the year of the earth dwellers?

name: Molten Dragon
description: The Molten Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Molten Dragon can also learn Flame and  Terra moves.      Representing the fire-folk of the molten tribe, the Molten Dragon is here to make his family proud and win this years Tribal Tournament! His lousy track record will not affect his pure determination.

name: Terrorbird Dragon
description: The Terrorbird Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Terrorbird Dragon can also learn Electric, Metal and  Terra moves.      The other competitors of the Tribal Tournament will certainly have their work cut out... The Terrorbird Dragon was trained from birth to win and to win only. It comes as no surprise that the terror tribe specializes in tribal combat.

name: Georgenotfound Dragon
description: The Georgenotfound Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Georgenotfound Dragon can also learn Sea, Legend and  Metal moves.      A new dragon has been found, but its certainly not George! Add the GeorgeNotFound Dragon to your team before its too late, you dont want to miss his battle power!

name: Sledgehammer Dragon
description: The Sledgehammer Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Sledgehammer Dragon can also learn Nature, War and  Flame moves.      Representing the Terra House, the Sledgehammer Dragon has been selected as one of the suitable candidates to reign over the City while their Queen is absent. His family may not be wealthy, but he sure does pack a punch!

name: Glaive Dragon
description: The Glaive Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Glaive Dragon can also learn Flame, War and  Dark moves.      Representing one of the wealthier and nobler Houses, the Glaive Dragon is here to bring glory to his Wind family. He is the favorite to win in his fight against the Sledgehammer Dragon but there are whispers of illegal battle items.

name: Fae-flora Dragon
description: The Fae-flora Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Fae-flora Dragon can also learn Wind, Light and  Pure moves.      New Generation Fae: Representing the Fae plant life, the Fae-Flora Dragon learned everything from the Evanescent Fae Dragon. She stands for equality among the Fae Kingdom, although it seems she owns a lot more Fairy Dust than her Fae sisters...

name: Sssniperwolf Dragon
description: The Sssniperwolf Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Sssniperwolf Dragon can also learn Dark, Metal and  Ice moves.      If you dont have the SSSniperWolf Dragon on your team, well, then thats illegal! Cmon, join the Wolfpack and head to victory!

name: Fae-fright Dragon
description: The Fae-fright Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Fae-fright Dragon can also learn Nature, War and  Primal moves.      New Generation Fae: She might give you a scare, but the Fae-Fright Dragon recently joined the resistance against the suspicious lack of Fairy Dust. Shes risked everything by siding with the Fae-Fatal Dragon.

name: Shapeshifter Dragon
description: The Shapeshifter Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Chaos. The Shapeshifter Dragon can also learn Sea, Dark and  Flame moves.      An experiment gone wrong... After breaking out of the Genemancers laboratory, the Shapeshifter Dragon is using its shapeshifting abilities to wreak havoc in Dragon City. Watch out, there may be an imposter amongst your dragons!

name: Fae-feast Dragon
description: The Fae-feast Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Fae-feast Dragon can also learn Terra, Sea and  Flame moves.      New Generation Fae: Being the first male Fae dragon, the Fae-Feast Dragon has a lot to learn from both generations of his iconic sisters. His Fae powers are growing well... He just needs a good feast to warm them up!

name: Fae-faux Dragon
description: The Fae-faux Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Wind. The Fae-faux Dragon can also learn Light, Nature and  Ice moves.      New Generation Fae: A young Fae who gets her name from her ability to camouflage herself at will. The Fae-Faux Dragon learned from the best, the Trickster Fae Dragon! She may look false, but her morals are as true as ever.

name: Fae-fatal Dragon
description: The Fae-fatal Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Fae-fatal Dragon can also learn Wind, Flame and  Legend moves.      New Generation Fae: Often painted as an evil Fae, the Fae-Fatal Dragon leads the resistance against the Fae Kingdom, so Faes of all backgrounds can have their share of Fairy Dust.

name: Fae-fauna Dragon
description: The Fae-fauna Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of War. The Fae-fauna Dragon can also learn Light, Dark and  Primal moves.      New Generation Fae: Representing the Fae wildlife, the Fae-Fauna Dragon is ruler of the New Age Fae Kingdom. Her job? Protect her sisters from the Dark Fae Resistance!

name: Rebirth Dragon
description: The Rebirth Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Rebirth Dragon can also learn Light, Metal and  Ice moves.      Perfection has been achieved! A product of the Genemancer, the Rebirth Dragon boasts strength, agility, advanced cognition, and heightened senses. Could this pave the way for a new breed of super dragons?

name: Positive Dragon
description: The Positive Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Positive Dragon can also learn Electric, Metal and  Terra moves.      The Positive Dragon is extremely positively charged and is able to manipulate the protons that make up the universe. This means it can cause fatal blows to all dragons made of metal or electricity.

name: Negative Dragon
description: The Negative Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Pure. The Negative Dragon can also learn Electric, Metal and  Nature moves.      The most negatively charged dragon there is, the Negative Dragon can manipulate the electrons that make up the universe. It has a strong magnetic attraction to the Positive Dragon so they must stay far apart for their, and our, safety!

name: Genemancer Dragon
description: The Genemancer Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Genemancer Dragon can also learn Metal, Nature and  Sea moves.      An expert geneticist, the Genemancer Dragons tests have resulted in a series of dragon clones. His goal? To create the perfect dragon. Sometimes his experiments go right and sometimes they go wrong...

name: Psybolt Dragon
description: The Psybolt Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Psybolt Dragon can also learn Sea, Metal and  Light moves.      Primary Attacker of the Dragon Force: After been exposed to a supernatural Meteorite, the Psybolt Dragon was consumed by both energy and water, changing his DNA forever. His specialty? Drowning his foes in electricity.

name: Geoforce Dragon
description: The Geoforce Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Geoforce Dragon can also learn Nature, Sea and  Flame moves.      Primary Defender of the Dragon Force:  After been exposed to a supernatural Meteorite, the Geoforce Dragon developed control of the earth and nature around him. His specialty? Shielding the Dragon Force from any type of attack.

name: Eelectrifying Dragon
description: The Eelectrifying Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Eelectrifying Dragon can also learn Wind, Sea and  Primal moves.      By using its sharp teeth to pierce its prey before giving them a nasty electric shock, the Eelectrifying Dragon is certainly one terrifying creature that you dont want to meet underwater.

name: Molluscular Dragon
description: The Molluscular Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Legend. The Molluscular Dragon can also learn War, Light and  Ice moves.      With both muscle and agility, the Molluscular Dragon sweeps the seafloor looking to satisfy its ever-lasting hunger. Its tentacles can even crush the impenetrable shell of the Hermicrab Dragon.

name: Hermicrab Dragon
description: The Hermicrab Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Terra. The Hermicrab Dragon can also learn Flame and  Sea moves.      These dragons are usually found huddling in groups along the seafloor, often with Crustocean Dragons as this provides extra protection from predators. The Hermicrab Dragon doesnt pose much of a threat unless stood on!

name: Illumidepth Dragon
description: The Illumidepth Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Illumidepth Dragon can also learn Ice and  Sea moves.      You may think this dragon uses its bioluminescence to attract and eat small prey, when in fact, it will actually use this light to lure much larger prey into a cave full of ravenous Illumidepth Dragons...

name: Exploranaut Dragon
description: The Exploranaut Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Exploranaut Dragon can also learn Metal, Sea and  Electric moves.      Expert explorer of the nautical world, the Exploranaut Dragon has come upon a mysterious, abandoned Island... Could this really be the lost city of Atlantis? If anyone has a chance of escaping, its her!

name: Carnivaurus Dragon
description: The Carnivaurus Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Sea. The Carnivaurus Dragon can also learn Primal, War and  Flame moves.      An ancient aquatic dragon with powerful jaws and ravenous hunger. The Carnivaurus Dragon prefers large bodies of water but can still survive in shallow pools, using its prehensile fins to move...and hunt!

name: Omnivicious Dragon
description: The Omnivicious Dragon is a Epic Dragon   with the primary typing of Electric. The Omnivicious Dragon can also learn Light and  Sea moves.      A small yet vicious dragon, the Omnivicious Dragon can survive on both plant and animal matter. These dragons tend to stay away from danger but will use their large frills to frighten passersby.

name: Trophic Dragon
description: The Trophic Dragon is a Very Rare Dragon   with the primary typing of Nature. The Trophic Dragon can also learn Flame and  Electric moves.      The Herbivine Dragons favorite food, Trophic Dragons are as just as important as they are tiny. They help to maintain the balance of the ecosystem by absorbing light and converting it to energy.

name: Apex Dragon
description: The Apex Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Primal. The Apex Dragon can also learn Dark, Electric and  Sea moves.      What do you get when you combine the genetic traits of the Spinokrok Dragon and the Predator X Dragon? The ultimate dino-dragon hybrid! The Apex Dragon shouldnt exist, but it does.

name: Herbivine Dragon
description: The Herbivine Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Herbivine Dragon can also learn Nature, Ice and  Sea moves.      Although a strict herbivore, the Herbivine Dragon can use its razor-sharp tail to harm any lingering predators. Its only real threat is the Apex Dragon but even then its hard to call a winner.

name: Moonshade Dragon
description: The Moonshade Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Moonshade Dragon can also learn Electric, Primal and  War moves.      Not much is known about the dark side of the moon, however, one thing we do know is that it is home to the rarely sighted Moonshade Dragon. Only the High Moon Empress can control this dragon of lunar darkness.

name: Wisp Dragon
description: The Wisp Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Wisp Dragon can also learn Sea, Ice and  Electric moves.      His name is Wisp and hes finally made his way to your Islands! Make your City just that little bit cooler by adding this legend to your team!

name: Deputy Dragon
description: The Deputy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Flame. The Deputy Dragon can also learn Electric, Terra and  Nature moves.      As the Inspector Dragon’s protégé, the Deputy Dragon is keen to make a good impression on her first-ever solo case! She’s been entrusted to travel to the Polar Regions and find their missing Prince! Does she have what it takes?

name: Fundy Dragon
description: The Fundy Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Light. The Fundy Dragon can also learn Flame, Dark and  Nature moves.      Can you spot him? The Fundy Dragon is sleuthing around Dragon City! Watch out, if youve got some Food or Gold missing, this guy has probably stolen it from you!

name: Morpheus Dragon
description: The Morpheus Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dream. The Morpheus Dragon can also learn Pure, Ice and  Sea moves.      The God of sleep and dreams, the Morpheus Dragons will appear to the sleeping Dragon Master in many forms and disguises. He doesnt intervene, rather he silently watches and analyzes the stories in your head.

name: Gothiquette Dragon
description: The Gothiquette Dragon is a Legendary Dragon   with the primary typing of Dark. The Gothiquette Dragon can also learn Pure, Electric and  Metal moves.      A student of the dark arts, the Gothiquette Dragon comes from a long line of dark magicians. Her aim is to be top of her class, even if it means studying some prohibited dark spells...
